scn aaaCharlieCompanionScript
short HasBeenHired short L38 short DoOnce
int CombatStyleRanged int CombatStyleMelee int IsFollowingDefault int IsFollowingLong int FollowerSwitchAggressive int Waiting
Begin GameMode If (DoOnce != 1) Set HasBeenHired to 0 Set L38 to 0 Set CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set CombatStyleMelee to 0 Set IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set IsFollowingLong to 0 Set FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 Set Waiting to 0 Set DoOnce to 1 EndIf End

scn aaaCharlieCompanionQuestScript
short bCompanion1Hireable short bCompanion1DoOnce
Begin GameMode if (bCompanion1DoOnce != 1) Set bCompanion1Hireable to 1 Set bCompanion1DoOnce to 1 EndIf End

ESP.ORIGINAL: Correspondence
ESP.TRADUIT: 通信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Correspondence Transcript Two
Contact: Is this working?
HQ: I read you.
C: I barely read you, this connection is shit.
HQ: I don't know you. Stop jacking my signal. Terminating frequency. Listen people! If your signal is acting irregular, it means that somebody is running interference. They can hear our conversations, and I cannot abide that!
ESP.TRADUIT:
通信记录二
联系人：这样行吗？
总部：我听到了。
C：我几乎看不懂你的意思，这种联络真是糟透了。
总部：我不认识你。别干扰我的信号，终止频率。大家听好！如果你的信号不正常，说明有人在干扰。他们能听到我们的谈话，我不能容忍！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slave Request
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶要求

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mr. Schrader, as your operation has proven reliable, I have a specific request for you. I will require eight slaves. Four men, four women, between the ages of 20 to 40. They must be fit and healthy. At least one man and one woman must be of Asian heritage.
I do not require them to be attractive, fertile, or possessing of any noteworthy skills. You will deliver all eight of them, together. Upon completion, you will be rewarded with 1,000 stimpaks.
ESP.TRADUIT:
施拉德尔先生，你已经证明了自己的行动是可靠的，我有一个特别的要求。我需要八个奴隶，四男四女，年龄在20到40岁之间。他们必须是健康的。至少有一男一女必须是亚洲血统。
我不要求他们有吸引力，有教养，或拥有任何值得注意的技能。你只要把八个都送过来就行，完成后，你将获得1000个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thoughts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想法

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Looking for work as a merc may not be bad. I think I'm equipped.
Fucking Valdez, piece of shit ran me out of Reno, so it wouldn't really surprise me if he sent goons after me. I know there's some issue with road blockages around the Mojave Outpost. Maybe that gets cleared up, I can take on some high profile road-security work. Hell, this is just a pain in my ass. All over some money I didn't even steal, that lying prick.
Had a good thing going in Reno. Just have to try my luck at getting something even better in Vegas. Isn't improving your future through outrageous turns of good luck the whole point of this city? Guess we'll find out.
ESP.TRADUIT:
找一份雇佣兵的工作也许不错，我想我有条件。
该死的瓦尔迪兹，这个混蛋把我赶出了里诺，所以如果他派暴徒来追杀我，我也不会惊讶。我知道莫哈韦前哨周围的道路有点阻塞，也许这事解决了，我就能做些高调的道路安全工作了。该死，这就是我的麻烦，都是为了我根本没偷的钱，那个栽赃的混蛋。
在里诺过得很愉快。我得试试运气，看看在新维加斯能不能过得更好。通过惊人的好运来改善你的未来难道不是这座城市的全部意义吗？我想我们会知道的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet at Cerulean
ESP.TRADUIT: 相约蔚蓝

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Tony, meet me & the boys at that Cerulean robot factory in Freeside. Bring some quality chems, because I wanna party tonight.
Don't worry about Nino's fucking "territory" bullshit. I stuck a gun in his mouth and got him to swear not to interfere. He knows we're serious business, he won't be dumb enough to try and stop us. If he does, hey, we throw him off the roof of the fucking building.
-Chester
ESP.TRADUIT:
托尼，来自由之城的蔚蓝机器人工厂见我和兄弟们。带点高质量的药品来，我今晚想开派对。
别担心尼诺那狗屁"领土"了。我把枪塞进他嘴里，让他发誓不干涉。他知道我们是认真的，他不会蠢到阻止我们。如果他敢，嘿，我们他妈的就把他从楼顶扔下去。
- 切斯特

ESP.ORIGINAL: Correspondence
ESP.TRADUIT: 通信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Correspondence Transcript Three
Contact: I have uncovered evidence of Brotherhood activity operating out of the Hidden Valley, close to Goodsprings and the NCRCF.
HQ: What have you found?
C: At night, during the sandstorms-
HQ: -The sandstorms are not natural, everyone. They only occur at night, every night, starting and ending at the same times every single day.
C: Yes, yes. I was observing one night, when I witnessed several bright flashes of red light within the sandstorm, consistent with laser fire. When I investigated the area during the morning, I found scorch marks on some rocks that had not been there previously. I was monitoring the perimeter all night. Nobody entered or exited. The shooters are hiding there as we speak, and it is clearly documented that the BoS prefers laser-based weaponry.
HQ: Copy. I believe you are correct. Terminating frequency. All listeners, please avoid Hidden Valley, for your own safety.
ESP.TRADUIT:
通信记录三
联络人:我发现了兄弟会在隐谷活动的证据，靠近清泉镇和NCR监狱。
总部：你发现了什么?
C：在夜间，沙尘暴期间-
总部：-沙尘暴不自然，各位。它们只在晚上发生，每天晚上，在每天相同的时间开始和结束。
C：是的,是的。有一天晚上，我在观察时，看到沙尘暴中有几道红光闪烁，与激光射击一致。当我早上调查这个地区时，我发现一些岩石上以前没有的烧焦痕迹。我整晚都在监视周边的情况，没有人进出。就在我们说话的这段时间，枪手就藏在那里，而且有明确的记录表明兄弟会更喜欢激光武器。
总部：收到，我相信你是对的，终止频率。所有听众，为了您自身的安全，请避开隐谷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't get it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Why do we have this TV? It's just taking up space. It's not like there's even a signal for the thing to pick up. I guess Maggie likes to play with her reflection, but...
Bill
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们为什么有这台电视？它除了占用空间没别的用，它好像连信号都没接收到，我猜玛吉喜欢玩她的倒影，但是...
- 比尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scrawled Letter
ESP.TRADUIT: 潦草的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Howdy, I hope if you're reading this, you're that badass courier we all been hearing about in the news and all that. Listen pardner, me and my kin have suffered a bunch of terrible murders. My pappy always taught me that I gotta stand up for my kin, and goddamn right that means I'm gonna avenge him, now that some evil killer done shot him to death. I don't know that I can get my revenge all by my lonesome, though. I think I'm gonna need some backup, and I know you're some kinda famous badass, so I'm gonna need your help, pardner! I can pay you good money, so please come and meet me out by the entrance to Vault 19, I'm gonna be waiting for you, okay?
Scooter
ESP.TRADUIT:
你好，我希望如果你正在读这篇文章，你就是我们在新闻里听到的那个厉害的邮差。听着，伙计，我和我的亲人遭受了很多可怕的谋杀。我爸爸一直教导我，我要为我的亲人挺身而出，这意味着我要为他报仇，现在某个邪恶的杀手已经把他打死了。但我不知道我能不能独自完成复仇，我想我需要支援，我知道你是个大坏蛋，所以我需要你的帮助，伙计！我可以付你一大笔钱，请到19号避难所门口来找我，我会等你的，好吗？
- 斯库特

ESP.ORIGINAL: Correspondence
ESP.TRADUIT: 通信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Correspondence Transcript Four
Contact: I need to find Sheridan. I know he isn't dead.
HQ: Sheridan? Raider boss, likely dead or an undocumented prisoner of the NCR.
C: He skinned my father ali-
HQ: Prior to the first battle at Hoover Dam, Sheridan took over the town of Brighton to the south-east.
C: I know that, and-
HQ: And the NCR wasn't about to allow an opposing figure to gain any traction. They purposely hired a bounty hunter with a reputation for brutality, and gave him vague orders so that they could claim plausible deniability when he slaughtered the town for them. It all went according to plan for those scheming bastards.
C: Look, I need help finding him. My name is Ava-
HQ: No identities, terminating frequency! What the fuck is wrong with you people?! As to this Brighton incident, this is a war crime on the level with Bitter Springs, but the use of proxy agents has allowed the NCR to escape public scrutiny. Don't let it be forgotten!
ESP.TRADUIT:
通信记录四
联络人:我要找到谢里丹，我知道他没死。
总部：谢里丹？掠夺者老大，可能已经死了或者是NCR的非法囚犯。
C：他剥了我父亲的皮--
总部：在胡佛大坝的第一次战斗之前，谢里丹占领了东南部的布莱顿镇。
C：我知道，而且-
总部：NCR不打算让一个对立的人物获得任何影响力。他们故意雇佣了一个以残暴著称的赏金猎人，给他下了模糊的命令，这样当他为他们屠杀小镇时，他们就可以合理地否认。这一切都按照这些阴谋家的计划进行。
C：听着，我需要你帮我找到他。我叫艾娃-
总部：没有身份，终止频率！你们这些人到底有什么毛病？！至于这个布莱顿事件，这是和苦泉一样的战争罪行，但使用委托代理人让NCR逃脱了公众的监督。不要让它被遗忘！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The jailbreak
ESP.TRADUIT: 越狱

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The NCRCF jailbreak occurred with the knowledge and allowance of the NCR government. The jailbreak allowed the NCR to release dangerous individuals from their home state into the Mojave, where they would destabilize us, while claiming plausible deniability as the jailbreak was simply an "accident" that they were working to fix.
FACT: The jailbreak was initiated by Samuel Cooke, a highwayman with a reputation for utilizing explosives, and a charismatic nature that led him to naturally accrue followers.
FACT: Despite the extreme nature of his crimes, Cooke was transferred out of the Republic to a minimum-security facility in the Mojave, where he was given access to explosives and willing followers. Anyone could see that an attempted coup was inevitable, and yet the NCR did nothing to prevent it.
FACT: The facility was overcrowded with prisoners, and yet security was undermanned and underequipped.
FACT: In the days leading up to the jailbreak, NCR command began to transfer guards away from the facility, making it even easier for the prisoners to riot, while simultaneously keeping their own men out of harms way.
FACT: The convicts could not have stashed dynamite if the NCR did not allow it. There should have been an inventory roster that would clearly show whether any dynamite was unaccounted for at the end of the day. And yet no roster was ever noted to exist.
They ensured the prison break would occur to weaken us. Once they have decided that enough time has passed, they will easily recapture the facility and execute any "Powder Gangers" that they can find, in order to make themselves look like heroes to the people of the Mojave. Wait and see.
ESP.TRADUIT:
NCR监狱的越狱是在NCR政府的知情和允许下发生的。越狱让NCR得以将危险人物从他们的家乡释放到莫哈维，在那里他们会破坏我们的稳定，同时声称越狱只是他们正在努力修复的一个“意外”，并对此进行合理的推脱。
证据：这次越狱是由塞缪尔·库克发起的，他是一个以使用炸药而闻名的公路杀手，他的魅力让他自然而然地获得了很多追随者。
证据：尽管库克的罪行极端，但他还是被转移出共和国，转移到莫哈维的一个最低安全级别的设施，在那里他可以接触到炸药和愿意跟随他的人。任何人都能看出，一场未遂的政变是不可避免的，然而NCR却没有采取任何措施来阻止它。
证据：该设施挤满了囚犯，但是保安人员和装备都不足。
证据：在越狱发生前的几天里，NCR指挥部开始将看守从监狱调走，使得囚犯更容易发生暴乱，同时也让他们自己的人远离危险。
证据：如果NCR不允许，罪犯不可能把炸药藏起来。应该有一份库存名册，清楚地显示当天结束时是否有炸药下落不明。然而，从来没有人注意到有任何名册存在。
他们确保了越狱事件的发生来削弱我们。他们认为一旦时间过去，他们会很容易地夺回设施并处决他们能找到的任何“炸药帮匪徒”，以此让自己在莫哈维的人民眼中看起来像个英雄。等着瞧吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal
ESP.TRADUIT: 日记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I had the dream again. There were four of them, and they didn't have faces. We were all asleep, and they came in quietly. I closed my eyes so they wouldn't know I was awake, but I guess I wasn't actually awake since it was a dream. Last time I had this nightmare, they all came in and carried Rob out of bed and left with him.
This time, they came in and took Sarah. Nobody said a word about it. When we all woke up this morning, though, Sarah was in bed. Just like Rob was still in bed like the last time it happened. That's how I know I was just dreaming.
I hope I don't have the dreams anymore. They scare me.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我又做了那个梦。一共有四个人，他们都没有脸。我们都睡着了，他们悄悄地进来了，我醒了但假装闭上眼睛，这样他们就不会知道我是醒着的，但我想我其实并没有醒，因为那是个梦。上次我做这个噩梦的时候，他们进来把罗布从床上抬起来带着他一起走了。
这次，他们进来带走了莎拉。没人说过一个字。今天早上我们醒来的时候，莎拉还在床上，就像上次罗布也躺在床上一样。所以我才知道我只是在做梦。
我希望我不要再做这种梦了，他们吓到我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crumpled Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 揉皱的便条

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grade red/blue on final exam. Usual criteria apply. More blues this year. Due diligence. No mistakes again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 期末考试成绩为红/蓝。按通常的标准，今年蓝色多了。尽职调查，不会再犯错误了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ancient Book
ESP.TRADUIT: 古书

ESP.ORIGINAL: This crumbling book is in exceptionally poor condition, though it seems to be from the 18th century. Stuck in the middle of the book are four innocuous pictures of children, which seem to have been clipped from a class yearbook at some point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这本古书保存得非常糟糕，尽管它似乎是18世纪的。夹在书中间的是四张无害的儿童照片，这些照片似乎是在某个时候从班级年鉴上剪下来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burke's Letter
ESP.TRADUIT: 伯克的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I had a very productive meeting with Aaron, and we have agreed that your Mojave ministry branch proposal would be a fine idea. Even better, Aaron agreed to officially announce the opening during next week's press conference. I've no doubt that a presidential endorsement will help you in spreading the word of your philanthropic ventures.
We've given you a space directly neighboring our Aerotech refugee camp, not too far from McCarran. That should help provide you with ample opportunity to offer aid to the orphans and refugees, in addition to the obvious security benefits that McCarran would provide.
All that being said, you remember my son, Adam? I'm sure you'll be hearing all manner of tripe about him in the next few days, if you haven't already. For whatever reason, the idiot boy has run off instead of just sitting quietly and letting Mr. Johnson win him another acquittal. I despair for our family legacy if it must rest on his witless shoulders. Perhaps I'll have to remarry after all.
If, by some chance, Adam shows up in your neck of the woods, please do me a courtesy and send him back to me, as discreetly as possible.
Warmest regards, your cousin Senator Henry Burke
ESP.TRADUIT:
我和亚伦进行了一次卓有成效的会谈，我们一致认为你在莫哈维成立事工是个好提议。更棒的是，亚伦同意在下周的新闻发布会上正式宣布开幕。我相信总统的支持会帮助你宣传你的慈善事业。
我们给你们提供了一个地方，就在航空科技难民营附近，离麦卡伦营地不远，除了麦卡伦提供的显而易见的安全保障，还应该能给你们提供大量的机会去帮助孤儿和难民。
说了这么多，你还记得我儿子亚当吗？如果你还没听说的话，我相信你会在接下来的几天里听到各种关于他的说法。不管出于什么原因，这个白痴男孩已经跑了，而不是乖乖待着让约翰逊先生再次为他赢得无罪判决。如果他一直这么蠢下去，我不得不对我们的家族遗产感到绝望。也许我终究还是要再婚的。
如果亚当碰巧出现在你的地盘，请帮我一个忙，把他送回给我，尽可能的谨慎。
最热烈的问候，你的堂兄 - 联邦参议员亨利·伯克

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal
ESP.TRADUIT: 日记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I guess this an exercise in keeping track of my own sanity, or whatever remains of it. Heard theories that isolation helps us turn feral sooner. Guess if I notice my faculties fading away, I'll put a gun in my mouth. Again.
What's the point of any of this? It seems we were cruel and stupid enough to bring about the apocalypse, but we're so fucking stubborn that we refused to lie down and die in the hell that we created.
Aren't I the perfect example of that, though? Not a day goes by that I don't consider ending my life. I've wanted it for over two hundred years. And yet here I am, armed to the teeth, nestled in the bowels of a gauntlet of traps and misery, so as to keep the world at bay. Can't claim to be brave. Never have been.
I still see their faces. Heard that memories of the beloved dead tend to fade over time. Coping mechanism, I guess. Never happened to me. Why should it? I'm good at suffering. Experienced more than enough of it. Guess that's why I spread it around. What's wrong with me?
I remembered the priest today. Been a long time. Just taunting me that I'm bound for hell, I guess. God is surely having a good laugh at all of this.
I wonder how my sister died? Never saw her again after the bombs. If I had to guess, probably captured by cannibals, tortured, raped, eaten alive. Might be a drastic hypothetical, but in my experience, the most awful possibilities tend to be the ones that come true.
Went on a caravan run today. Got blood on my coat. Poor guards, poor merchants, poor cows. There's always collateral. Can't bring myself to care.
Saw some butchery up on the surface, parking lot above my cave. Saw a man get skinned alive. Another one was dismembered and his parts were shoved into a small box. I left the corpses there. I don't owe them a burial. Just another friendly reminder that wanton cruelty and barbarism is the way of the world. It always really was, but now that we've bombed ourselves into a new lawless period, we can just be open about with our savagery. How loathsome we all are.
Considered looting the corpses up on that parking lot. Think I'll pass. Cazadors around there, and who knows if the killers left booby traps. I would have left booby traps. Morbid curiosity; I don't need whatever pittance those poor fools had jangling in their pockets.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我觉得这是一种练习，用来保持我自己的理智，应该说任何剩余的理智。有理论认为孤独能让我们更早变野性，我猜如果我发现自己的官能退化了，我会再一次把枪塞进嘴里。
这一切的意义是什么？似乎是我们的残忍和愚蠢导致了世界末日，但我们是如此的固执，我们拒绝躺下，死在我们创造的地狱里。
我不就是最完美的例子吗？我没有一天不考虑结束我的生命。我想要结束它已经有两百多年了。而现在我却在这里，全副武装，躺在充满陷阱和苦难的肠子里，只为将世界拒之门外。我不能说自己勇敢，从来都不能。
我还能看到他们的脸。听说对死者的记忆会随着时间的推移而消失。也许是应对机制吧。这在我身上从没发生过。为什么呢?我很擅长受苦，我经历的太多了。我猜这就是为什么我到处传播的原因。我是怎么了？
我今天想起了那个牧师，好久不见了。我猜是在嘲笑我，说我注定要下地狱了。上帝肯定会对这一切开怀大笑的。
我想知道我妹妹是怎么死的？核弹爆炸后我就再也没见过她。要我猜的话，可能被食人族抓住，折磨，强奸，生吞。这可能是一个极端的假设，但根据我的经验，最可怕的可能性往往会实现。
今天跑了一次商队，我外套上全是血。可怜的守卫，可怜的商人，可怜的奶牛。总是有附带的，不能让自己在乎。
在地面上看到了屠杀，我洞穴上方的停车场。看到一个人被活活剥了皮，另一个被肢解，他的部分被塞进一个小盒子里。我把尸体留在那里了。我不欠他们一个葬礼。这只是另一个友好的提醒，肆意的残忍和野蛮是这个世界的方式。一直都是这样，但现在我们把自己炸进了一个新的无法无天的时代，我们可以公开展示我们的野蛮，我们是多么令人讨厌啊。
考虑过把停车场里的尸体洗劫一空，我想我还是算了吧。到处都是猎蜂，谁知道凶手有没有留下陷阱，如果是我我会留下陷阱。病态的好奇心，我不需要那些可怜的傻瓜口袋里叮当作响的一丁点钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bloody Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 血腥的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can go home, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以回家了，邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eddie Hurst Dossier
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾迪·赫斯特档案

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Eddie Hurst is an NCR native. Did some clerical work here and there for a prominent political family about 15 years ago, and he ended his career by stealing a bunch of documents from the campaign office, and selling them to our target, Blake.
Hurst is hiding in Red Rock Canyon, correctly assuming that our military isn't going to bother waging full-on war with the Great Khans just to get to his junkie ass. He's a big-time chem fiend, this guy. He's also paranoid as hell. Apparently, he doesn't even speak unless he's waved a bug-sweeper around so that "they" can't spy on him and read his lips.
We're positive he knows how to find Blake, but since we can't get to him, it's gonna be you. Have fun!
Specialist April Morgan
ESP.TRADUIT:
艾迪·赫斯特是土生土长的NCR人，十五年前为一个显赫的政治家族做过一些文书工作，最后他从竞选办公室偷了一堆文件，卖给了我们的目标，布莱克。
赫斯特躲在红岩峡谷，他准确的猜到了我们的军队不会为了抓到他这个瘾君子而与大汗帮开战。这家伙是个超级化学狂人。他还非常偏执，显然，除非他挥舞着反窃听装置，否则他不会说话，这样“他们”就不能监视他，读他的唇语。
我们确信他知道如何找到布莱克，但既然我们无法找到他，那就只能靠你了。祝你玩得开心!
- 专家阿普丽尔·摩根

ESP.ORIGINAL: For [%]
Orders
ESP.TRADUIT: 订单

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Carter: I will be in the church's escape tunnel with the main contingent of my men. Some of the staff may have fled down that way, and I won't be leaving witnesses. If you find any survivors that somehow dodged our initial purge, wipe them out. Your primary focus is [%], who I am sure will be arriving soon. My superiors have offered me a substantial reward for the Courier's head, and while I would prefer to take my time breaking them, business is business. If you can deal with this issue, I will cut off a large share of the reward for you. Don't fail me, and if you do, don't bother surviving.
Brecker
ESP.TRADUIT:
卡特：我会和我的主要部队一起在教堂的逃生隧道里。 一些工作人员可能已经这样逃走了，我不会留下证人。 如果你发现任何幸存者以某种方式躲过了我们最初的清洗，消灭他们。 你的主要关注点是 [%]，我相信他很快就会到达。 我的上司为邮差的头提供了丰厚的赏金，虽然我更愿意花时间破坏它，但生意就是生意。 如果你能解决这个问题，我会为你提供一大笔奖金。 不要辜负我，如果你失败了，也不要费心活着了。
- 布雷克

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clearing House
ESP.TRADUIT: 清算所

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paulson, I tolerate your little fringe religion, as well as your filmmaking side-gig, because it is profitable. However, it is also potentially the sort of scandal that would absolutely destroy this operation. Combine that with the antics of my cousin's idiot son, and we're looking at the sort of thing that could topple us all, from here to California. Until this is sorted out, you will cease operations. Take your current stock and dispose of them in the desert. Leave me a copy of the coordinates you decide upon, so I can have Brecker clean the area. I also want your studio empty and spotless. Ideally, this wretched Courier will be taken care of and we can get back to business, but worst case scenario, we need to burn the paper trail so as to not ruin everything we've worked so hard towards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保尔森，我容忍你的小边缘宗教以及你的电影制作副业，因为这很赚钱。然而，这种丑闻也有可能彻底毁掉这次行动。再加上我堂兄的白痴儿子的滑稽行为，我们看到的这类事情可能会推翻从这里到加州的所有人。在这个问题解决之前，你必须停止运营。把你现在的存货扔到沙漠里处理掉。给我一份你们确定的坐标，我好让布瑞克清理这片区域。我还希望你的工作室空无一人，一尘不染。理想情况下，这个可恶的邮差会被处理掉，我们就能重新开始，但最坏的情况是，我们得烧掉文件以免毁掉我们苦心经营的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay Put
ESP.TRADUIT: 留在原地

ESP.ORIGINAL:
For security reasons, please do not leave your office unless you receive an all-clear from myself or Carter. It should go without saying, but for the sake of redundancy, I will also warn you not to contact anyone until this situation is resolved.
Have no fear, reverend. Everything is being taken care of.
Brecker
ESP.TRADUIT:
出于安全考虑，请不要离开你的办公室除非你收到我和卡特的安全通知。这应该不用多说，但为了保险起见，我也得警告你，在这个问题解决之前不要联系任何人。
不要害怕，牧师。一切都会被处理好的。
- 布瑞克

ESP.ORIGINAL: Death Order
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡订单

ESP.ORIGINAL: Offer of Employment
ESP.TRADUIT: 聘用意向书

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hello, [%]. My name is Specialist April Morgan with the NCR. I'm working on a classified assignment, and I know that you would be immensely helpful to my efforts. While I can't go into details in this message, I can promise you a hefty cash incentive to aiding me, in addition to the good it would do for the region if I am successful in this. Included in this message are the coordinates to the area I'm operating. Please, meet with me at your earliest possible convenience.
Specialist April Morgan NCR Military
ESP.TRADUIT:
你好，[%]。我是NCR的专家阿普丽尔·摩根。我在执行一项机密任务，我知道你能帮我大忙。虽然我不能在这封邮件中透露细节，但我可以向你保证，如果我在这方面取得成功，除了对该地区的好处外，你还会得到一笔丰厚的现金奖励。这条信息中包含了我行动区域的坐标。请在你方便的时候尽早与我见面。
- 专家阿普丽尔·摩根 NCR军方

ESP.ORIGINAL: Massey's Testimony
ESP.TRADUIT: 梅西的证词

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Kevin Massey, a former ranch hand for Senator Burke's younger brother Tobias, has told me all the suspicious things he recalls. He said that every few months, a truckload of women would show up on the estate. The women would head inside for a couple of days, and then get back in the truck and leave. Massey said that he did not believe the women were prostitutes, and he also swore that there were no parties going on that could explain their presence.
Massey also said that he overheard a pair of Tobias Burke's security personnel at a bar. The men were discussing how they "got" a woman named Strauss for "the boss". The night before this conversation, one of Tobias Burke's former business partners, a woman named Strauss, died under suspicious circumstances. Massey claims that Strauss was preparing to sue Burke before her death.
ESP.TRADUIT:
凯文·梅西曾是参议员伯克的弟弟托拜厄斯的农场工人，他告诉了我他回忆起的所有可疑的事情。他说每隔几个月，就会有一卡车的女人来这里。女人们会在里面呆上几天，然后回到卡车上离开。梅西说，他不相信这些女人是妓女，他还发誓，没有任何派对可以解释她们的存在。
梅西还说他在酒吧里无意中听到了托拜厄斯·伯克的两名安保人员的对话，他们正在讨论他们是如何“搞定”一个叫施特劳斯的女人并交给“老板”的。在这次谈话的前一晚，托拜厄斯·伯克的前生意伙伴，一个叫施特劳斯的女人，在可疑的情况下死亡。梅西声称施特劳斯死前正准备起诉伯克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suicide Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 遗书

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To whomever finds this note:
My name is Edward Hurst. I am a serious alcoholic, a drug addict, a con artist, fraud, coward, a compulsive liar, and a failed human being.
I cannot stand the guilt of this any longer. I do believe that all life is precious, and the guilt of how I wasted mine has consumed all of my thoughts. I said many things to many people over the years. In my state, intoxicated as I was, I do not remember exactly what I said. Ludicrous tales of impropriety that I had allegedly witnessed my previous employers commit, wild conspiracies about powerful figures hunting me down, I even told some people that I suffered a life-threatening illness. All of these things were lies. I did it for attention, and the possibility of making a profit from these tales. I am a sick man. I know what I did was wrong, and yet I am too weak to reform and avoid these mistakes in the future.
I do not want to spend the rest of my life as a shiftless rat, taking advantage of others for my own selfish ends. Knowing that I am too weak of a man to change, I shall instead take the coward's way out. A fitting end for the coward that I am.
Goodbye Edward Hurst
ESP.TRADUIT:
致发现这张纸条的人:
我叫爱德华·赫斯特。我是一个严重的酒鬼、一个瘾君子、一个懦夫、一个撒谎成性的骗子，一个失败的人。
我再也无法忍受这种罪恶感了。我确实相信所有的生命都是宝贵的，而我浪费生命的愧疚感已经吞噬了我所有的思维。这些年来，在我醉酒的状态下对很多人说过很多话。我不记得自己究竟说了些什么。据说我亲眼目睹了我以前的雇主犯下的一些荒唐的不当行为，权势人物密谋追杀我的疯狂阴谋，我甚至告诉一些人我得了一种威胁生命的疾病。所有这些都是谎言，我这么做是为了引起注意，以及从这些故事中获利的可能性。我是一个有病的人，我知道我做的是错的，但我太软弱了，无法改变和避免这些错误。
我不想在我的余生中成为一只无能的老鼠，利用别人来达到自己的自私目的。我知道我是一个太过软弱的人，无法改变，所以我会选择懦夫的道路，对我这样的懦夫来说，这个结局再合适不过了。
再见
- 爱德华赫斯特

ESP.ORIGINAL: Magnetic Interference
ESP.TRADUIT: 电磁干扰

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Thanks for looking into the Humboldt Ranch situation for me. They're good folks, and they need all the help they can get. One thing I forgot to mention is that their ranch is in a little box canyon. I don't really know the science about it, but apparently the rocks in that area have lots of metal deposits. Apparently it can really interfere with certain electronics, like that pip-boy gadget you use. Nothing too dramatic, but it might screw around with your map markers while you're in the ranch. Just exercise some common sense and you shouldn't get lost.
Ryan O'Neill
ESP.TRADUIT:
谢谢你帮我调查洪堡农场的情况。他们是好人，他们需要所有能得到的帮助。有一件事我忘了说，他们的农场在一个小峡谷里。我不太了解这方面的科学，但很明显，那个地区的岩石有很多金属矿床。它会干扰某些电子产品，比如你用的那个小玩意。没什么特别的，但你在牧场的时候，它可能会破坏你的地图标记，只要运用一些常识，你就不会迷路。
- 瑞恩·奥尼尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assassin's Contract
ESP.TRADUIT: 刺客的合同

ESP.ORIGINAL:
[%], I've gone to the liberty of hiring an assassin to watch your back. Who could possibly be more qualified to foil attempts on your life, than someone who does that sort of thing for a living, right?
Don't worry about the cost. It's being generously covered by our dear friends back in the NCR: the taxpayers. The contract is good until the resolution of the battle at Hoover Dam, at which point you're going to be footing the bill yourself, assuming you want to extend the contract.
I'm told that your rendezvous point is a second-story apartment in Freeside, tucked into a corner a little bit past that water pump that the Kings laid claims to.
On the off chance that this has been an elaborate ruse to get you to lower your guard around a professional killer, I can fully guarantee you a very official apology from the NCR government if you end up dying.
Specialist April Morgan Office of Mojave Affairs
ESP.TRADUIT:
[%]，我已经获得了雇佣刺客保护你的权限。有谁能比以这种工作为生的人，更有资格阻止别人对你生命的企图呢？
不要担心费用，这笔费用将由我们在NCR的亲爱的朋友们：纳税人慷慨承担。这份合同在胡佛大坝之战结束前都是有效的，到那时，如果你想延长合同，你就得自己买单了。
我听说你们的会面地点是自由城的一间二层公寓，就在猫王帮声称要去的那个水泵旁边的一个角落里。
万一这是一个精心策划的诡计，目的是让你对职业杀手放松警惕，我可以向你保证如果你最后死了NCR政府会给你一个正式的道歉。
- 专家阿普丽尔·摩根 莫哈韦事务办公室

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raya's Testimony
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉娅的证词

ESP.ORIGINAL:
A deal's a deal. You sent Gold to hell, so here's all the dirt I compiled on him. I included the exact route we took from Vegas to NCR, how many other girls besides me that he shipped in, his quotes about how he paid Reverend Burke to take me away, a list of every figure I could recognize from his little blackmail party, and the details of his price negotiation with the Senator for the blackmail he recorded.
(Raya's notes continue for several pages, and are both meticulous and exhaustive. It's detailed enough that it would be difficult to refute.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们说好的，你把戈尔德送进了地狱，所以这是我整理的所有关于他的资料。包括了我们从维加斯到NCR的确切路线，他运来的除了我以外的其他女孩的人数，他与伯克牧师牧师交易我的记录，我可以认出的他的小勒索派对的每个人物的名单，以及他与参议员就他记录的勒索的价格谈判的细节。
（拉娅的笔记持续了好几页，既细致又详尽。太详细了，很难反驳。）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reverend's Ledger
ESP.TRADUIT: 牧师的账本

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sent 8 women to Gold, at $3,500 a head. Technically only $2,500 each, but there's an extra thousand if they're clean and unspoiled. Easy enough to enforce.
Deacon Paulson pays 1000 caps out of his own pocket to be allowed to cherrypick one student per month. Pumps some sort of sedative into the student's quarters, and then takes one down to his little film studio for a few hours. Then he puts them back the next morning, as if nothing ever happened. He says it's a matter of religious significance. Whatever.
That courier visited my office today. Knew about Gold's transaction history, but mercifully lacked context. May need to have Brecker deal with this issue.
Gold dropped off the map today. He was supposed to comb through my stock in preparation for another of his blackmail parties, and as a side venture, purchase that porn studio near North Vegas. Never showed up here, and that porn studio is still independent. Don't like this.
Brecker told me that "this situation" needs to be resolved. Said that he wasn't happy with how things were going. He's been bringing more of his security goons around. Whatever works, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT:
送了8个女人给戈尔德，每人3500美元。严格来说，每人只卖2500美元，但如果是干净没有被污染的，就能多出1000美元。执行起来很容易。
保尔森执事自掏腰包，每月出1000瓶盖挑选一名学生，在宿舍里注射镇静剂，然后带去他的一个小电影工作室待上几个小时。第二天早上再把她们放回去，就像什么都没发生过一样。他说这是一个具有宗教意义的问题。无所谓了。。
那个邮差今天来过我的办公室，他知道戈尔德的交易记录，但幸运的是没有上下文。可能需要布雷克来处理这个问题。
戈尔德今天消失了，他本应该梳理我的股票、为他的另一个勒索派对做准备，作为副业，买下北维加斯附近的那个色情工作室。他没来过这里，而且那个色情片工作室还是独立的。不喜欢这个。
布瑞克告诉我，“这种情况”需要解决，说他对现在的情况不满意，他带了更多的保镖过来。我想，只要管用就行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blood-Smeared Holotape
ESP.TRADUIT: 沾满血迹的全息录像带

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Twelve Headed Dragon.
Your group's name is clever, assuming you recognize that dragons are fictional and wield no power. Very self-aware.
Do you really believe that I would want to join your little club? By all accounts, it sounds like you're a collection of businessmen and bureaucrats, sitting in a shady room and telling each other that you're badasses because you're rich enough to get away with diddling kids or beating hookers. It would be cute, if it weren't so sad.
I'll tell you what. Your offer has inspired me to make your group a special project of mine. The only thing I hate more than smug cunts that confuse wealth with power is the NCR as a concept. I want you to know that I will come for each and every one of you. Your money, your influence, your fancy names, none of it will slow my blade as it teaches you the meaning of agony.
Sadly, I'm not in the Mojave or California, so I didn't have the pleasure of mutilating and mangling your little courier delivery team, but as you (unknowingly) sacrificed seven people to my men, I felt you had earned a personal response. Thankfully, my people are good at following my lead, and I've been assured that your delivery team suffered unimaginable pain and anguish.
As for your show of goodwill, well, money is functionally worthless to me. I've distributed it to my men (followers? Vassals? Thralls? What's a good word for them?) instead. I just thought it might bother you to know that your money is being thrown around by a collection of uneducated murderous raider-types, and I do love a chance to bother you NCR kiddies.
I am not a man to be partnered with, nor employed, nor manipulated. I'm gonna go ahead and let you in on a little secret. It turns out, I'm a divine being, sent down from on high to give you all the gift of suffering. I look forward to burning you alive, stealing your eyes, flaying bits and pieces until there's nothing left to peel, raping your wives and daughters, and throwing your money into the ocean. If you fall to your hands and knees (not to imply I won't be chopping off your hands and shattering your kneecaps) and pray to me for release, I may deign to end your suffering. Or maybe not. I'm a mercurial god, as it happens.
Does this make us pen-pals? If you send me a response with another courier to play with, why, it would just make my whole week. Maybe try to hire that celebrity-courier in the Mojave that people won't shut the fuck up about? I'd love to turn them into a bloody footnote in my autobiography!
Lots of love Mr. Sheridan (Thanks for the title, I've never been called "mister" before. I'll add it to my collection.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的“十二头龙”。
你们团体的名字很聪明，前提是你们知道龙是虚构的，而且不会使用任何权力，那还是很有自知之明的。
你真以为我会想加入你的小俱乐部吗？从各方面来看，你们听起来就像是一群商人和官僚，坐在一个阴暗的房间里，互相告诉对方你们是坏蛋，因为你们足够富有，可以欺骗孩子或殴打妓女而不受惩罚。如果不是这么悲哀的话，会很可爱的。
我告诉你吧。你的提议激发了我的灵感，让我把你们的小团体变成了我的一个特殊项目。比起那些把财富和权力混为一谈的自鸣得意的傻子，我更讨厌的是NCR这个概念。我想让你们知道，我会为你们每一个人而来。你的金钱，你的影响力，你花哨的名号，都不能减缓我的刀锋，因为它让你体会到痛苦的含义。
遗憾的是，我不在莫哈维沙漠，也不在加州，所以我无法享受肢解和折磨你的邮差小队的乐趣，但当你(不知不觉地)牺牲了七个人给我的人时，我觉得你已经赢得了个人的回应。幸运的是，我的人很擅长听从我的指挥，我已经得到保证，你的邮差小队遭受了难以想象的痛苦和折磨。
至于你的好意，好吧，钱对我来说不值一提。我已经把钱分给了我的手下(追随者？附庸？奴隶？对他们来说该用什么词好呢？)我只是想让你知道你的钱被一群没文化的凶残掠夺者挥霍掉了，我很喜欢有机会打扰你们NCR的孩子。
我不是一个可以合作的人，也不是一个可以雇佣的人，更不是一个可以操纵的人。我现在要告诉你一个小秘密。事实证明，我是一个神圣的存在，从高处被派下来，给你们所有人带来痛苦的礼物。我盼着把你活活烧死，偷走你的眼睛，把你撕成碎片直到什么都不剩，强奸你的妻女，把你的钱扔进海里。如果你双手双膝跪下(不是说我不会砍断你的手，砸碎你的膝盖骨)，向我祈祷，求我释放你，我也许会屈尊结束你的痛苦，也许不会。碰巧我是个善变的神。
这样我们就成了笔友？为什么你让另一个邮差给我回复，这只会让我一整周都不爽。也许你可以试着雇佣莫哈韦的那个名人邮差让大家都闭嘴？我真想把他们变成我自传里的一个该死的脚注！
衷心的爱 - 谢尔丹先生(谢谢你给我的头衔，我从来没有被叫做先生。我要把它收藏起来。)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Open Contract
ESP.TRADUIT: 开放式合约

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Your target is this idiot:
Name: [%] Race: &PCRace; Sex: &PCSex;
This asshole killed Mr. Gold, so they gotta pay the ultimate price. Payout for successful completion is 3000 caps, and an evening with any of our contracted actresses of your choice. Bring their head to Stan Gold Executive Studios in New Reno. Please keep the head in a jar of formaldehyde so you don't make the studio smell like shit. Thanks!
Ari Silverman Assistant Vice-Treasurer Stan Gold Productions "Our Titties Are As Good As Gold!"
Bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 婊子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luisa you dumb fat bitch, why the fuck is there so much fucking trash on the fucking floor? Make yourself useful for once in your life and clean this shit up! If I come back and it's still that fucking filthy, I'm gonna pick you up and mop this shithole with your ugly face. Bad enough I have to use my goddamn money to support your fat ass, but you're gonna make me live in a fucking dumpster room, is that it? Take care of it, or I take care of you with a hammer and a pair of pliers, got it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 路易莎，你这个又蠢又肥的婊子，为什么他妈的地板上有这么多垃圾？让你自己在你的人生中有用一次行吗，把这狗屎清理干净！如果我回来的时候还是那么脏，我会把你抓起来，用你丑陋的脸擦这个破地方。我得用我该死的钱养活你的肥屁股已经够糟糕的了，但你还要让我住在他妈的垃圾房里，是吗？清理好它，或者我用锤子和钳子照顾你，明白吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Business Idea
ESP.TRADUIT: 商业构想

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stole a box of seeds that was going to Westside. Delivery boy was a weak bitch. Makes me think, if they need this shit for their garbage town, lets make some money. We should tell 'em that we'll help them out, recover their stolen property for a fee. They pay up, we give them the seeds, and boom. Now we're in their good graces, got us some spending money, barely had to break a sweat. Let me know what you think, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 偷了一盒要送去西区的种子。送货员是个软弱的婊子，我想如果这个垃圾镇需要这些东西，我们就赚点钱吧。我们应该告诉他们，我们会帮助他们，帮他们找回被偷的东西。他们付钱，我们给他们种子，然后就成功了。现在我们得到了他们的青睐，给了我们一些零花钱，几乎不用流汗。告诉我你的想法，好吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damaged Holotape
ESP.TRADUIT: 损坏的全息录像带

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This holotape has been badly damaged. The small portion of salvageable data shows a group of figures, all dressed in the same manner as Deacon Paulson, standing in a circle around a naked, mutilated corpse.
Some lingering navigational data places the recording location as somewhere on the east bank of the Colorado river.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这张全息录像带损坏得很严重。这一小部分可回收的数据显示了一群人，都穿着和保尔森牧师一样的衣服，围着一具被肢解的裸尸站成一圈。
一些残留的导航数据将这个记录的位置定位在科罗拉多河东岸的某处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burke Conspiracy
ESP.TRADUIT: 伯克的阴谋

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Eddie has compiled all of your research into a sprawling manifesto of accusations and conjecture.
While he starts off promising enough, tying Kevin Massey and Raya's testimonies into a single cohesive blackmail plot, his speculation on Paul Winters' role in things doesn't seem to really match any kind of realistic timeline. Nevertheless, this document would, at the very least, serve as an embarrassment to the family, and at most, would function as a clarion call for conspiracy aficionados, the paranoid and anarchistic, and anti-government types across the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT:
艾迪把你所有的研究都整理成了一份杂乱的指控和推测。
虽然他一开始很有希望，把凯文·梅西和拉娅的证词联系到一个连贯的勒索情节中，但他对保罗·温特斯在其中的角色的猜测似乎与任何现实的时间线都不相符。尽管如此，这份文件至少会让这个家族难堪，最多，会为整个NCR阴谋迷、偏执狂、无政府主义者和反政府人士吹响号角。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bury it all
ESP.TRADUIT: 埋葬这一切

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Children, our operation is compromised. Take the stock and cull them. This is not a sacrifice on the altar. Do not delay the work, for it is vital that you tie these loose ends as swiftly as you can. The site for burial will be at these coordinates. Fail me, and you will have brought great harm to Him whom we all love.
Deacon Paulson
ESP.TRADUIT:
孩子们，我们的行动受到了威胁，把存货都挑出来。这不是祭坛上的祭品，不要耽误这项工作，因为你必须尽快把这些未解决的问题解决好。埋葬地点就在这些坐标处。如果你辜负了我，你就会给我们所爱的上帝带来极大的伤害。
-保尔森执事

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reverend's Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 牧师的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The Lord helps those who help themselves. That is my great sin. I cannot be faulted for it. I'm just a man, and even Christ was not immune to mistakes. Better a slave than a savage, for them and for me.
The work I do is valuable. I save the souls of these poor wretches from an eternal torment. Surely that is worth forgiving my role in enabling the short-term suffering they experience at the hands of men like Paulson and Gold.
We are all sinners. But our savior allowed his own crucifixion to save the souls of us all, and so too must I sacrifice if I want to spread the word of God, to maintain this bastion of decency in the wastes, to keep my family away from the filth and degeneracy of the godless, licentious common man. Surely I am not at fault. I cannot be. I am as God made me.
ESP.TRADUIT:
上帝帮助自助者，这是我最大的罪过。这事不能怪我，我只是个凡人，就连基督也难免犯错。对他们和我来说，做奴隶总比做野人好。
我做的工作是有价值的，我把这些可怜人的灵魂从无尽的折磨中拯救出来。当然，这是需要原谅的，因为我让他们在保尔森和戈尔德这样的人手中经历了短期的痛苦。
我们都是罪人，但是我们的救世主允许自己受难来拯救我们的灵魂,所以我也必须牺牲，如果我想传播神的教义,在废墟中维护这个体面的堡垒,让我的家人远离污秽的、无神的、放荡的普通人的堕落，这当然不是我的错。我不可能有错，我是上帝创造的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Correspondence
ESP.TRADUIT: 通信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Correspondence Transcript One
Contact: Testing, hello?
HQ: Yes, you're on the frequency. Anyone with the proper codes will be able to hear our conversation. Go on.
C: Okay. NCR paper money. We already had a system of currency in place. Why would the NCR try to make us switch to their money?
HQ: Illuminate us.
C: Three reasons. One, indoctrination. Try to turn us into them. Two, destabilize our economy so we need their assistance. Three, I have concluded that a selection of NCR dollars are marked in such a way that our information is transmitted to their agencies via their money.
HQ: I've said it many times, people. If any of their money ends up in your hands, throw it into a fire and wash your hands with lye. I'll terminate your frequency before it can be intercepted. Thank you for making contact.
ESP.TRADUIT:
通信记录一
联系人:测试,你好吗?
总部：是的，你在这个频率上。任何有密码的人都能听到我们的对话。继续。
C:好的，关于NCR纸币。我们已经有了货币体系，NCR为什么要让我们转用他们的钱?
总部:照亮我们。
C:三个原因。第一，教化，试着把我们变成他们。第二，破坏我们的经济稳定，这样我们就需要他们的帮助。第三，我得出的结论是，NCR的一种选择是这样标记的，我们的信息通过他们的钱传递给他们的机构。
总部：我已经说过很多次了。如果他们的钱最后落到你手里，把它扔进火里，然后用碱液洗手。我会在被拦截前终止你的频率。谢谢你的联系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perfumed Letter
ESP.TRADUIT: 芳香的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I don't need us to be married. I know you love me, and you know I love you. I don't care about status or certification, as long as you and I have each other. As long as I get to be with you as often as possible. The world doesn't need to know about our love. It's enough that we have it between us, Austin. I want to see you again, dear. I'm so alone without you, that I'll give you 25% off when we see each other again, alright, darling? I miss you so much, Austin.
- Layla
ESP.TRADUIT:
我不需要结婚。我知道你爱我，你也知道我爱你。我不在乎身份和证书，只要你我心中有对方就行。只要我能经常和你在一起，不需要世人都知道我们的爱。奥斯汀，我们之间有秘密就够了。我想再见到你，亲爱的，没有你我很孤单，我们再见面时我给你七五折，好吗，亲爱的？我太想你了，奥斯汀。
- 蕾拉

Hold on, I haven't seen you before. You're not one of Dalton's people, are you?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_greeting_000295a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you should marry my sister. Think about it, you could live here, food, shelter, all that... And all you'd have to do is keep us alive forever!

ESP.ORIGINAL: But now you're here, we finally have a chance to respond to this crime. My family will be avenged, and I'll see justice done!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在你来了，我们终于有机会对这一罪行做出回应了。我会为我的家人报仇的，我将看到正义得到伸张！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back, and somehow I haven't dropped dead since last time we spoke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了，不知怎么的，自从我们上次谈话后我还没死过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_greeting_0004f641_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You went through a lot of trouble to get in here. So, persistent scavenger, or are you here for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你费了好大劲才进来，所以，你是执着的拾荒者，还是来找我的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_greeting_0004f642_1.ogg
NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Hello and welcome to Path of Light Ministries, my name is Monica, what can I do for you today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，欢迎来到光之路事工，我是莫妮卡，今天有什么可以为你效劳的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_greeting_0000593b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, welcome back. How can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，欢迎回来。我能帮你什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_greeting_0000593c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [07004FBD] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_greeting_0005cd0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to admit, I didn't think I'd be seeing you again. You cut through my entire security team, Carter included.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得承认，我没想到还能再见到你。你穿过了我的整个安全团队，包括卡特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_greeting_0005cd13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's impressive, I'll grant you. But, all you've managed to do is piss me off. Do you know what I did to the last man to piss me off?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我承认，这的确令人印象深刻。但是，你所做的就是把我惹毛了。你知道我对上一个惹我生气的人做了什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_greeting_0005cd13_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I threw him, and his buddy, into a metal shipping crate, out in the middle of the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把他和他的伙伴，扔进了一个金属运输箱里，在沙漠中央。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_greeting_0005cd13_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sealed it up tight, with just a little space for air to seep in. Suffocation was too quick. No, I let them cook and starve in that thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把它封得严严实实，只有一点空间让空气渗入。很快会窒息？不，我让他们在那里面活活饿死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_greeting_0005cd13_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you imagine? Day after day, locked in a tiny, dark, sweltering little space... It's an agonizing death. That's why I enjoy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能想象吗？日复一日，被锁在一个狭小、黑暗、闷热的空间里...多么痛苦的死亡。这就是为什么我喜欢它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_greeting_0005cd13_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is the fate of those who test my resolve. You may as well shoot yourself, because what I have planned for you is far worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是那些考验我决心的人的命运。你不妨一枪崩了自己，因为我给你准备的计划要糟糕得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_greeting_0005cd13_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
I'm destroying evidence! If you must kill me, at least make sure this room is completely purged!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在销毁证据！如果你一定要杀了我，至少要把这个房间彻底打扫干净！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deacon Paulson [070070DD] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaburkech_greeting_0005ebf7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a moment... You're not one of Brecker's... You're that courier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等会儿...你不是布瑞克的人...你是那个邮差！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deacon Paulson [070070DD] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaburkech_greeting_0005ebf7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They all want you dead. I am collateral, you're the primary target. They'd never kill the man who cut you down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都想让你死。我是附带的，你是首要目标，他们不会杀那个砍倒你的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deacon Paulson [070070DD] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaburkech_greeting_0005ebf7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Praise him, your death shall redeem me, your blood shall purify me. Die with me down here, little moth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要赞美他，你的死必救赎我，你的血必洁净我。和我一起死吧，小飞蛾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Deacon Paulson [070070DD] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaburkech_greeting_0005ebf7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Goddamn hydraulic doors. I keep telling people, just tear these things out, replace 'em with normal doors. Gotta be the third time this month...
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的液压门。我一直跟别人说，把这些东西拆了，换成普通的门。这个月已经是第三次了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Repairman [070076F9] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult04\aaaburkech_greeting_000076fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, can I help you with something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我能帮你什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_greeting_0001a8d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, hello! I'm Reverend Austin Burke, it's a pleasure to meet you. Please, have a seat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，你好！我是奥斯汀·伯克牧师，很高兴见到你。请坐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_greeting_0005147c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard a great deal about you. Seems a great many people in the Mojave owe you a debt. Now, what is it I can do for you today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 久仰大名，听说莫哈维沙漠很多人都欠你人情。那么，今天我能为您做些什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_greeting_0005147c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you again. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴再次见到你，我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_greeting_0005147d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think you're supposed to be here. If you could see yourself out, please...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你不该在这里。如果你可以自己出去的话，请...？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_greeting_0005147e_1.ogg

So, you're the oh-so-badass courier, huh? You've really screwed up this operation for us. {venomous}Thanks for that, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你就是那个可恶的邮差，对吧？ 你真的把我们的行动都搞砸了，{恶毒地}谢谢你，朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Running around Powder Gang territory, bold as you please? Not entirely sure that's wise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在炸药帮的地盘上跑来跑去，胆子够大的啊？我不确定这样做是否明智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_greeting_00001751_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That isn't a threat, mind you. I'm just saying, some of these guys are a touch unhinged. Keep your gun loaded, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 提醒你，这不是威胁。我只是说，有些人有点精神失常。把枪上膛，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_greeting_00001751_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you need something, or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你到底需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_greeting_00001751_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, no offense intended, but Powder Gang territory isn't a great place for a woman to be running around, all carefree and such.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但炸药帮的地盘可不是让女人无忧无虑到处乱跑的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_greeting_00001752_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lot of these guys haven't touched a woman since they first got locked up. Not me, mind you, but I'm charming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多人自从第一次被关起来就没有碰过女人。 注意不是我，我很迷人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_greeting_00001752_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of 'em might see you as an invitation, alls I'm saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说的是，他们中的一些人可能会把你看作是一种引诱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_greeting_00001752_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_greeting_0000175e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm on my way towards Freeside. If I can make it there without getting killed, I think I can do alright for myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在去自由城的路上，应该能够活着去到那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_greeting_0004193c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pleasure to see you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴再次见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_greeting_0004193d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, you again. Ready to surrender a small mountain of your cash over to me, in the promise of getting an even larger mountain back in the future?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，又是你。准备好把你的一小叠现金交给我，以保证将来能得到一座更大的山吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07050E65]aaazOldTopicDumpQuest) This is literally just to fix that error GECK Extender kept throwing EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Price is ten grand. Return investment is gargantuan and impressive, an aspect it has in common with my johnson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 价格是一万瓶盖，但投资回报是惊人的大，令人印象深刻，这一点与我的约翰逊有共同之处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07050E65]aaazOldTopicDumpQuest) This is literally just to fix that error GECK Extender kept throwing EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hey, buddy, over here. Yeah, you. Right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，嘿，伙计，这儿。 是的，就你，在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07050E65]aaazOldTopicDumpQuest) This is literally just to fix that error GECK Extender kept throwing EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, great. Enjoying the casino? Maybe winning big, huh? Come in here for a break, spend some of your winnings on food and drink, yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，太好了。赌场好玩吗？也许你赢了大钱，对吧？来这里休息一下，把赢来的钱花在吃喝上，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07050E65]aaazOldTopicDumpQuest) This is literally just to fix that error GECK Extender kept throwing EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I see a person in a casino, I figure they must like making money, huh? Well, maybe not Gomorrah, in which case probably just like naked folks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此时此刻，赌场里有一个人，我想他们一定喜欢赚钱吧？好吧，也许他们不是蛾摩拉那群裸男裸女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07050E65]aaazOldTopicDumpQuest) This is literally just to fix that error GECK Extender kept throwing EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, my original point: Money. Happens that I can make you and me rich, right? Partners style. How's that sound?
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我的出发点是：钱。碰巧我能让你我发财，对吧？合作伙伴的关系，听起来怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([07050E65]aaazOldTopicDumpQuest) This is literally just to fix that error GECK Extender kept throwing EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Targets eliminated.

ESP.ORIGINAL: CombatToLost
You think running will save you? Heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为逃跑就有救？呵呵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_combattolost_00030739_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking coward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈的懦夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_combattolost_00030738_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run, hide, beg... Nothing will save you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跑吧，躲吧，求我吧...什么也救不了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_combattolost_0003073a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can smell your fear...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能闻到你的恐惧...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_combattolost_0003073b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: LostToNormal
You'll never escape me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你永远逃不出我的手掌心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_losttonormal_00030750_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My face will be the last thing you ever see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的脸将是你最后见到的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_losttonormal_00030751_1.ogg
NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Pathetic.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_losttonormal_00030753_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: LostToCombat
Nobody can hide from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有人能躲得过我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_losttocombat_0003074b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This may hurt more than you expected. Price of wasting my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能比你想象的要痛苦，这就是浪费我时间的代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_losttocombat_0003074c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Ominous chuckle)
ESP.TRADUIT: (不祥的笑)
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_losttocombat_0003074d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always kill my targets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁也无法逃出我的手掌心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_losttocombat_0003074e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, let's continue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我们继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_losttocombat_0003074f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: AlertIdle
Don't get distracted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要分心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_alertidle_0003072f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Show yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我出来
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_alertidle_00030730_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're not alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿有别人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_alertidle_00030731_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: LostIdle
They think they can hide from death. Cute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们认为自己可以躲避死亡，真可爱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_lostidle_00030742_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh. Craven.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，胆小鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_lostidle_00030746_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can make your end quick and painless. If I have to search for you... I won't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以让你死得痛快点。如果要我去找你...我不会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_lostidle_00030747_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't leave survivors. May as well stop wasting time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会留下幸存者，还是别浪费时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_lostidle_00030748_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There aren't many things I care enough to hate... But cowards are one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从在乎到憎恨的东西并不多...但懦夫就是其中之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_lostidle_00030749_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make me search much longer, and I'll pay your family a visit. Free of charge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我再找一段时间，找不到你我就去拜访你的家人，不收你钱
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_lostidle_0003074a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: DeathResponse
Heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_deathresponse_0002fb10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wherever you're going, I've ensured you won't want for company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你要去哪里，我保证你不会想要有人作伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_deathresponse_0002fb11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这等着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had to wait three days for a target to walk by his window, once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次，我在一个房间里面等我的目标从窗外经过，等了3天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerswait_00036248_1.ogg

Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerswait_00036249_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.Waiting to 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.evp
If you say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerswait_0003624a_1.ogg

Let's trade equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们交易装备吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstrade_00036242_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer 1
If you'd like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstrade_00036243_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer 1
I think I have everything I need, but, very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我已经有我想知道的了，不过...就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstrade_00036244_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer 1
Enough about tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不说战术了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036241_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I make most of my kills at a distance anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正我大部分的杀戮都是远距离进行的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003623f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.evp
Simple enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036240_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.evp
All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003623e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的距离不错。让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't aware I was such a riveting conversationalist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都没意识到自己是个如此引人入胜的健谈者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003623d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not much for wandering anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正我也不太喜欢闲逛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003623b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.evp
I'll keep close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会靠近你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003623c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.evp
Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: At your discretion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 悉听尊便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003623a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to use ranged weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That would be my preference, as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这也是我的拿手好戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036237_1.ogg

Blades are well and good, but I prefer to kill efficiently, all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比起刀光剑影，我还是喜欢一发入魂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036238_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCompanionREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.additem aaaCharlieNPCRifle 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.removeitem aaaCharlieNPCSword 1
Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036239_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCompanionREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.additem aaaCharlieNPCRifle 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.removeitem aaaCharlieNPCSword 1
...I'm... Already using a gun, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我...已经用枪了，谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00071f6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switch to a melee weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切换到近战武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simple enough. I'm quite handy with a blade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很简单，我很会用刀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036231_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCompanionREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.CombatStyleRanged to 0 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.removeitem aaaCharlieNPCRifle 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.additem aaaCharlieNPCSword 1
If that's your preference, I can adapt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你喜欢的话，我尽量适应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036232_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCompanionREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.CombatStyleRanged to 0 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.removeitem aaaCharlieNPCRifle 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.additem aaaCharlieNPCSword 1
I'd be a poor assassin if I could only use a gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我只会用枪的话，那我就是个只会搞偷袭的鸡贼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036233_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCompanionREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.CombatStyleRanged to 0 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.removeitem aaaCharlieNPCRifle 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.additem aaaCharlieNPCSword 1
I'm... already using one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...已经在用了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00071f6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can speak for as long as you'd like, though I'm not sure why you would want to speak with me for so long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想聊多久我们就聊多久，不过我不知道你为什么想和我聊这么久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003622f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all. Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036230_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to change your combat style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That can be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那办得到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003622b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about your tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈谈你的战术吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll find I'm quite adaptable. What would you like to discuss?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会发现我的适应能力很强，你想谈点什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003622a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你先请。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersletsgo_00036225_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.evp
Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersletsgo_00036226_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.evp
It's time for us to part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们该分道扬镳了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you certain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersfired_00036219_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should travel together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们应该同行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm at your command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听你的指挥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followershired_0003621d_1.ogg

Player.addperk aaaCharlieCompanionPerk ShowMessage aaaCharlieGotPerkMessage
On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersfiredn_0003621a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, it's easier to keep you alive if I'm nearby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，只要我在你身旁，你就能活得更久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersfiredn_0003621e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't play with my emotions like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别那样玩弄我的感情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersfiredn_0003621f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我确定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. I'll likely be at my Freeside safehouse, if you require my services again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。如果你还需要我帮忙，我可能会在我的自由城安全屋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersfiredy_0003621b_1.ogg

Hmm. I'll be waiting at my Freeside safehouse, in that case. You won't have me waiting for too long, I hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，那样的话，我会在我自由城的安全屋等你。希望你不会让我等太久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersfiredy_00036220_1.ogg

If anyone recognizes the utility of solo ops, it's me. I'll be at my safehouse in Freeside, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有我才懂得独狼的好处。我会待在自由城的安全屋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersfiredy_00036221_1.ogg

I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036234_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0
Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036235_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0
I'm not an impatient killer. I can wait as long as is necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一名杀手需要耐心，等多久我都可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_00036236_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0
I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simple enough. They'll all die, one way or another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很简单，无论如何他们都会死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003622c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1
That's what I do best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可是我的拿手好戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003622d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1
Killing them before they even know I'm there is my stock and trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不知道自己怎么死的，就是我的交易筹码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followerstactic_0003622e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaCharlieCompanionREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1
I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interesting... Very well, I'll be there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣...很好，我会去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersfiredy_0003621c_1.ogg

Well, it won't be overly difficult to find my way there, at least. I'll be waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，至少找到你不会太难，我会等的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersfiredy_00036223_1.ogg

It lacks subtlety, but I'll concede that it's very defensible. I'll be waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待有点无聊，但我知道有时候等待是必须的。我可以等。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersfiredy_00036224_1.ogg

HealthQuarter

ESP.ORIGINAL: HealthHalf
Seems I'm really taking my time with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我真的花了很多时间陪你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_healthhalf_00030763_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not impressed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_healthhalf_00030764_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some stims would be appreciated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来点兴奋剂，不胜感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_healthhalf_00070180_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wake
ESP.TRADUIT: 醒来

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is why I prefer stealth killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么我更喜欢秘密杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_wake_00030773_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems I made a mistake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我犯了个错误。
