ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_wake_00030774_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was careless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太粗心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_wake_00030775_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's wrong with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_wake_00030776_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you complete the mission?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你完成任务了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_wake_0003381c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ArmorIneffective
So you drew some blood. You're hardly the first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你还多了几点血， 但不足为奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_armorineffectiv_0002fb0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WeaponIneffective
I don't owe you a quick death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不欠你一个痛快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_weaponineffecti_0003077a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I actually considered you a threat, you'd already be dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我真的认为你是个威胁，你早就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_weaponineffecti_0003077b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you'll suffer before you die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你会死得很痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_weaponineffecti_0003077c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're just prolonging your own suffering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是在延长自己的痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_weaponineffecti_0003077d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: WeaponBroke
My weapon broke. Is this what grief feels like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的武器坏了，这就是悲伤的感觉吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_weaponbroke_00030777_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shoddy equipment. Don't know why I bother...
ESP.TRADUIT: 劣质装备，别说不知道为什么我很烦...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_weaponbroke_00030778_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing I have a spare. Several, in fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还好我有备用的，准确来说有好几个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_weaponbroke_00030779_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NoAmmo
That was the last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是最后一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_noammo_0003076b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As if that's my only method of killing. Heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像这是我唯一的杀人方法，哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_noammo_0003076c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switching weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切换武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_noammo_0003381b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: UsedDoctorBag
I know how to take a body apart, seems I can put it back together, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道如何肢解尸体，似乎我也知道怎么把我的骨头归位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_useddoctorbag_00030770_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know someone who's going to need this more than me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人比我更需要这个...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_useddoctorbag_00030771_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First aid, my true calling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 医疗包，我真正想要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_useddoctorbag_00030772_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crippled
ESP.TRADUIT: 残废

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slowing me down will only make your death more agonizing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拖住我的步伐，只会让你死得更痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_crippled_0002fb0f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: May have a new scar. Lucky me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能又有新的伤疤了，我真幸运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_crippled_00030761_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's been broken before. I lived... You won't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前也被打断过手脚，但我还活着...你会相反。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_crippled_0003381a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regenerating
ESP.TRADUIT: 治愈中

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a bit better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好一点了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_regenerating_0003076d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_regenerating_0003076e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, syringes, my old friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，治疗针，我的老朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_regenerating_0003076f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: FollowersOverburdened
You realize I'm an assassin, not a pack animal, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我是个杀手，不是群居动物，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersoverbu_00036245_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be ridiculous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别扯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersoverbu_00036246_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To be clear, I'm here to kill your enemies, not cart your junk collection around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 澄清一下，我是来杀你的敌人的，不是来帮你运垃圾的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersoverbu_00036247_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: FollowersStealthing
Hmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersstealt_00036227_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In my element.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersstealt_00036228_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_followersstealt_00036229_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyWarnThanks
Not a problem. So, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是问题，那么我能为您做点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywarnth_00001754_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for the warning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的提醒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyWarnTough
I don't doubt it. All the same, there's something to be said for avoiding danger all together, when it can be helped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我非常确信。尽管如此，还是要在趁没遇到危险的时候说一些能一起规避危险的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywarnto_00001756_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your ass, literally, that's all. Anyway, you need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的私事，真的，仅此而已。无论如何，你需要什么吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywarnto_00001756_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can handle myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能控制自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyWarnTerrify
You know what? I think you're fine without my warnings. I'll reserve my pity for anyone that gets in your way, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗?我觉得没有我的警告你也没啥事，我还觉得我应该对任何妨碍你的人表示同情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywarnte_00001758_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, with the understanding that I have no intentions of provoking you, uh, is there anything you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你知道我激怒你是无意的了，你还有什么需要知道的吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywarnte_00001758_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're free to try, and I'm free to mount their head on a pike if they do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可以试试，但如果他们这么做，我也可以把他们的头挂在长矛上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyWhyHere
'Cause I've got more than two brain cells to rub together, unlike Eddie and his boys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我可不是单细胞生物，不像艾迪和他的手下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhyher_0000175a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just because the NCR hasn't wiped that place off the map yet doesn't mean they won't later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也因为NCR还没把那地方收回，但那不代表以后也不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhyher_0000175a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When that happens, I don't intend to get my ass caught in the crossfire, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 倘若这种情况发生，我可不想卷入交火中，你懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhyher_0000175a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you hanging out here, instead of back at the prison?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么待在这里，而不是回惩戒所？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You serious? I had that place pegged as a deathtrap as soon as the riot was over. I told 'em, y'know, get out while you still can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认真的吗？暴乱一结束，我就把那个地方当作危险的地方。我告诉过他们，趁现在还能出去，赶紧走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhyher_0000175b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I've been proven right, and you think I should waltz back on over there? I'd rather not, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在证明我是对的了，你觉得我应该回到那里去吗?我不想，谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhyher_0000175b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you hanging out here, instead of back at the prison?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么待在这里，而不是回惩戒所？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyWhyChill
Am I a Powder Ganger, though? Sure, I'm an escaped con, I got this nifty prison shirt on, and some dynamite in my pocket, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，我是炸药帮吗？当然是，我是个逃犯，穿着漂亮的囚衣，口袋里塞着炸药，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhychi_0000175d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, I'm not interested in robbing people, or blowing people up, or any of that other shit. So, I'm not sure I am a Powder Ganger, not really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，我对打劫，炸人，或其他的事不感兴趣。所以，我不是炸药帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhychi_0000175d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem pretty relaxed, for a Powder Ganger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个炸药帮，你看起来很独树一帜啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyPrisonPop
Well, to be fair, overpopulation was the second biggest cause of the riot in the first place. The biggest was that we had dynamite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 客观地说，人口过正剩是暴乱的原因之一，而第一大原因是我们有炸药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyprison_00001760_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, yeah, you're not wrong. Thing is, random wasteland toughs are drifting in and joining up, even though they haven't done any time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，对，你没有错。问题是，外界的废土恶棍正在涌入并加入我们，尽管他们从来没有这么热情过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyprison_00001760_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They see it as indistinguishable from any other gang, and they're not exactly wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们认为这和其他帮派没什么区别，也没有完全错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyprison_00001760_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like how the Khans used to be a contingent of angry vaulters, but over time, new blood joined, founding members died, now it's something new.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像大汗帮曾经是一群愤怒的避难所居民，但随着时间的推移，新的血液加入，创始成员死亡，现在有了新的样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyprison_00001760_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give it enough time, Powder Gang will stop being escaped cons, and it'll turn into a big gang that likes bombs and the color blue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要有足够的时间，炸药帮就不会再是逃犯了，它会变成一个喜欢炸弹和蓝色衣服的大帮派。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyprison_00001760_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that they'll last that long. They're poorly armed, surrounded by enemies on all sides, and no real unification. Oh well, they won't be missed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他们坚持不了那么久。他们装备简陋，四面被敌人包围，内部从来没有真正的联合过，好吧，他们会遭受重创的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyprison_00001760_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCRCF wasn't that big, but it seems like there's no shortage of Powder Gangers. What's up with that?
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR惩戒并没有那么大，但似乎炸药帮又很多。这是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyBackground
Ah, well, that's not a story that reflects especially well on me, you understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个故事对我的风评不太好，你明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseybackgr_00001762_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not in the sense that I'm some kinda dangerous lunatic, but, well, it's stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不是说我是个疯子，但是...好吧，这件事很愚蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseybackgr_00001762_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I was seeing this girl, right? And she was... Hmm, how to put this delicately...? "Accustomed to a certain level of affluence in her life."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在和一个女孩约会，，她...嗯，怎么委婉地说..."已经习惯了一定程度的富裕生活"？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseybackgr_00001762_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to keep her around, so to finance her preferred lifestyle, I may have, you know, sold things that I had no right to, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让她留在我身边，所以为了资助她喜欢的生活方式，我可能会，你懂的，卖掉一些我无权处理的东西，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseybackgr_00001762_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when someone noticed they were bereft of their earthly possessions, they pointed out "Hey, Massey suddenly has a lot of cash for a dirt farmer".
ESP.TRADUIT: 当有人注意到他们失去了尘世的财产时，他们指出:“嘿，梅西这个土农民突然有了一大笔钱。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseybackgr_00001762_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Told you, it was stupid and makes me look bad. Still, I'd rather look like an idiot than a psychopath like my cellmate, Darby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟你说了，这很蠢，让我很难堪。不过，我宁愿看起来像个白痴也不愿像我的狱友达比那样像个神经病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseybackgr_00001762_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what were you in jail for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你为什么进惩戒所？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyWhoDarby
He shouldn't have even been in prison. Seems to me that the noose was invented for men like him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他根本就不该进监狱，在我看来，让他死十次都少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhodar_00001764_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was locked up for murdering his family. I know this, because he liked to brag about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他因谋杀自己的家人而被关了起来，我知道的一清二楚，因为他还因此沾沾自喜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhodar_00001764_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He talked about how he beat his son to death with a length of pipe, same way normal people would talk about the goddamn weather.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他是如何用一根管子把他儿子打死的，语气就像普通人谈论日常天气一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhodar_00001764_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One night, no reason at all, he just stares me down. Says: "Want to know something funny? I know where he lives, the sheriff that caught me."
ESP.TRADUIT: 一天晚上，没有任何理由，他盯着我看，说:“想知道有趣的事吗？我知道抓到我的那个警长住在哪儿。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhodar_00001764_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't much like the notion that he's alive out there, but I figure he must be. Took off with a little gang and headed west.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太喜欢他还活着的说法，但我想他肯定还活着，和一群人一起往西走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseywhodar_00001764_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about this cellmate of yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说你的狱友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBreckerWhyHere
I'm chief of security around here. Someone has to keep raiders out of here, and that's me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是这里的安全主管，总得有人阻止掠夺者进入这里，那个人就是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [07004FBD] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_aaabreckerwhyhe_00004fc3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd think the reverend would rely on God for protection. Instead, he asked me. That should tell you all you need to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会以为牧师依靠上帝的保护，相反，他恳求我。你该知道的都知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [07004FBD] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMonicaQuestionTree
I would be happy to answer however I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意回答所有我能回答的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaquesti_0000593e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些问题要问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMonicaMinistries
Well, what you're looking at right now is only the New Vegas branch of our organization. It was only established in '78, you see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在看到的只是我们组织在新维加斯的分部。它78年才成立。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaminist_00005940_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our organization was founded to assist orphans and refugees with nowhere else to go, to assist and empower communities in both body and spirit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的组织成立是为了帮助无家可归的孤儿和难民，在身体和精神上帮助和增强社会的力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaminist_00005940_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We do a lot of outreach to poorer areas, where people may not have access to all the amenities of Shady Sands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们向贫困地区提供了很多服务，那里的人们可能无法享受到沙荫镇的所有便利设施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaminist_00005940_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While we do coordinate some charitable efforts alongside the Followers of the Apocalypse, we make an effort to go on our own path.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我们和“天启追随者”一起举办一些慈善活动，但我们也在努力走自己的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaminist_00005940_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers do good work, but they tend to focus on science and medicine. We think it is vital to provide evangelical alternatives, when possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天气追随者做了很好的工作，但他们倾向于关注科学和医学。我们认为，在可能的情况下，向废土提供福音式的帮助是最主要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaminist_00005940_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Path of Light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说光之路吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMonicaMinistryBackground
The organization was founded by the Reverend Austin Burke, back in California in 2250.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个组织是由奥斯汀·伯克牧师于2250年在加州建立的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaminist_0000594e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Burkes have always been a very wealthy and influential family, back West. The Reverend chose to put his resources forward to help his community.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伯克家族在西部一直是一个富裕而有影响力的家族。牧师选择用他的资源来帮助他的社区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaminist_0000594e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His cousin is actually a member of the Senate, though we try to leave politics to the politicians.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我们试图把政治留给政客们，但他的表弟是参议院的一员，没法彻底分割。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaminist_0000594e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After hearing about the plight facing the poor people of the Mojave, Reverend Burke wasted no time in establishing this branch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在听说了莫哈维沙漠的穷人所面临的困境后，伯克牧师立即建立了这个分部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaminist_0000594e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He has made it very clear that he will stay on as the administrator for this region, until it is fully integrated into the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他明确表示，他将继续担任这一地区的管理员，直到该地区完全纳入国家重建计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaminist_0000594e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did the ministry come about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个组织是怎么产生的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMonicaWhoAreYou
I'm Monica Nelson. I've been with the program for most of my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是莫妮卡·纳尔逊，我大半辈子都献给了这个项目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicawhoare_00005950_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ministries make it a priority to take in orphans, like myself, and provide food, safety, and education.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个事工把收容孤儿，比如我，作为优先事项，并提供食物、安全和教育。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicawhoare_00005950_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could have left after I graduated, but I felt I owed them a debt, so I stayed on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本可以在毕业后离开，但我觉得欠他们一份情，所以我留下来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicawhoare_00005950_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the Mojave in the state that it is, it needs all the help we can give. I'm very proud to be a part of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于莫哈韦沙漠现在的状况，它需要我们的全力帮助，我很自豪能成为其中的一员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicawhoare_00005950_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And who, exactly, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而你到底是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMonicaSpeakToRev
I'm sorry, I'm afraid he's quite busy at the moment. If you'd like to try again later, he may or may not be available.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，恐怕他现在很忙。如果你想稍后再来，他可能有空也可能没空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaspeakt_00005952_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaaRevGoAwayWarning
I need to speak with Reverend Burke. It's important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要和伯克牧师谈谈，这很重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: One moment, let me see if he's available.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，我看看他在不在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaspeakt_0005147b_1.ogg
NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, he's available at the moment. I'll unlock the door for you. You can find him in his office, in the door to my left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以，他现在有时间，我来给你开门。你可以在他的办公室里找到他，就在我左边的房间里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaspeakt_0005147b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaReverendDoorREF.unlock
I need to speak with Reverend Burke. It's important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要和伯克牧师谈谈，这很重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMonicaSenBurke
Ahh, you're referring to that business with the senator's son, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你指的是参议员儿子的事，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicasenbur_00005956_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was very... unfortunate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这件事非常...严重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicasenbur_00005956_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, that had nothing to do with our ministries, or really any part of the Burke family, beyond Adam himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，这件事和我们的教会没有关系，也和伯克家族除亚当外的成员没有关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicasenbur_00005956_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not really fair to the Reverend, and his history of philanthropy should speak for itself. Was there anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也不应该猜忌牧师与此事有关，他的慈善历史应该是不言而喻的。还有别的事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicasenbur_00005956_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Burke family has been in the news lately. Don't suppose the Reverend has any insight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 伯克一家最近上了新闻，我猜牧师不会有什么了解吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillWhoYou
Name's Ryan. O'Neill. I'm with the Westside militia, if the fact that I'm defending their perimeter wasn't clear enough about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我名字叫瑞恩·奥尼尔，我是西区民兵，如果你还不懂的话，简而言之，我守卫西区防线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillwhoyou_00011a8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGerryWhoAreYou
Me? Why, I'm the funniest man in Westside. Everyone looks at me, they see a funny joke and they just laugh and fucking laugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我吗？我是西区最有趣的人。每个人看着我，就好像看到一个好笑的笑话，就他妈的笑个不停。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrywhoarey_000181d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, ask my wife. She married me for a laugh, and she sucks fat cocks for a handful of caps. What a fucking inspiration.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，问问我老婆，她嫁给我就是为了搞笑，她吮我的大鸡巴就是为了几个瓶盖。真他妈的令我舒心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrywhoarey_000181d3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can do magic, too. Gimme booze and I'll make that shit disappear in an instant, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还会变魔术。给我酒，我马上就能让那玩意消失，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrywhoarey_000181d3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGerryDeadBoy
{blistering sarcasm}Of course I don't mind you asking. Why, I'm only here to relive my horrible past for the amusement of you wretched cunts.
ESP.TRADUIT: {尖锐的讽刺}我当然不介意你问。让我回忆那可怕的过去，顺便让你们这群可怜的娘们乐一乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrydeadboy_00018dd6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told him a thousand times, don't go past the goddamn wall without supervision. So what does he do as soon as he gets the chance? Of fucking course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟他说过一千遍了，没人陪伴他就不要单独出城，但他一有机会怎么做？他妈的当然出去就死啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrydeadboy_00018dd6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not like he was the first kid to get shot to shit by Fiends. And his fucking bitch of a mother...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他又不是第一个被恶魔帮开枪打死的孩子，紧着着就是他那该死的婊子妈妈...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrydeadboy_00018dd6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She fucking blamed me, said it was all my fucking fault and that was reason enough to leave me. She was just looking for an excuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她他妈的怪我，说这都是我的错，说这就是离开我的理由：她只是想找个借口罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrydeadboy_00018dd6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was selling her bony ass to anyone with two caps to scrape together. Sure, blame me for what happened. At least I was fucking there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她把自己骨瘦如柴的屁股卖给任何一个有两个瓶盖的人。当然，发生的事怪我，至少我人当时还在那。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrydeadboy_00018dd6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where was she when our firstborn was getting murdered, huh? Sucking cock for cash. But I'm the only one at fault, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的第一个孩子被杀的时候她在哪里？吮鸡巴赚钱，但只有我一个人有错，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrydeadboy_00018dd6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, fuck her, fuck her fucking clients, fuck this goddamn shithole slum of a fucking town, fuck the Fiends, fuck their victims, and fuck you too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，操她妈的，操她妈的客户，操她妈的贫民窟小镇，操她妈的恶魔帮，操她妈的受害者，还有你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrydeadboy_00018dd6_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get the fuck out of my face, and don't ever fucking ask me about this shit again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在给我滚远点，也别他妈再问我这事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrydeadboy_00018dd6_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to your son, if you don't mind my asking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意我问的话，你儿子怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGerryYouDick
What, is that supposed to slap me back into giving a fuck? Like I've been dazed and confused this whole time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，你是想让我再回心转意吗？好像我一直都很迷茫很困惑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryyoudick_000181d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what I am, motherfucker. I'm wide fucking awake. See, I'm a drunken fucking degenerate. I was a shit dad and a shit husband.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我是什么，操你妈的。我他妈完全清醒，看，我他妈是个堕落的酒鬼，我是个糟糕的父亲和丈夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryyoudick_000181d7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jessie's brother is dead, her mother is a fucking whore, her hometown is a gutter where all the junkies, sluts, slavers, and psychos accumulate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰西的哥哥死了，她母亲是个婊子，她的家乡是个阴沟，里面都是瘾君子，荡妇，奴隶贩子和疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryyoudick_000181d7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The world is ugly and cruel. Every day, I wake up and pray to god that this one will be the last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个世界就是这么丑陋和残酷。每天醒来，我都会向上帝祈祷这将是最后一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryyoudick_000181d7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and Ryan and your type... You stand there on the edge, staring at the worst shit that life has to offer, and you tell yourself "it's not so bad."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和瑞恩，还有你们这类人...你们站在悬崖边上，看着生活中最糟糕的事，然后告诉自己"没那么糟"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryyoudick_000181d7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So don't fucking ask me what my problem is, when you're the motherfucker deluding yourself about how things are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以别他妈问我有什么问题，操你妈的你在自欺欺人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryyoudick_000181d7_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your problem? This is your daughter we're talking about, and you don't give a shit about her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么问题？我们说的可是你女儿，而你根本不在乎她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGerryWhatDo
I drink as much as I can, I get in fights, sometimes I manage to scrounge up enough to get a cheap hooker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要在这里喝得酩酊大醉，跟人打架，有时还去找个便宜的妓女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrywhatdo_000181d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it. Maybe you're all special enough to have things worth noting in your life, but me, I got fuckall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样，也许你们都很特别，都拥有生命中值得注意的东西，但我，我他妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrywhatdo_000181d4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what do you do around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你在这做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGerryMilitia
Not once in my entire fucking life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的一辈子都没有考虑过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrymilitia_0001f097_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the fuck would I ever volunteer to help defend these fucking ungrateful rat-bastards?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的为什么要自告奋勇去保护这些忘恩负义的混蛋？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrymilitia_0001f097_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In case you haven't noticed, I fucking hate this place, and I fucking hate these people. Fuck 'em all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能没注意到，我恨死这地方了，恨死这些人了，操他们所有人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrymilitia_0001f097_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever considered joining the militia?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你考虑过加入民兵吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGerryWestside
aaaWintersWorstCase
Easy. I've killed a lot of human garbage in my day, so when you get one name that stands out above all the rest, it'll stick with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好说，我这辈子杀过很多人渣，所以当你渣到别人给你安称号时，你估计就难逃一死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: This was about 40 years back. Got a contract on some asshole named Warren. Outlaw ringleader, the usual type of scumbag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是40年前的事了。我接了一个叫沃伦的混蛋的赏金，一个逃犯头目，典型的卑鄙小人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good place to start looking is home, so I head to his place, find his wife. But she don't wanna open the door and let me in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 寻找他们的好地方一般是他们的家，所以我去他家，找到了他的妻子。但她不想开门让我进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, easy enough, I figure. She's sheltering his ass. So, I kick in the door, bitch gets thrown off her feet, whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: OK，我觉得很正常，她肯定在掩护他，所以我一踹门，那婊子的脚就被撞瘸了，管他呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: That house... It was all cages and cells. Turns out Warren's stint as a fugitive involved cutting his wife off. No more cash, no more support.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那栋房子...那里全是笼子和牢房。原来沃伦在逃亡期间切断了他妻子的经济来源，没有钱，没有任何支援。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, she gets the brilliant idea to turn into a real humanitarian. Started offering room and board to refugees, orphans, addicts... Anyone weak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，她想出了成为一个真正的人道主义者的好主意。开始为难民、孤儿、瘾君子和弱者提供食宿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: This evil cunt started a slaving ring the second her man stopped funding her ass. And she seemed... proud. Like it was real quick thinking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个邪恶的女人在她的男人停止资助她的时候就开始圈养奴隶，她为此感到骄傲，因为这样显得她思维敏捷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I disemboweled that evil bitch right then and there, then I sat on the couch and watched her bleed out, just to be sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当场就把那个婊子的内脏掏了出来，然后坐在沙发上看着她流血而死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, there you go. Worst person I ever dealt with, and she weren't even my target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这就是我遇到过的最坏的人，她本来连我的目标都不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's the worst person you ever took on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过的最坏的人是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWinters
Oh, yeah, eventually. He was cowering up near Mesquite. Had us a nice little Mexican standoff, 'til I told him what his bitch wife did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，对，最后他蜷缩在梅斯基特山附近，我们在墨西哥僵持了很长时间，直到我告诉他他那婊子老婆干了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was stunned, guess he still had an ounce of humanity, so that news pretty much broke his spirit right there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很震惊，我估计他还有一点人性，所以这个消息几乎让他的精神崩溃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: He put his gun down, and I (euphemism for killing) fulfilled my contract, and that was the end of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他放下了枪，我履行了我的合同(杀人的委婉说法)，事情就这样结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you ever catch up to Warren?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你追上沃伦了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersBackQuestions
Okay, shoot.
ESP.TRADUIT: OK，说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些其他的疑问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersKillinMen
Men specific, or are you generalizing? Either way, it's a damn high number.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是问男性，还是男女？不管怎样都是个很大的数字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawinterskilli_0000fc90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More men than women, for sure. Although, the gap between those two numbers is narrower than you might expect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 男人肯定比女人多，但或许这两个数字之间的差距比你想象的要小。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawinterskilli_0000fc90_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite how many of 'em are rapers, seems like most outlaw bands aren't too discriminatory with their hiring policies. Weird, but whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多犯罪分子是强奸犯，但似乎大多数不法团伙在招募人员上并没有什么男女歧视。这很奇怪,但是无所谓了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawinterskilli_0000fc90_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As to your original question... Fuck if I know. Number's too high to keep track of, and that was before my decrepit ass started going senile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于你最初的问题...我才不知道呢。数字太大了，我根本记不住，而且那是在我这老骨头开始衰老之前的事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawinterskilli_0000fc90_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many men have you killed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了多少人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersAboutAlquist
Shit, I got him into this business. Taught him how to operate, didn't I? I was in my prime and he was just getting started, so he wanted advice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，是我把他带进这行的，是我教他怎么干活。我当时正处于巅峰，而他刚刚起步，所以他需要建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_0001028a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a bit arrogant. Always smirking, like he knew something we didn't. Still, boy was a natural shootist, and pretty good with a blade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有点傲慢，总是傻笑，好像他知道什么我们不知道的事。不过他是个天生的枪手，刀法也很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_0001028a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He always had a bit of ice in his blood, I recall. Some folks would go out of their way to bring their targets alive. Caleb would only ask once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得他有点冷血，有的人会想方设法让自己的目标活着回来，但凯莱布只会试一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_0001028a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't too surprised with the direction he went, after what happened to him. Everyone has a breaking point, and he wasn't the suicidal type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但发生了那件事之后，他的反应并不奇怪。每个人都有崩溃的时候，而且他也不是那种会自杀的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_0001028a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Alquist?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于阿尔奎斯特，你知道些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersAlquistBackground
He had a wife; Jenny. Real pretty girl, big brown eyes. Quick, too. She was about as sharp as they come, was easy to see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妻子叫珍妮，很漂亮的女孩，有一双棕色的大眼睛，她的头脑也很敏锐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersalqui_0001028c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before too long, they had a daughter, too. Problem was, well... Like I said, he was arrogant. He liked to show Jenny off, flaunt how good he had it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没过多久，他们有了一个女儿。问题是,嗯...我说过，他很傲慢，他喜欢炫耀珍妮，炫耀自己过得有多好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersalqui_0001028c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You get yourself into the murder-for-hire trade, eventually someone will come looking for payback, as Caleb learned to his sorrow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干的是雇佣杀人的行当，最终会有人来找你报仇，凯莱布对这个道理领悟得很透彻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersalqui_0001028c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A couple slavers he made destitute came calling. Shot up his home. He didn't get hit, but Jenny died in his arms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两个被他弄得穷困潦倒的奴隶贩子来了，在他家开枪，他没有被击中，但珍妮死在了他的怀里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersalqui_0001028c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He buried her, then he buried the slavers. Then he said he was in no position to raise a kid, gave his girl to his brother, after I refused.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他先是埋葬了她，然后又埋葬了奴隶贩子。然后他说他没有资格抚养孩子，要我养，在我拒绝后，他把女儿交给了他弟弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersalqui_0001028c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that, I stopped seeing him around much. Got himself a reputation for taking high-risk jobs with ruthless efficiency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那之后，我就很少见他了。听说他以无情的性格从事高风险工作而闻名。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersalqui_0001028c_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that shit that went down in Brighton shocked quite a few people, but I saw the writing on the wall pretty much as soon as Jenny died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道布莱顿发生的那件事震惊了不少人，但其实在珍妮死的时候我就看到了不祥的预兆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersalqui_0001028c_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean? What happened to Alquist?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么意思？阿尔奎斯特怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersEllieAlquist
Eh, he said he didn't want her to be hurt by his work, like her ma was. Said he was nothing more than a killer, weren't fit to raise that girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他不想让她像她妈妈一样因为自己工作受到伤害。他还说自己只是个杀手，不配抚养那个女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersellie_0001028e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure he'd still say so if you asked him, but I think keeping her around hurt him too much. She was a constant reminder of his loss, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢说如果你问他，他还是会这么说，但我觉得把她留在他身边对他而言太伤害，这会不断地提醒着他曾失去过什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersellie_0001028e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, that poor girl was the spitting image of her mother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个可怜的女孩跟她妈妈长得一模一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersellie_0001028e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did Alquist abandon his daughter like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么阿尔奎斯特会那样抛弃他的女儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersAboutTully
Joe? He was an odd one, I'll say that much. Too mercurial to be a professional, and too good at his job to be anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乔？他是个怪人，我要说的是，他太善变了，不适合做专业人士，他的本职工作也太出色了，不适合做其他任何事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_00010888_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man sure was angry, that's for sure. He could break the bank at every casino on the Strip, and still find something to be irritable about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很易怒，这是毋庸置疑的。他可以在赌城区的每一个赌场玩得倾家荡产，却还是能找到让他恼火的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_00010888_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I heard, he was trying to set up his own business. Offered me a place, but I told him, I'm closer to 80 than 70. My killing days are done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，他想自己创业，给了我一个岗位，但我告诉他，我接近80岁而不是60岁。我杀人的日子结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_00010888_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Tully?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于塔利，你知道些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersHeadhuntingTopic
Could do worse for yourself, I'd reckon. Joe never struck me as the greedy sort. I figure he'd pay a fair wage for a job well done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这对你更不利。乔不是贪婪的人，我想他会按照工作表现支付合理的工资。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersheadh_0001088a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've actually done some headhunting for Tully.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为塔利做过猎头工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillHowsWestside
About as well as can be expected, given the circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这种情况下，差不多和预期的一样好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillhowswe_00011a8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is to say, not good. Too many ravening lunatics outside our wall, and too few of us to hold them off forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也就是说，并不好。在我们的墙外有太多疯狂的疯子，而我们人太少，无法永远阻挡他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillhowswe_00011a8f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are things in Westside at the moment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 西区现在怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could be worse. Actually, way I hear it, you're the one behind that. I understand you cleared Maddie's little hit list. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能会更糟。事实上，据我所知，你才是幕后“黑手”。我知道你清除了麦迪的暗杀名单，干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillhowswe_00011a90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Granted, it was only three people. Objectively it might not make much difference, but trust me, morale is higher with wins like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，只有三个人。客观来说，这可能不会有太大的区别，但相信我，这样的成果能鼓舞士气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillhowswe_00011a90_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are things in Westside at the moment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 西区现在怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillOfferHelp
Well, now you're in for it. Best get ready to work yourself into an early grave, because there's a mountain of shit that needs to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这下你可倒霉了。你最好准备好早点进坟墓，因为还有一堆狗屁事要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillofferh_00011a92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's start off with something simple. Some Scorpion prick managed to waylay a courier that was supposed to bring us a crate of seeds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们从一些简单的东西开始，有个屌毛蝎子拦下了一个给我们送种子的邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillofferh_00011a92_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our crops are keeping us self-sufficient, for the moment. So the more crops we can grow, the better. And we already paid for these seeds, damn it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前，我们的庄稼使我们可以自给自足，所以我们种的庄稼越多越好。再说我们已经为这些种子付过钱了，该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillofferh_00011a92_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if you could jog over to Monte Carlo and retrieve the shipment, that'd be great. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以如果你能去蒙特卡罗取回那批货，那就太好了，祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillofferh_00011a92_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRyanONeillQuest1 10
Is there anything I can do to help out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能帮上什么忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillHeadhuntingCallback
Wait, that was you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，那是你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillheadhu_0001268d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got a message from Tully saying that my contract had been completed, but he didn't really go into any detail beyond that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从塔利那里得到消息说我的合同已经完成了，但他并没有透露更多的细节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillheadhu_0001268d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, thanks. Always trying to do my part to keep things orderly. Even if I have to pay out of my own pocket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，谢谢。我总是尽我所能让一切井然有序，就算我破费也在所不惜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillheadhu_0001268d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ryan O'Neill? Did you put a hit out on that Johnny Norton guy? Because I killed him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瑞恩·奥尼尔？你派人去杀那个叫约翰尼·诺顿的人了吗？因为我杀了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, that was you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，那是你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillheadhu_0001268e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got a message from Tully saying that my contract had been completed, but he didn't really go into any detail beyond that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从塔利那里得到消息说我的合同已经完成了，但他并没有透露更多的细节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillheadhu_0001268e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't have cared much if those inbred freaks kept to themselves, but no, they just had to attack travelers coming this way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那些近亲繁殖的怪物不与人来往，我也不会太在意，但他们就是要袭击来这里的旅客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillheadhu_0001268e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, thanks for that. It's not the first contract I've paid for to try and keep order around here, and I expect it won't be the last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的夸奖，这不是我为维持秩序而支付的第一笔赏金，我希望这不会是最后一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillheadhu_0001268e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ryan O'Neill? I think I attacked the Bodean family on a contract you took out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瑞恩·奥尼尔？我想我是接下了你的合同消灭了博代安家族。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously? You completed both of my contracts? Pretty fucking crazy luck, I have to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 认真的？你完成了我的两份合同？我得说，你真他妈的走运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillheadhu_0001268f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, whatever. Anyone who makes a habit of using the old roads owes you a debt of gratitude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，不管怎样，任何习惯走老路的人，都应该感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillheadhu_0001268f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Norton bastard was making all the smaller outfits skittish to go past Primm. Nutjob.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个叫诺顿的杂种让所有旅行小队都不敢穿过普瑞姆，神经病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillheadhu_0001268f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And those inbred freaks went out of their way to murder people traveling north of us. Can't say I'll miss them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而那些近亲繁殖的怪胎们想方设法去谋杀从我们北边来的人，我早想要他们的命了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillheadhu_0001268f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You the Ryan O'Neill that put out some contracts with Tully Headhunting? I completed both of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是那个和塔利猎头公司签了合同的瑞恩·奥尼尔吗?我完成了两个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillFinishedHelping
Good. That should help us keep our people fed, and maybe make a little profit, too. Thanks for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，这应该能帮我们养活人民，也许还能赚点小钱。谢谢你,。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillfinish_00012691_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, as anyone unfortunate enough to sign up for this militia knows, the work never stops. I got another job for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，任何不幸报名参加民兵组织的人都知道，工作永远不会停止。我有另一份工作给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillfinish_00012691_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep it simple. A little to the south is an old motel building. It's a short walk, don't worry. I just can't leave my post, and all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一如既往的简单，往南一点是一座旧汽车旅馆，不用担心，步行很短。我就是不能离开我的岗位之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillfinish_00012691_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a woman named Luisa living in there, along with her husband, Hector. I need you to get her up and escort her over here, to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个叫路易莎的女人住在里面，还有她丈夫赫克托，我需要你把她叫起来，护送她到我这里来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillfinish_00012691_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, Hector is a piece of shit, he likes drugs and liquor and beating the shit out of his wife, hence why I need her escorted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赫克托是个混蛋，他喜欢毒品和酒精，还总是把他妻子打得屁滚尿流，所以我才需要你护送她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillfinish_00012691_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaRyanOneillQuest1 20 1
setstage aaaRyanONeillQuest1 30 setstage aaaRyanBardasQuest 10
I recovered that shipment for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我帮你找回了那批货。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillAboutBardasFamily
Hector... I'm surprised he hasn't joined the Fiends. I've been this close to dragging his ass into the desert and putting a bullet in his skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赫克托...我很惊讶他没有加入恶魔帮，我就差这么一点就能把他拖到沙漠里一枪崩了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaboutb_00012d10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the militia is supposed to defend Westside from outside aggression, not to execute citizens, even if the citizen in question is a loathsome cunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是民兵的职责是保卫西区不受外来侵略，而不是处死平民，即使这个平民是一个小贱人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaboutb_00012d10_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luisa is terrified of him. That's why she refuses to leave, even though we keep begging her. She thinks he'll hunt her down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 路易莎很怕他，这就是她拒绝离开的原因，尽管我们一直有在和她沟通，但她认为赫克托会追杀她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaboutb_00012d10_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hoping you can convince her that, seriously, we can protect her if she'll have us, but even if not...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能说服她，说真的，如果她愿意，我们可以保护她，但即使她不愿意......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaboutb_00012d10_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough is enough. Someone saw her yesterday limping like her leg was all busted up. I'm not leaving her with that fuck any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也该适可而止了，昨天有人看到她一瘸一拐的，好像腿被撞坏了一样。我不会再把她丢给那个混蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaboutb_00012d10_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Luisa and Hector.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说路易莎和赫克托。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillKillHector
Heh. Yes. Yes, I do want you to kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵，是的，是的，我想让你杀了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillkillhe_00012d12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, something that's been made abundantly clear to me over the years is that what I want doesn't matter. So, resist the urge to paste him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，多年来我已经非常清楚地知道我所想的并不是解决问题的唯一方式，所以，抑制住干掉他的冲动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillkillhe_00012d12_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a fucking coward. If he tries to get in your way, stick a gun in his mouth and he'll back down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个狗日的懦夫，所以如果他想挡你的路，把枪塞进他嘴里，他就会让步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillkillhe_00012d12_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he doesn't, and you need to self-defense him, well... Nothing of value will be lost. But, if that happens, it'd traumatize Luisa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他没有，而你需要自卫，那么...你也不会失去任何有价值的东西，但如果那样的话，路易莎或许会受到创伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillkillhe_00012d12_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, as much as it pains me to say it, try not to kill the prick. If it can be helped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，虽然我不想这么说，但尽量别杀了那个混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillkillhe_00012d12_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if Hector tries to stop Luisa from leaving? You want me to kill him, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果赫克托想阻止路易莎离开怎么办？你想让我杀了他，还是...？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillExitDialogue
Right, off you go, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那你走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillexitdi_00012d14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'm on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我这就去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillFinishedBardas
God fucking dammit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈的该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillfinish_00012d1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking hell! You know what? There's a lesson here. Fuck the benefit of the doubt. I should have put a bullet in his head years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操他妈的！你知道吗？这里有一个教训，去他妈的无罪推定，我几年前就该一枪崩了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillfinish_00012d1a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I couldn't do that, no. I thought there had to be a line we couldn't cross. We couldn't be a vigilante execution squad. So I didn't kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不能这样做。我认为我们还是有一条底线，我们不可能是治安执法大队。所以我没有杀他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see what I have to deal with? I'm defending the citizens here, but I fail to defend half of them, and I want to personally execute the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我要面对什么吗？我在保护这里的公民，但我连一半都没能保护，我还想亲自处决剩下的坏蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillfinish_00012d1a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaRyanBardasQuest 20 1
setstage aaaRyanBardasQuest 30
Hector killed her before I got there. He's dead now, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赫克托在我到之前就杀了路易莎，他现在也死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillSoWeDone
Fuck me, wouldn't that be nice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操，那不是很好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillsowedo_00012d1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... are we done?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...搞定了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillSpeechBardas
[SUCCEEDED] Yeah, maybe. All I know is two people are dead at the wrong time. One died way too soon, the other should have died years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]是的，也许吧，我只知道两个人在错误的时间死了，一个死得太早了，另一个应该在几年前就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillspeech_00012d1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway. There's more shit that needs to be done. Of course. It never ends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，还有很多事要做。当然，永远不会有个头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillspeech_00012d1e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 5
This was two people, not the entire town. You didn't do anything wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是两个人，不是整个镇子。你没做错什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] ...Because I could have killed him a while ago, thus preventing him from killing her today.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]...因为我本来可以在一段时间前杀了他，这样她今天就不会死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillspeech_00012d1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. She's dead, he's dead, soon enough, we'll all be dead. In the meanwhile, there's more work to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，她死了，他也死了，很快，我们都会死。与此同时，还有更多的工作要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillspeech_00012d1f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You didn't kill her, how is it your fault?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没杀她，怎么会是你的错？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillSoWhatsNext
More bullshit that probably won't make much difference, well intentioned as it might be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废话不会改变什么，虽然废话有时候是善意的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillsowhat_00012d21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's next, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，下一步是什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillStartQuestThree
I need you to deliver a package to a ghoul named Cliff. He should be hanging out behind the old House tools building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你给一个叫克里夫的尸鬼送个包裹，他应该待在旧工具屋后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillstartq_00015dbf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might be a few Fiends in the area, but it shouldn't be too much effort. Here, please don't lose it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个区域可能有一些恶魔帮，但你解决他们应该不太费力。给，请别弄丢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillstartq_00015dbf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRyanBusywork3 10 player.additem aaaONeillJunkMcGuffin 1
Alright, so what's the job, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那是什么工作呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillGotQuestions
What about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillgotque_0001452c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a few questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问几个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillBackstory
My "story"? Don't think I have a story, and if I do, it'd be a boring, shitty one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的“故事”？别以为我有什么故事，就算有，也会很无聊，很烂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillbackst_0001452e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Abbreviated version is that, once, there was an irrationally angry man living in the Mojave. One day, he got married and moved to Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简而言之，从前在莫哈维沙漠住着一个毫无理性的愤怒的人。有一天，他结了婚，搬到了西区。
