ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillbackst_0001452e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once they settled in, they had... entirely too many children. Fast forward 30-odd years later, and here I stand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦他们安顿下来，他们就...有了很多孩子。30多年后，他就站在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillbackst_0001452e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillSiblings
Yeah, a ludicrous number of them. Some of us even lived to adulthood. Imagine that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，数量多得可笑，我们有些人甚至活到了成年，想象一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillsiblin_00014b28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of 'em are off the reservation. I know my oldest sister is living in the NCR, as a teacher or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们中的大多数人都不在保留地，我知道我的大姐住在NCR，当老师之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillsiblin_00014b28_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My very-slightly-older brother Gerry is still in Westside. Probably passed out in some alleyway, in a puddle of his own making.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我稍大一点的哥哥格里还在西区，可能是在某个小巷里昏倒了，倒在他自己弄的水坑里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillsiblin_00014b28_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I'm pretty sure my baby brother Danny is somewhere in the Mojave, chasing his dream of being a dumbshit outlaw thug.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很确定我的小弟弟丹尼正在莫哈韦沙漠的某个地方，追逐他的梦想：成为一个愚蠢的不法暴徒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillsiblin_00014b28_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're all very proud of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都为他感到骄傲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillsiblin_00014b28_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have siblings?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有兄弟姐妹吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShadyCliffWhatDo
Nothing, 'cause I don't have nothing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么，因为我无事可做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff [07015DA9] (mod) Quest : ([07015DAB]aaaRyanBusywork3) If You Want Peace... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaryanbus_aaashadycliffwh_00015dae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing back here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShadyCliffHelmet
Don't want to get murdered by Fiends, so I wear a stupid hat that makes them think we're buddies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想被恶魔帮杀死，所以我戴了个愚蠢的帽子，让他们以为我是朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff [07015DA9] (mod) Quest : ([07015DAB]aaaRyanBusywork3) If You Want Peace... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaryanbus_aaashadycliffhe_00015db0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fiends are dumb like that. Probably on account of all the drugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮都是那么蠢，可能是因为吸毒过量导致的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff [07015DA9] (mod) Quest : ([07015DAB]aaaRyanBusywork3) If You Want Peace... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaryanbus_aaashadycliffhe_00015db0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's with the Fiend helmet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个恶魔帮的头盔是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShadyCliffWhatBusiness
I sell him surplus weapons in bulk. Shit guns, understand? NCR, Gun Runners, these rusty pieces of trash would make their eyelids twitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把多余的武器大批量卖给他，垃圾武器，明白吗？NCR，军火贩子，这些生锈的垃圾甚至会让他们爽的流口水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff [07015DA9] (mod) Quest : ([07015DAB]aaaRyanBusywork3) If You Want Peace... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaryanbus_aaashadycliffwh_00015db2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your business with O'Neill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和奥尼尔做什么生意？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShadyCliffGivePackage
Ah, good, yes. Tell him that I'll send a full crate over by the end of the week. Good doing business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，很好，是的，告诉他我这周末会送一箱过去，很棒的生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff [07015DA9] (mod) Quest : ([07015DAB]aaaRyanBusywork3) If You Want Peace... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaryanbus_aaashadycliffgi_00015db4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaONeillJunkMcGuffin 1 setstage aaaRyanBusywork3 20
I have a package for you from Ryan O'Neill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瑞恩·奥尼尔给你寄了个包裹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShadyCliffSellSome
No. I sell in bulk. I'm not cracking one of the crates open so I can sell you a 50-cap shotgun held together with twine and happy thoughts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我只批发，我不会为了卖给你一把50瓶盖的猎枪而打开其中一个箱子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff [07015DA9] (mod) Quest : ([07015DAB]aaaRyanBusywork3) If You Want Peace... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaryanbus_aaashadycliffse_00015db6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I buy any weapons from you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能从你这里买武器吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShadyCliffGunSource
Source is that I found them all years ago. Eventually I'll run out, and then I'll move somewhere that isn't inclined to kill me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来源是我多年前找到的，最终我会把它耗光，然后我就会搬到一个不会被杀的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cliff [07015DA9] (mod) Quest : ([07015DAB]aaaRyanBusywork3) If You Want Peace... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\malegenericghoul\aaaryanbus_aaashadycliffgu_00015db8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you get all these guns?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪弄来这些枪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillAboutPackage
Payment. Cliff has a shitload of ancient, terrible guns that he sells in bulk for dirt cheap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 付款，克利夫有一堆很旧很烂的枪，他以极便宜的价格批量出售。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaboutp_00015dc1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're borderline useless, but I'm trying to keep everyone armed, and I sell the extras for spare parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然没什么用，但我想让每个人都有不错武器，我把多余的老货卖了做备用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaboutp_00015dc1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this package?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个包裹是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillBusyworkDone
Good. I'd hate to have to rely on these ancient pieces of garbage, but if the Fiends ever attacked us in force, they might make a difference.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我并不想依赖这些古老的垃圾，但如果恶魔帮袭击了我们，这些老古董也会有所帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillbusywo_000163c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, thanks for that. Takes some of the load off my shoulders. A bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，谢谢你做的事，帮我减轻了一些负担，一点点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillbusywo_000163c2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's about all the work I can delegate to you. The remaining shit kinda has to fall on me or one of the other townies. You know how it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能委托给你的工作差不多就这些了，剩下的事就交给我或者镇上的其他人了，你懂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillbusywo_000163c2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, there is one small thing you could still do for me. It's more of a personal matter, sort of. You willing to help me with one last thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你还是可以为我做一件小事，这算是私事吧。你愿意帮我做最后一件事吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillbusywo_000163c2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted aaaRyanBusywork3 20 1
setstage aaaRyanBusywork3 30
I delivered that package.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我送到了那个包裹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillAcceptMainQuest
Great. So, when I say this is a personal matter, I mean it's a family thing. I'd like you to check in with my niece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。所以，我说这是私事，意思是这是家庭问题。我想让你去看看我侄女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaccept_000163c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's my brother Gerry's daughter. Gerry... he's not really doing well. His son was killed a while back, and his wife left him for another man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是我哥哥格里的女儿，格里...的情况不是很好，他儿子不久前被杀了，妻子为了另一个男人离开了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaccept_000163c6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bitch wasn't interested in caring for her remaining child, so she left the kid with Gerry. And Gerry, he hit the bottle. Hard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那贱人不想照顾她剩下的孩子，所以她把孩子留给了格里。还有，格里他酗酒，挺难的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaccept_000163c6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of us felt he wasn't fit to take care of his kid in this state. Rather than try to shape up, he sent her to some religious institution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都觉得他不适合在这种状态下照顾他的孩子。他没有努力改过自新，而是把她送到了某个宗教机构。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaccept_000163c6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe my drunk-ass brother doesn't care much for family, but I do, damn it. I need you to check in on Jessie, see if she's alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我那醉鬼哥哥不在乎家人，但我在乎，该死的，我希望你去看看杰西，看看她还好吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaccept_000163c6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for this religious center, I don't know where it is. You'll have to speak with Gerry. He should be somewhere in town, shitfaced and angry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于这个宗教中心，我不知道它在哪里。你得和格里谈谈，他应该满脸怒气的游荡在镇上的某个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaccept_000163c6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I tried talking to him, he'd spit on my shoes. We don't really get along much these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我跟他说话，他会往我鞋上吐口水。我们最近相处得不太好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillaccept_000163c6_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMainJessieQuest 10
Sure, I'll help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我会帮忙的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillRefuseMainQuest
I understand. You've helped enough, as is. Now, if there's nothing else, I need to keep watch for Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。你已经帮得够多了，现在，如果没有别的事，我需要盯着恶魔帮了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillrefuse_000163c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaaDeniedRyanMessage
No, I think I'm done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想我受够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillBardasPerception
This content is just like a depressed teenager's wrists: cut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个内容就像一个抑郁症少年的手腕:割。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGerryAdvanceQuest
Oh, you talk to Ryan, did you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你和瑞恩谈过了，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryadvance_000181d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you go back to him, okay, and tell him to stay the fuck out of my fucking business. I need my fucking baby brother looking after my shit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不回去找他，好吧，告诉他别管我的事。我需要我该死的小弟弟照顾我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryadvance_000181d6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck Ryan, and fuck you, fucker. He- he fucking told me, I wasn't being a good dad, couldn't take care of Jessie like that was fucking news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操他妈的瑞安，还有操你妈的，混蛋。他...他妈的告诉我，我不是个好爸爸，照顾不了杰西，就像新闻上说的一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryadvance_000181d6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Motherfucker, I watch my first kid get shot to shit by Fiend cocksuckers, and Ryan thinks I'm not aware that I'm a shit parent?
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈的，我看着我的第一个孩子被只会舔鸡巴的恶魔帮开枪打死，瑞恩以为我不知道我是个烂父母吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryadvance_000181d6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told him, I said "motherfucker, if you care so goddamn much about her, you fucking take her." Oh no, can't do that, he doesn't have room. Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉他，我说"操你妈的，如果你这么在乎她，就把她带走"哦不，不行，他说也没地方，之类的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryadvance_000181d6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And her filthy lying cunt of a mother, she won't do shit. She's too busy getting fucked by fat rich NCR bitches. Can't be bothered to help her kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有她那满嘴谎话的母亲，她什么都不管，她忙着被那些有钱的NCR婊子操呢，懒得管她的孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryadvance_000181d6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last time I saw Jess, was that church building outside that Aerotech refugee park. Let God take care of her, since I'm too fucking inept.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后一次见到杰西，是在航空科技难民公园外的教堂里。让上帝来照顾她吧，因为我太他妈无能了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryadvance_000181d6_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So? The fuck you waiting for? Go look after my fucking daughter on the behalf of my sanctimonious shithead baby brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以呢？你他妈的在等什么？去照顾我那狗日的女儿，去帮我那个伪善的白痴弟弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryadvance_000181d6_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMainJessieQuest 20 ShowMap aaaBurkeChurchMapMarker
Ryan wanted me to check up on your daughter. Know where I could find her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 瑞恩让我去看看你女儿，知道我在哪能找到她吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGerryNopeGoodbye
Right. If you need me, I'll just be here. Probably lying in the gutter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，如果你需要我，我就在这，可能躺在排水沟里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrynopegoo_000181d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'm out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGerryTerrifyAttempt
Pfft, most of my nerves are dead anyways. I barely feel pain anymore, and when I do, I drink it all away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，反正我大部分神经都死了，我几乎感觉不到疼痛，如果我还有痛觉的话，那就一醉方休吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryterrify_000181db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, I'll let you in on a little secret, psycho-killer. See, I'm a belligerent fucking asshole because I want to set people off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，我告诉你一个小秘密，变态杀手。看，我是个好斗的混蛋，因为我想激怒别人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryterrify_000181db_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm too much of a pussy to jump off a roof, so if some thin-skinned little bitch takes offense at me and shoots me in the face, thank god, I win.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我太胆小了，不敢从屋顶上跳下去，所以如果某个脸皮薄的小贱人对我发火，朝我脸上开枪，谢天谢地，我就赢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryterrify_000181db_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, kindly fuck off and leave me to my misery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，请你滚蛋，让我自生自灭吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryterrify_000181db_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can lose the attitude, or you can lose pieces of your own body, one after the other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以失去你应有的态度，也可以一个接一个的失去你身体每一部分的知觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGerryPoliteShit
No you're not, you're trying to help little Ryan in his meaningless quest to convince himself that life isn't complete shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你不是，你是在帮助小瑞恩去说服自己人生不是一坨屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrypolites_00018dcd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to fucking help me? How about a truckload of whiskey, a loaded .45, and Sheila's head on a fucking spike. Can't manage that? Then fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的想帮我吗？来一卡车威士忌，一把上了膛的M1911，还有把希拉的头挂在尖刺上。做不到？那就滚吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerrypolites_00018dcd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't need to be so unpleasant. I'm trying to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没必要这么不高兴，我是想帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillLegionOpinion
You know what, I don't really need to go into how I feel about their politics, or their goals, any of that shit. I can simplify it way down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我不需要对他们的政治立场高谈阔论，或者分析他们目的之类的，我可以化简一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneilllegion_000193d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of the most guilt-free aspects of my job is giving summary executions to rapists. Legion is an army of rapists. Case closed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的工作中最没有罪恶感的方面之一就是对强奸犯执行草率处决，军团是一群强奸犯，完毕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneilllegion_000193d1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion on the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对军团有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillNCROpinion
I don't hate them with a burning passion like a lot of folks around here, but that's about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不像这里的很多人那样，对他们带着强烈的恨意，但也就这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillncropi_000193d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They aren't interested in doing anything to help the people here, so I've got no use for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们对帮助这里的人不感兴趣，所以我对他们毫无用处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillncropi_000193d3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they wiped out the Fiends, made sure everyone had enough food and water, gave us a fair say in their democracy, then I could live with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们消灭了恶魔帮，确保每个人都有足够的食物和水，让我们在他们的民主制度中有公平的发言权，那我就可以和他们一起生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillncropi_000193d3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得NCR怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMonicaAdvanceMainQuest
That's actually an unusual request, if you don't mind my saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意我这么说的话，这是个不寻常的要求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaadvanc_000199d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The vast majority of our wards come to us with no families, or they've been abandoned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的绝大多数的受监护人都是没有家人的，或者是已经被遗弃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaadvanc_000199d1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fortunately, we keep records for all of our current personnel. I can have one of our clerical workers assist you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的是，我们保留了所有现有人员的记录，我可以让我们的一名文员协助您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaadvanc_000199d1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our archives can be found through the door to my right. Can I help you with anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过我右边的门可以找到我们的档案，还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicaadvanc_000199d1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMainJessieQuest 30
I'm looking for a girl named Jessie O'Neill. Her uncle wants to know how she is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫杰西·奥尼尔的女孩，她叔叔想知道她怎么样了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChurchArchivistPurpose
Path of Light isn't just a religious organization. We teach our people English, history, medicine, mathematics, and other fundamentals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光之路不仅仅是一个宗教组织。我们教我们的人民英语、历史、医学、数学和其他基础知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_0001a8da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the proper time and funding, we hope to become a viable alternative to the more secular educations provided by the Followers or the OSI.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了适当的时间和资金，我们希望成为一个可行的选择，成为能提供更多世俗教育的“天启追随者”或“OSI”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_0001a8da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This library seems a bit large for a church, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个图书馆对教堂来说有点大了，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChurchArchivistAdvanceQuest
Ah, yes. Give me one moment... Jessie O'Neill...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，好的。给我一点时间...杰西·奥尼尔...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_0001a8dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here we are. Jessie O'Neill, 11 years old, originally from Westside, enrolled in our ministry program five months ago...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们找到了，杰西·奥尼尔，11岁，来自西区，5个月前加入了我们的事工项目...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_0001a8dc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Her grades are rather decent, no disciplinary record to speak of. She seems to be doing rather well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她的成绩相当不错，没有任何违反纪律的记录，她似乎过得相当好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_0001a8dc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for information regarding one of your orphans, Jessie O'Neill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找你的一个孤儿杰西·奥尼尔的资料。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChurchArchivistAdvancePartTwo
Ah, no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_0001a8de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Firstly, in order for a non-family individual, such as yourself, to meet with one of our students, we would need a written consent form.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，为了让非家庭成员的个人，比如你，与我们的学生见面，我们需要一份书面的同意表格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_0001a8de_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More to the point, she isn't actually here at the moment. She is currently attending a trip to Shady Sands with nine other students.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更重要的是，她现在不在这里。她现在正和其他九名学生一起去沙荫镇旅行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_0001a8de_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The trip is being supervised by Deacon Paulson. They are expected to return in... Let me see... Six months time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次旅行由保尔森执事监督，他们预计会...让我看看...六个月以后回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_0001a8de_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you ask, I'm not at liberty to tell you where, exactly, you could find them. You'll just have to wait for them to return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你问之前，我无权告诉你能在哪里找到他们。你只能等他们回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_0001a8de_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I apologize for the inconvenience. Have a pleasant day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为给你带来的不便道歉，祝你有愉快的一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_0001a8de_6.ogg

Can I speak with her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能和她谈谈吗？

An individual with the NCR. It's much more important than whatever you're doing now, I assure you.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem like an intelligent person. I'm sure you can piece things together, if you're so inclined.

Wait a second, I've seen you before... You gave me a message in New Rockwell, didn't you?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see here... Ah, yes, here we go. She was an orphan from North Vegas Square when she came to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们看看这里...啊，对了，是这个。她来找我们的时候是个北维加斯广场的孤儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_00052c97_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're looking for her, try there. I'm afraid I don't have any current information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在找她，试试去那里看看，恐怕我没有任何最新的消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Archivist [0701A8C8] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaachurcharchiv_00052c97_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaStanGoldQuest 80
I need to find a former intern of yours, named Raya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要找你以前的实习生，叫拉娅。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaWhatServices
You know, "services" services. I also got a line on painkillers, if that's more to your taste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你懂的，“服务”，服务。我也买了止痛药，如果你喜欢的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayawhatse_0002519e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Barbiturate painkillers, not booze or trippy stuff, sad as I am to admit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巴比妥类止痛药，不是酒类或是催眠药，我承认这很悲哀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayawhatse_0002519e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of services do you offer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提供什么样的服务？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaProstCost
150 caps for a romp on my 200-year-old mattress, because I'm a classy date.
ESP.TRADUIT: 150个瓶盖。我有200年床垫上嬉戏的经验，我是一个优雅的约会对象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayaprostc_000251a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much for your time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的时间多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaFluidExchange
How romantic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多么浪漫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayafluide_000251a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 150 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
I'd like to hire you for a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想雇你陪我一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, how could anyone resist the allure of this shitty alleyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，谁能抵挡住这条破烂小巷的诱惑呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayafluide_000251a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 150 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
I'd like to hire you for a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想雇你陪我一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh-huh. Don't you worry about me faking it, now. My total lack of enthusiasm is as genuine as it gets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈，现在你不用担心我装了，我是真的完全没有热情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayafluide_000251a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 150 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
I'd like to hire you for a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想雇你陪我一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're my favorite customer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是我最喜欢的顾客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayafluide_000251a5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 150 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
I'd like to hire you for a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想雇你陪我一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaBuyDrugs
All my shit has legitimate medical purposes, so really I'm helping the community. Ha.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所有的东西都有正当的医疗目的，所以我是在帮助社区，哈哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayabuydru_000251a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Let me see what you have for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看看你都有些啥好货色。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaBackground
Nothing too interesting. Once upon a time, I used to dream of making something of my life. Very optimistic and inspiring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么有趣的，曾几何时，我也梦想着自己的人生有所成就，非常乐观和鼓舞人心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayabackgr_000251ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dreamt of joining the Followers, being a doctor. Then I discovered magical substances that made life seem to suck less, so that became my passion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我梦想加入天启追随者，成为一名医生。后来我发现了一些神奇的物质，可以让生活看起来不那么糟糕，所以这就成了我的热情所在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayabackgr_000251ab_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsGreet1
Yeah, I didn't think you were one of Dalton's, really. You look like you know what soap is, for a start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我不认为你是道尔顿的人，真的。首先你看起来好像知道什么是肥皂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsgree_000295a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... O'Neill... He's the guy from Westside, I think? The one my sister drools over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...奥尼尔...我想他是西区的那个人吧？我姐姐痴迷的那个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsgree_000295a8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you should go talk to her. I won't shoot you when you go through the gate, promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你该去和她谈谈，你进门我不会开枪的，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsgree_000295a8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHumboldtFarmQuest 30 aaaMaggieHumboldtREF.EVP
Whoever Dalton is, I'm not affiliated with him. Ryan O'Neill sent me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管道尔顿是谁，我跟他没有关系。瑞恩·奥尼尔派我来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsGreet2
Well, you aren't supposed to be on our property, we just paid you. If you don't follow the deal, I could just shoot you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不应该出现在我们的地盘上，我们刚付过钱。如果你不遵守协议，我可以一枪崩了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsgree_000295aa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...But I don't think you actually are one of them, though. So, uh... I'm right? If I'm not, I'll have to shoot you.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...但我不认为你是他们中的一员，所以,嗯...我说得没错吧?如果不是，我就开枪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsgree_000295aa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [LIE] Oh yeah, me and Dalton go way back. Good times.
ESP.TRADUIT: [说谎]哦，是的，我和道尔顿是老相识了，那是一段美好的时光。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsMarriage1
Oh, really? Great, I didn't think you'd agree. Alrighty, now I'll just need to get her to agree...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，真的吗？太好了，我没想到你会同意。好吧，现在我只需要让她同意...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsmarr_000295af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, I might need to get some blackmail material, first. Uh, gimme some time, I'll get back to you about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得先弄点勒索的材料。给我点时间，我回头再跟你说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsmarr_000295af_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, let's do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我们就这么做吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsMarriage2
Oh. Well, that's lame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好吧，这太蹩脚了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsmarr_000295b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if you ever decide to, like, start an affair or something... My sister is right here. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你决定，比如说，开始一段恋情什么的...我姐姐就在这里。只是提醒一下你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsmarr_000295b1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm already spoken for, so... No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经说过了，所以...不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsMarriage3
Yeah, I mean, she's not that great or nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我的意思是，她也不是很好或者说并非一无是处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsmarr_000295b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you could marry me instead! But, uh, might need to wait a couple years. I can be patient, you just, uh, keep the offer in mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你可以娶我代替！但是，呃，可能需要等几年。我可以耐心点，你只要，呃，记住这个提议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsmarr_000295b3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... No, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...不了，谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsMarriage4
She doesn't need to like it, she just needs to go along with it or I'll release her terrible secrets to the public.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不需要让她喜欢，她只需要接受，否则我就把她可怕的秘密公布于众。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsmarr_000295b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just, uh... Give me some time to actually find her terrible secrets. Might take a while. I'll get back to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是,呃...给我点时间找出她可怕的秘密。可能需要一段时间。我会和你联系的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsmarr_000295b5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't get the sense that she'd be down for marrying another woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不觉得她会因为和别的女人结婚而不高兴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, she isn't that ugly. Ugh, guys are weird. Just keep it in mind, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 得了吧，她又没那么丑。啊，男人性癖都很奇怪。记住我说的，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsmarr_000295b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... She's not really my type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对...她不是我喜欢的类型。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCompDontTalkMuch
I suppose. Interpret it as you want. I just don't have much to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是吧，你想怎么解释就怎么解释，我没什么好说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecompd_0002f50f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We only have so much time on earth. Less than we usually expect. I'd prefer not to waste it on idle chatter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在地球上的时间不多了，起码比我们通常预期的要少。我可不想把时间浪费在闲聊上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecompd_0002f50f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't really talk very much, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不怎么说话，是吧?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieLegionOpinion
I'd prefer they don't take power, if for no other reason than my hunch that they'd take objection to everything I represent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望他们不要掌权，因为我的直觉告诉我他们会反对我所代表的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlielegio_0003010e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite my sex, my only talents are killing. As if that weren't enough, I'm not even biologically capable of bearing children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了我的性别，我唯一的才能就是杀人。好像这还不够，从生理上来说，我甚至没有生育能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlielegio_0003010e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If someone in the Legion wanted to purchase my services, fine. I don't pick and choose my clientele based on their personal ideology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果军团里有人想雇佣我，没问题。我不会根据客户的个人思想来而拒绝生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlielegio_0003010e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I suspect that wouldn't happen. If nothing else, the Legion seems quite firm in their beliefs. Less likely to bend their own rules.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我觉得这不会发生。就算没有别的原因，军团似乎对他们的信仰相当坚定，不太可能改变自己的规则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlielegio_0003010e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their loss. I suppose they'll just have to keep relying on their own assassins, shoddy and ineffectual as they may be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是他们的损失，我猜他们只能继续依靠自己的暗杀者了，但这些暗杀者又是卑劣且无能的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlielegio_0003010e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion on the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对军团有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNCROpinion
For a group espousing law and order and justice for all, my initial thoughts were that they would feel obligated to try and kill or detain me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个拥护法律、秩序和所有人的正义的团体，一开始我觉得他们会自认为有义务杀死或拘留我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliencrop_00030110_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I've found numerous clients among their population. Especially the upper echelons of their class hierarchy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我在他们中找到了很多客户，尤其是上层阶级。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliencrop_00030110_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The more a man espouses the importance of democracy and fair play, the more likely he is to hire me if he finds himself losing, I've found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现，一个人越是认同民主和公平竞争的重要性，但当他失望的时候就越有可能雇佣我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliencrop_00030110_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though, that's not what you asked. My feelings on the Republic as a whole are quite similar to my feelings on everything else in life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你问的不是这个。我对整个共和国的感情和我对生活中其他一切的感情都差不多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliencrop_00030110_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is to say, I feel nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也就是说，我什么也感觉不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliencrop_00030110_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得NCR怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieHouseOpinion
I don't feel anything about House. Not to imply I'm inundated with feelings for anything else, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对豪斯没有任何感觉，当然，这并不是说我会对别的事都充满感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehouse_00030112_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no stake in his armistice with the NCR, nor do I care how he manages the New Vegas city-state. That's his business. Literally, and otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和NCR的停战协定对我没有任何影响，我也不在乎他如何管理新维加斯，这是他的事情，从字面上来说是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehouse_00030112_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can tell you that he seems like the sort of individual who could use the services of a skilled assassin, at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我可以告诉你，他看起来是那种至少需要一名熟练杀手的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehouse_00030112_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {deadpan}Pass along one of my business cards next time you meet him, would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: {面无表情}你下次见到他时，给我递张名片，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehouse_00030112_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about Mr. House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得豪斯先生怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's dead. I don't bother forming opinions on corpses. If I did, I'd be too busy to do my job. Only so many hours in the day, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他死了，我对尸体没什么看法。如果我有，那我就忙得没时间工作了，一天就那么几个小时，你懂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehouse_00030113_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion on Mr. House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对豪斯先生有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieYesManOpinion
I would approve. And I'd also recommend you hire someone skilled, that can neutralize threats before they cause any trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会支持的，我也建议你雇个有经验的人，能在任何威胁到来之前化解它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieyesma_00030115_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assure you, the leader of a commerce-centric independent city-state would be able to afford to keep me on retainer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我向你保证，一个以商业为中心的独立城邦的领导人有能力聘请我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieyesma_00030115_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about me securing independence for the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我为莫哈韦争取独立怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: An independent city-state with a strong economy sounds like the ideal setting for a skilled assassin to do business, so I would approve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个独立的、经济强劲的城邦，听起来像是一个熟练杀手做生意的理想环境，所以我支持。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieyesma_00054ab7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moreover, securing that independence would put a target on your back. My contract to keep you alive ends after the battle of Hoover Dam, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，确保独立也会让你背负重任。胡佛水坝之战结束后，我确保你活命的合同就到期了，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieyesma_00054ab7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I would prefer you don't come to any harm. If you plan on ousting the NCR and the Legion, a great many people will want your head on a pike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你不要受到任何伤害。如果你打算驱逐NCR和军团，会有很多人想把你的头挂在长矛上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieyesma_00054ab7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you'd find yourself in need of my services. I'm sure we could work out a favorable deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你会需要我的帮助，我相信我们能达成一笔互利的交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieyesma_00054ab7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about me securing independence for the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我为莫哈韦争取独立怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBoSOpinion
Pulse grenade to lock up their armor, and then a blade through the neck-seam under their helmet. Kevlar is useless against blades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用脉冲手榴弹锁住他们的盔甲，然后用刀片刺穿他们头盔下的颈缝。凯夫拉防弹衣在锋利刀刃面前都不值一提。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebosop_00030117_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were you asking how I feel about their methods or philosophies? It seems pointless, to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者说你是在问我对他们的方法或哲学的看法吗?对我来说，这似乎毫无意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebosop_00030117_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps if I saw inside their secret little headquarters, I would formulate something resembling an actual opinion. Or perhaps not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许如果我能进入他们秘密的小总部，我或许能对此产生一些对兄弟会的实际意见，也可能不会有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebosop_00030117_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the Brotherhood of Steel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么看钢铁兄弟会？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFactionOpinionBranch
I'm not a particularly opinionated person, but I'll answer as I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是一个特别固执己见的人，我会尽量回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefacti_00030119_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like your opinion on some of the regional factions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想听听你对某些地区派系的看法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFiendsOpinion
I generally don't "feel" much of anything. The Fiends aren't an exception.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我通常对任何事都没什么感觉，恶魔帮也不例外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefiend_0003011b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They don't hire me, and nobody else hires me to kill them. Fiend-hunting is good publicity for headhunters and bounty-killers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不雇我，也没人雇我杀他们。猎杀恶魔帮有助于猎头和赏金猎人的名声名誉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefiend_0003011b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For killers that operate in the shadows, they're not worth the paltry bounties that army personnel and grieving families can offer up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于在暗处作案的杀手来说，军队人员和悲伤的家属所提供的微薄赏金，压根不是他们能雇的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefiend_0003011b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about the Fiends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对恶魔帮有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePowderGangOpinion
Worthless. There can be good money in performing jobs for criminal gangs... Or for decapitating criminal gangs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一文不值。为犯罪团伙干活可以赚很多钱...或者是为了剿灭犯罪团伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliepowde_0003011d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the Powder Gangers don't have the money to hire assassins, and they're too vulnerable for anyone to bother contracting me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但炸药帮没钱雇杀手，而且他们太脆弱了，没人愿意跟我签约。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliepowde_0003011d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the Powder Gangers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得炸药帮怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieGreatKhansOpinion
I've done a job or two for the Khans. Their feud with the NCR is a matter of blood, and so hiring outside assassins is too impersonal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为大汗帮干过一两次活。他们与NCR之间是血仇，所以他们一般亲自击杀NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegreat_0003011f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if it's a matter of maintaining their stranglehold on the drug market, oh yes, they're quite willing to employ any means available.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果是为了维持他们在毒品市场上的垄断地位的话，没错，他们非常愿意使用任何可行的手段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegreat_0003011f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for actual opinions... Their war with the NCR is folly. It doesn't matter how tough they are, they don't have the numbers to win.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于实际意见......他们与NCR的战争是愚蠢的。不管他们有多坚强，都没有足够的筹码去战胜他们的敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegreat_0003011f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood already learned that lesson, to their sorrow. And I can say from experience, members of the Brotherhood are harder to kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会已经吸取了教训，他们自食恶果。根据经验，兄弟会的动力甲很难对付，更别说大汗帮了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegreat_0003011f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they truly wish to establish their own Khanate, they should evacuate the Mojave in short order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们真的想建立自己的汗国，他们应该尽快撤离莫哈韦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegreat_0003011f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any thoughts on the Great Khans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对大汗帮有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCloseTopicBranch
As you say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieclose_00030121_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了，我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstory1
...I doubt that. It's not an especially short tale, and I find that it tends to make people uncomfortable.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我对此表示怀疑。这不是一个特别简短的故事，而且我发现它总是让人不舒服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030123_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The short version is that I was born a slave, became a toy for raiders, a spectacle in their arena, and then a trainee assassin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简而言之，我生下来就是一个奴隶，成了掠夺者的玩具，竞技场里的演员，然后现在是一个见习刺客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030123_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If, for some reason, you want to hear more, ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果出于某种原因，你想听更多，那就问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030123_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to know your backstory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道你的背景故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truly? I can't see what the appeal would be, but very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗?我不知道这有什么吸引力，但很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to talk about your history some more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想多谈谈你的历史。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstory2
An exaggeration, perhaps. In truth, I had a month or so of freedom between my birth and my enslavement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有点夸张。事实上，从我出生到我成为奴隶，我有一个月左右的自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030125_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My... parents. They didn't want a child. They sold me off to a roving slave-trader as soon as they could find one. I don't know what I was worth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的...父母。他们不想要孩子，他们找到一个流动奴隶贩子就把我卖了，我不知道我值多少钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030125_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was my owner that named me, taught me to walk and speak, read and write. But most of all, he taught me to be quiet and obedient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我的主人给我取名，教我走路、说话、读书和写字。但最重要的是，他教我要安静和听话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030125_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I hesitated, I was flogged. If I disobeyed, I was whipped. And if I failed a task, I was locked in a very small crate for... Some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我犹豫，我就会被鞭打。如果我不服从，我就会被鞭打。如果我没有完成任务，我就会被锁在一个非常小的板条箱里...一段时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030125_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing he never did to me was harming my resale value. I had to look my best. He wouldn't cripple me or... despoil me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他唯一没对我做过的事就是破坏我的转售价值。我得让自己看起来还不错，他不会弄残我或者...蹂躏我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030125_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a quick study. His other slaves were born free. He had to break them down and remake them in the image he desired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我学得很快。他的其他奴隶生来都是自由人，他强迫他们重塑，重塑成他想要的形象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030125_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I was raised, from birth, to be property. I didn't know any other way, so resistance never crossed my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我生来就是被他抚养长大的，我不知道别的办法，所以我从未想过反抗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030125_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, when I was quite young, he passed through a raider settlement, and I was sold to their leader. I never saw my original master again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，当我还很年轻的时候，他经过一个掠夺者的聚居地，把我卖给了他们的首领。我再也没见过我原来的主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030125_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieBackstoryPoints to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieBackstoryPoints + 1
You were born a slave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你生来就是奴隶?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstory3
...Yes.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030127_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The gang leader... Had certain predilections. He found me appealing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个团伙的头目......有一定的怪癖，他发现我很有吸引力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030127_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I wasn't being used for his pleasure, he also found amusement in torturing me. I... used to pray that if I did a good job, he wouldn't hurt me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我不被用来取悦他时，他也以折磨我为乐。我...我曾经乞求，如果我干得好，他就不伤害我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030127_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He always found reason to harm me, regardless. Looking back, I recognize sadism is it's own reward for those who possess it. Torture amused him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他总能找到伤害我的理由。回首往事，我意识到这就是施虐狂眼里的奖赏，折磨让他觉得好笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030127_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, he tired of me. I was tossed to the rest of his gang to do with as they saw fit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，他厌倦了我。我被扔给帮派的其他人，任凭他们处置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030127_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was lucky, they had me do domestic work. When I was unlucky, it was more of what I suffered under their leader. I was often unlucky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我运气好的时候，他们让我做家务。运气不好的时候，就要遭受在他们首领手下遭受的痛苦，我经常运气不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030127_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This was a large gang. A settlement, really. One of their favorite pastimes was forcing slaves to fight to the death in an arena.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个很大的团伙,一个定居点,真的。他们最喜欢的消遣之一就是强迫奴隶在竞技场上决一死战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030127_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Children weren't exempt. Rather, they were the favorite fighters. Eventually, my captors tired of using me, and threw me to the arena.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子也不被豁免，相反，他们是最受欢迎的战士。最终，捕获我的人厌倦了使唤我，把我扔到了竞技场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030127_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieBackstoryPoints to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieBackstoryPoints + 1
You were purchased by raiders?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被掠夺者买走了?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstory4
Fine. The raiders loved to watch their slaves and captives fight to the death, and children were their favorite. The... wrongness entertained them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。这些掠夺者喜欢看他们的奴隶和俘虏厮杀到底，孩子间的厮杀是他们的最爱。...这种暴行让他们感到快乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030129_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The one downside for the raiders was that most people have an innate resistance to killing. Children more than most.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者的一个缺点是，大多数人对杀戮有天生的抵抗力，孩子是其中的大多数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030129_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The children would spend most of the "fights" cowering and crying, begging for freedom and forgiveness, refusing to arm themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子们在“战斗”的大部分时间里都在畏缩和哭泣，乞求自由和宽恕，拒绝武装自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030129_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I... Was taught, from birth, to be obedient. I must do whatever my owner commanded, without a flicker of hesitation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我...从出生起就被教导要听话，我必须毫不犹豫地按照主人的吩咐去做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030129_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When they placed me in the arena and told me to kill, that's what I did. While the others cried and begged, I took up the knife and killed them all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他们把我放在竞技场里让我杀人时，我就照做了，其他孩子哭着哀求的时候，我拿起刀把他们全杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030129_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One by one, they fell. I didn't hesitate. That would have been unthinkable. The raiders were... Stunned. By me. What I had done for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有任何犹豫，他们一个接一个地倒下了，那是不可想象的，掠夺者......惊呆了，因为我，因为我为他们所做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030129_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watching a little girl cut down her fellows in cold blood amused the raiders more than they could say. And they... rewarded me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看着一个小女孩残忍地杀害她的同伴，那些掠夺者好笑得说不出话来，于是他们......奖励我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030129_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more beatings, no more rape, no more domestic servitude. Instead, they praised me for putting on a good show. And they gave me drugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不再殴打我，不再强奸我，不再奴役我。相反，他们称赞我表演得很好，他们给了我毒品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030129_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I killed for them, not only did the pain finally stop, but the drugs gave me a sense of euphoria I had never known. It was almost... Happiness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我为他们杀人时，不仅痛苦终于停止了，而且药物给了我一种从未有过的兴奋感。它几乎是...幸福。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030129_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't touched any chems for a long time, but there's some lingering neurological damage. And psychological, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很长时间没碰过任何化学药品了，但有一些挥之不去的神经损伤。当然还有心理上的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030129_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieBackstoryPoints to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieBackstoryPoints + 1
Tell me more about this arena you fought in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说你在竞技场的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieExitBackstory
I warned you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我警告过你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieexitb_0003012b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm... not really comfortable talking about this anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我不想再谈论这个了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstory5
It ended in blood, as it began. As with everything else in my life, freedom was forced upon me. I never chose to escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它以鲜血告终，如同它的开始。自由，就像我生命中其他的一切事物一样，是强加给我的，我从未选择逃避。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_0003012d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As large and cruel as the raider gang was, they made enemies. One of these enemies hired an assassin to end the threat, once and for all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管这群掠夺者庞大而残忍，但他们还是树敌不少。其中一个敌人雇佣了一名刺客来一劳永逸的解决威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_0003012d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was no grand battle. One morning, I woke in my cell to the sounds of gunfire and yelling, then... Silence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有大规模的战斗。一天早上，我在牢房里被枪声和喊叫声惊醒，然后......寂静无声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some minutes later, a stranger strolled into the holding cages. He looked at all of us chattel, and then he unlocked our cells. Told us we were free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几分钟后，一个陌生人走进了牢房，他看着我们所有人，然后打开了我们的笼子，告诉我们自由了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: The other children... They despised me almost as much as they feared me. They had seen me as I killed every slave that was sent against me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他的孩子...他们看不起我，就像他们害怕我一样。他们都亲眼目睹我在竞技场把其它奴隶杀掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_0003012d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They watched the raiders praise me for killing their friends and family. In their eyes, I was the embodiment of all they had suffered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们眼睁睁地看着掠夺者指使我杀死他们的朋友和家人。在他们眼里，我就是他们所受苦难的化身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_0003012d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When they were given their freedom, they decided to tie up the last loose end. Maybe they thought I wouldn't fight with no raiders directing me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们得到自由后，决定解决最后的问题，也许他们认为没有掠夺者的指导我不会战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_0003012d_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I did. Instead of enjoying their newfound freedom, they all died at my hands. The assassin watched it all, never interfering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我会。他们没能享受到新获得的自由，最终死在了我手上。那个刺客目睹了这一切，但没有干涉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_0003012d_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When it was over, he told me that, if I wanted, I could come with him. That he would teach me how to use my talents properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束后，他告诉我，如果我愿意可以和他一起走。他会教我如何正确运用我的才能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_0003012d_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What could I do but accept? I knew nothing of freedom. I would have made a mess of myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了接受，我还能做什么?我对自由一无所知，我只会把自己搞得一团糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_0003012d_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieBackstoryPoints to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieBackstoryPoints + 1
How did you escape the raiders?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么从掠夺者帮派逃脱的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstoryBranch1
He died. Not at the hands of another assassin, not to a botched job, not through any violent means. He died of a lung disease.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就死了。不是另一个杀手干的，不是一次失败的工作，也不是通过任何暴力手段，他死于肺病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_0003012f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could have thrown his body in the street, but out of respect, I buried him in the desert. And I took his blade for my own use. It serves me well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本可以把他的尸体扔在街上，但出于尊重，我把他埋在了沙漠里，我拿走了他的杀器，非常称手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to your mentor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的导师怎么了?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstoryBranch2
No. The past cannot be changed. Regrets only serve as a distraction, and my mind needs to be focused to be effective.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。过去无法改变，后悔只会分散我的注意力，我的思想需要集中才能有效率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030131_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've had a hard life. Do you have any regrets?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的人生很艰难，你有什么遗憾吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstoryBranch3
They barely fought back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们几乎没有反抗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030133_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were slaves and captures, ripped from their ordinary, happy lives. Forced into collars and told to kill or be killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是奴隶和俘虏，被剥夺了他们平常幸福的生活。被迫戴上项圈，被告知要么杀人，要么被杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030133_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All they had was fear and hesitation. All I had was an entire life where the fear and hesitation was whipped, beaten, and starved out of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们所知道的只有恐惧和疑虑。我所知道的不仅仅是恐惧和犹豫，还有鞭笞、殴打、饿死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030133_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when killing them was the only surefire method of making my own pain end... When it actually brought me something akin to happiness...
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死他们是让我自己的痛苦结束的唯一可靠方法......这样真的给我带来类似于幸福的东西......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030133_4.ogg
