ESP.ORIGINAL: My emotions died when I was first purchased from my parents. All the same, the raiders managed to force a degree of bloodlust on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我第一次从父母那里被买走时，我就没有什么情绪。尽管如此，这些掠夺者还是让我产生了一定程度的嗜血欲望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030133_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How could you kill the other children so easily?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么能这么轻易地杀死其他孩子?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstoryBranch4
Beyond proper medicines? I take sleeping pills for practical reasons, but otherwise, no, not since the day I was released.
ESP.TRADUIT: 包括一些治疗性的药物吗？我服用安眠药是出于实际原因，但除此之外，从我被释放那天起就没有服用过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030135_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No doubt they're a pleasant escape for those who choose to indulge. I never had that choice. The drugs were forced on me, and it never stopped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，对于那些选择放纵自己的人来说，毒品是一种愉快的逃避方式。我从来没有这样的选择。我被强迫吃药，而且从未停止过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030135_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was finally free of them, I had... Clarity. A fog lifted. I never want to lose that clarity again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我终于摆脱他们的时候，我感到...思维清晰，脑子里的雾消散了。我不想再失去这种清晰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00030135_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The raiders gave you drugs. Do you still... use them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者给了你毒品，你现在还......使用它们?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNoBountyHunters
They're mediocre, deluded assassins. I don't extend the effort of actively disliking things, but I find their notion to be repellent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是平庸，受蒙蔽的刺客。我并没有刻意去讨厌某些东西，但我觉得他们的想法令人反感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienobou_000325fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A proper assassin is an implement of death, nothing more. When men make the decision to kill, some use blades, others bullets, some use people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个真正的杀手只是个杀人工具，仅此而已。当一个人决定杀人时，有些人用刀，有些人用子弹，有些人用人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienobou_000325fd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It isn't personal, and I harbor no illusions of morality. I kill for money, if you put stock into ethics, it's an inherently evil act.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是针对个人的，我对道德也没有太高要求。我杀人是为了钱，如果你把道德准则当回事，那这就是天生的道德低下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienobou_000325fd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But bounty hunters, headhunters, whatever their name, have it backwards. It's all personal to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但赏金猎人，猎头，先不管他们叫什么，都把这件事本末倒置了，完全把这种事情当成自己的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienobou_000325fd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their client is an afterthought, all the focus is on the heroic bounty hunter, profiting off of death while crowing about justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的委托人是事后诸葛亮，所有的焦点都集中在这位英勇的赏金猎人身上，一边从他人的死亡中获利，一边高呼正义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienobou_000325fd_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're a flashy tool, used to make a point about the reach and the righteousness of their clientele.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是他们用来显摆的手段罢了，凸显自己业务范围广，客户牛逼和自身的“正义”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienobou_000325fd_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem to like bounty hunters much. Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好像不太喜欢赏金猎人，为什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePlayerBounty
I'm aware. Of your many apparent professions, you'll forgive me if there's at least one that I almost care enough to dislike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道。在你众多的职业中，如果你至少有一种职业让我摆在心上，以至于不喜欢，请原谅我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieplaye_000325ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fortunately, I don't really feel much about anything. If it makes you feel better, no doubt you could find some distasteful aspect of me, as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的是，我对任何事都没什么感觉，如果这能让你感觉好点的话，毫无疑问你也能发现我有什么令人讨厌的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieplaye_000325ff_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably involving dead children. That one never fails to offend someone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能和那些死去的孩子有关，我这种人总能得罪别人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieplaye_000325ff_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know I've done my share of bounty hunting, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我当过赏金猎人吧?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieJusticeBounty
Are you implying you do headhunting work for free? I doubt that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在暗示你免费做猎头工作吗?我表示怀疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejusti_00032bfa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I may not be well versed into the nuances of what is or is not just, but I'm confident that murder-for-hire doesn't qualify, no matter the target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能不太清楚什么叫正义，什么叫不正义，但我确信雇凶杀人不能称之为正义，不管目标是谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejusti_00032bfa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if your target deserves to die, accepting a contract on his life is inherently impersonal; not righteous punishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你的目标罪有应得，取走他生命的契约本质上是没有人情味的，是不正义的惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejusti_00032bfa_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If anyone in that equation is morally upstanding, it would be your client. Lacking the ability to kill, he contracts you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人在道德上是正直的，那就是你的客户，他没有杀人的能力，就和你签约。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejusti_00032bfa_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I said, the dividing line between my work and bounty work is that what I do, I do in the shadows. And, I know exactly what I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如我所说，我的工作和赏金猎人的工作之间存在分界线，我是在阴影中进行的。 而且，我很清楚我是谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejusti_00032bfa_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not about prestige, it's about meting out justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是为了声望，这是为了伸张正义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBountyApathy
Wise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebount_00032bfc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That said, the glaring flaw is that your methods leave you with a target on your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也就是说，你最明显的缺点是你的方法让你背负了一个目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebount_00032bfc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider accepting contracts anonymously. Don't engage your targets in petty banter before executing them. If you can avoid being seen, do so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 匿名接受合同。在处决目标之前，不要和他们开玩笑。如果可以，尽量避免被人看见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebount_00032bfc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think, if you adopt my methods, you'll find yourself with far fewer attempts at violent retaliation being delivered to your door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，如果你采用我的方法，你就会发现你家门口的暴力报复行为会少很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebount_00032bfc_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
I couldn't care less about the moral implications. I'm doing a job I was paid to do, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点也不关心这其中的道德意味，我只是在做本职工作，仅此而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieQuestionsTree
And I may have answers. Ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也许有答案，问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliequest_00032bfe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些问题要问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For what purpose? Very well, proceed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出于什么目的？ 很好，继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliequest_00032bff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有几个问题想问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't consider myself much of a conversationalist, but I will answer to the best of my abilities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为自己是个健谈的人，但我会尽我所能说多点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliequest_00032c00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能问你点事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: On which topic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于哪个话题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliequest_00032c01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你一件事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstorySlaver
He's dead. Not at my hands, but dead all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他死了，没死在我手里，但还是死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a lieutenant in a slaver ring operated by a man named Schrader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是一个叫施拉德尔的人经营的贩奴集团的副官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Several years ago, Schrader's ring began to come into conflict with another group, operated by a man named Dietrich.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年前，施拉德尔的团伙开始与一个叫迪特里希的人领导的团伙冲突。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c04_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My former master was captured in a skirmish with Dietrich, and they decided to make an example of him for Schrader's crew to witness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前的主人在和迪特里希的一次小冲突中被抓了，他们决定拿他杀一儆百。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c04_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They flayed him alive, and nailed his skin to the door of Schrader's HQ. How unfortunate for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们活活剥了他的皮，把他的皮钉在施拉德尔总部的门上，他真不幸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c04_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know what became of the slaver who bought you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道买你的奴隶贩子后来怎么样了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieSchraderDead
You... did?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...做的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieschra_00032c06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieschra_00032c06_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rewardkarma 5 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 3
Eugene Schrader? I cut him down like the vermin he was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤金·施拉德尔？我把这个害虫消灭了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstory6
The man who had rescued me brought me with him. As he promised, he began to teach me his trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 救我的那个人把我带走了。正如他所承诺的，他开始教我他的生计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had experience killing and my instincts were sharp, but I lacked finesse, let alone experience with weaponry or... subtler methods.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有过杀人的经验，本能也很敏锐，但我缺乏技巧，更不用说使用武器的经验......或者隐蔽的方法了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c08_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He taught me to shoot, to wield a blade, to move silently and unseen. I already knew how to read, but he gave me a real education.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他教我射击，挥剑，无声无息地移动。虽然我已经知道如何阅读，但是他给了我真正的教育。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c08_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I failed a task, disappointed him in some way... He would lecture me harshly, and then let me try again. He was strict, but never cruel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我某项任务失败了，让他失望了......他会严厉地教训我，然后让我再试一次。他很严厉，但并不残忍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c08_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon, I was accompanying him on missions. He would offer advice and make suggestions, but for the first time, I had... autonomy. Real freedom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快，我就和他一起执行任务了。他会提出建议，但我第一次拥有了......自主权，真正的自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c08_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We weren't close, and our relationship was never anything more than professional. He simply wanted to pass on his skills and knowledge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们并不亲密，我们的关系也只是工作上的关系。他只是想把自己的技能和知识传承下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c08_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That never bothered me. He was the first person I ever met that didn't want me to suffer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些从来没有困扰过我，他是我遇到的第一个不想让我受苦的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c08_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In time, I became skilled enough to accept my own contracts, without him. He had nothing left to teach me, so he stopped trying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来，我变得足够熟练，可以在没有他的情况下自己接活。他没有什么可以教我的了，所以他也不再试着教我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c08_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were just two independent murderers, living in the same building. And that's where my personal history ends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们只是两个独立的杀人犯，住在同一栋楼里。我的个人历史到此为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c08_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything between that point and us speaking right now falls into job details, which I don't discuss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从现在开始我们的一切谈话都属于工作细节，我不讨论这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c08_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieBackstoryPoints to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieBackstoryPoints + 1
So, how did you end up an assassin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你是怎么成为杀手的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstoryBranch5
Perhaps, but when a group is rushing for blood, my thoughts don't immediately turn to how I can subdue them non-lethally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许，当一群人互相想让对方流血时，我的想法并不会倾向于如何非致命地制服他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c0a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And really, the thought of mercy never crossed my mind. All of my experiences taught me that life is cheap and easily thrown away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的，我从没想过要慈悲。我人生的经历告诉我，生命是廉价的，很容易消逝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c0a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They wanted me dead; I wanted to live. Somebody is going to lose in that equation, and I wasn't going to let it be me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们想要我死，我想活下去。总有人会在这个关系中倒下，我不会让自己成为败方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c0a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't you have left some of the other children alive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就不能让其他孩子活着吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBackstoryBranch6
{genuine, almost surprised.}I... Thank you. That is... not necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: {诚恳,震惊}我...谢谢，这是......没必要问的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebacks_00032c0c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rewardkarma 5 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
I'm sorry you went through all of that. You deserved better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉让你经历了这些，你值得更好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFunHobbies1
...I don't enjoy anything. I'm an emotionally-dead, hollow, empty shell of a human, whose only reason for living is to kill others for money.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我什么都不喜欢。我是个情感空虚的人，活下去的唯一理由是为了钱杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_00033207_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... When you're not on the job, what do you enjoy? Any hobbies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...当你不工作的时候，你喜欢做什么?有什么爱好吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFunHobbies2
I purchase ammunition, gun oil, whetstones, and medical supplies. Of course, I also keep myself fed and hydrated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我购买弹药，枪油，磨刀石和医疗用品。当然，我也会让自己吃饱喝足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_00033209_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: O...kay then. What do you spend your assassination money on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...好吧，那你通过暗杀赚来的钱都花在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFunHobbies3
...No. I haven't.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...不，从来没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_0003320c_1.ogg
NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're... surprisingly charitable. That's rare, especially around here. However, that's an easy trait for someone to take advantage of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...出人意料的仁慈，这很少见，尤其是在这种地方。然而，这是一个很容易被人利用的特点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Precisely what community do you believe I'm part of? I owe no loyalty to the dregs that find themselves in the slum surrounding my current safehouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底认为我是哪个团体的一员?我对我现在藏身的贫民窟里的渣滓毫无忠诚可言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_0003320c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardkarma 5 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
If you have more money than you need, have you considered giving back to your community?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你的钱比你需要的多，你考虑过回馈社区吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFunHobbies4

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I try to spare at least an hour every day for silent meditation, to keep myself focused.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着每天至少抽出一个小时来冥想，让自己集中注意力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_0003320d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... Also read whatever I can. Content doesn't matter. Children's books, encyclopedias, porno novels, biographies or fantasies. Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...还有，我能读什么书就读什么书，内容不重要。儿童书籍、百科全书、色情小说、传记或幻想小说，什么都行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_0003320d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It isn't enjoyment, but I do try to know as much as I can. {beat}And anything to distract me from my thoughts is welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是一种享受，但我确实尽我所能去了解。{敲击}任何能分散我注意力的东西都是受欢迎的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_0003320d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what do you do when you have free time between missions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在任务间隙，有空的时候都做些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFunHobbies5
...Yes.{mildly annoyed/embarrassed.}
ESP.TRADUIT: ...是。{有点恼火/尴尬}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_0003320f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... listen to music. Not the dated nonsense on the radio, of course. Music... It was never ruined for me. Not like everything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...听音乐。当然不是收音机里那些过时的废话，音乐...对我来说，它从来没有被破坏过，不像其他事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_0003320f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It makes me feel calm. It can almost evoke... feelings. Positive ones. I... value that, more than I can say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它让我感到平静。它几乎可以唤起......情感，积极的情绪。 我......无法用言语形容。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_0003320f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, uh... {increasingly embarrassed.}I kind of like flowers. {beat, very sheepish.}They're pretty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...{越来越尴尬}我有点喜欢花,{非常难为情}它们漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_0003320f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaCharlieAssassinJobs.aaaCharlieHobbies to aaaCharlieAssassinJobs.aaaCharlieHobbies + 1
Now we're getting somewhere. Do you do anything that serves no practical purpose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们有进展了，你做过没有实际目的的事情吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFunHobbies6
...How do you figure that?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你怎么知道的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_00033211_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, I knew there was more depth to you than you let on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，我就知道你比看起来更有深度。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFunHobbies7
If... You say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你这么说了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_00033213_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_00033213_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An emotionally-dead, murderous, empty person wouldn't enjoy music and flowers. You're only human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个情感已死、杀人如麻、空虚的人是不会欣赏音乐和鲜花的，你也是人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFunHobbiesEnd1
Right... I'm at your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对...吧...我支持你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_00033216_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardkarma 5 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
You're too hard on yourself. Now, come on, let's get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对自己太苛刻了。现在，来吧，我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFunHobbiesEnd2
...Nobody has ever thought that before.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...以前没有人这样想过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_00033217_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're clearly insane. I suppose I'm obligated to keep you from getting hurt, then. Very well. I've got your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然你是疯了，我想我有义务保护你不受伤害。很好，我支持你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefunho_00033217_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardkarma 5 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 2
I do say so. And we're friends, so that makes me qualified to say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是这么说的，我们是朋友，所以我有资格这么说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePersonalQuestions
If you insist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你便吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_00033812_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to talk about you, Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈你，查理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAnyFamily
I don't know. I don't even know if my parents survived. {beat, mildly cheerful/creepy}Perhaps they died screaming, shortly after selling me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我甚至不知道我父母是否还活着，{温和且有点令人毛骨悚然地}也许他们是在把我卖了之后不久尖叫着死去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieanyfa_00033814_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's entirely possible that I have siblings, aunts or uncles, cousins... Or, perhaps not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全有可能有兄弟姐妹、叔叔阿姨、堂兄弟姐妹......或者,也许没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieanyfa_00033814_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't matter. If I do have family, I don't want to meet them. Shared DNA is a poor excuse for forcing companionship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，即使我有家人，我也不想见他们。共同的DNA是强迫建立情谊的蹩脚借口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieanyfa_00033814_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see no reason to believe that any hypothetical surviving family would be more inclined to care for me than the family I did know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看不出有任何理由相信存在于假想的原生家庭会比我认识的那个家庭更愿意关心我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieanyfa_00033814_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, do you have any family besides your parents?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了你父母，你还有其他亲人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieDifferentLife
If that roving slave-trader hadn't come along, I suppose I would have simply starved to death. My parents clearly didn't want me around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不是那个流动的奴隶贩子来了，我想我早就饿死了。我父母显然不希望我出生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliediffe_00033816_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Supposing that they did actually love me and raise me... Who knows? Maybe I'd be a singer, or a philanthropist. I could have been an author.
ESP.TRADUIT: 假设他们真的爱我，养育我......谁知道呢?也许我会成为一名歌手，或者慈善家。或许我本可以成为一名作家的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliediffe_00033816_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would... Probably be happy. I wouldn't be such a broken wreck of a person. I wouldn't kill people for money, and feel nothing as I watch them die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我......可能会快乐。可能不会变成这样一个精神崩溃的人，不会为了钱而杀人，看着他们死去却毫无感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliediffe_00033816_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... would prefer to speak about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我想说点别的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliediffe_00033816_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
If you had never been enslaved, how do you think your life would have turned out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你从未被奴役过，你觉得你的生活会变成什么样子?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieProfAnecdotes
I don't talk about completed contracts. I'm paid for silence, not just killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不谈论已完成的合同，我的报酬除了杀人，还包括沉默。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprofa_00033e17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, any interesting stories from your assassination work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的暗杀工作有什么有趣的故事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieProfAnecdotes2
No, I've never catastrophically failed a job. Even if I did, I still don't talk about previous contracts, as I've said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有，我从来没有把工作搞砸过，我也不会谈论以前的合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprofa_00033e19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any assassin worth the title doesn't "accidentally" kill anyone. They kill who they mean to kill. No more, no less. I'm much the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何称职的刺客都不会“意外”杀死任何人，他们杀掉他们想杀的人，不多也不少，我也一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprofa_00033e19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for innocents, if you even believe in the concept, it isn't my place to make ethical judgements on my targets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于无辜的人，就算你相信这个概念，我也没有资格对我的目标做出道德判断。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprofa_00033e19_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, I've certainly killed my fair share of people that common society would deem innocent and worthy of protection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，我确实杀了不少被普通社会认为无辜且值得保护的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprofa_00033e19_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know that cliche about the tortured assassin with a heart of gold, with strict rules of honor, never killing women or children?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还记得那句陈词滥调吗？饱受折磨的杀手有一颗金子般的心，有严格的道德准则，从不杀害妇女或儿童？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprofa_00033e19_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That isn't me. I've killed women, children, the unarmed and the defenseless. A target is a target. I don't care about the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是我。我杀过女人，孩子，手无寸铁和手无寸铁的人。目标就是目标，我不在乎其他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprofa_00033e19_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And no, I've never felt one iota of guilt for any of it. I don't really feel anything at all, in any context. I'm rather cold-blooded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我从来没有为此感到一丝内疚，在任何情况下，我都没有任何感觉。我很冷血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprofa_00033e19_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, any botched jobs? Something go wrong in a humorous way? Accidentally shot an innocent?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么失败的经历吗?比如以搞笑的方式出错？不小心射中了一个无辜者？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieParanoidPlayer
I think... That paranoia is wise. If you spend the rest of your life looking over your shoulder, you're less likely to take a knife in the spine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为......你这种偏执是明智的。如果你的余生都在小心翼翼地提防周围的事物，那你就不会在背后被捅几刀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieparan_00033e1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, unless you intend to turn on me, you have nothing to fear in that regard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，除非你打算背叛我，不然你就没什么好害怕的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieparan_00033e1b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't accept contracts on people that I know in any capacity. Even more important is that I'm already under contract to keep you alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不接受任何我认识的人的合同。更重要的是，我已经签了合同，要让你活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieparan_00033e1b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Of course, I would say the same thing if I really were plotting to kill you when you least expect it. I suppose you'll never know.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...当然，如果我真的想在你最意想不到的时候杀了你，我也会这么说。我猜你永远也不会知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieparan_00033e1b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
You know, I've made a lot of enemies... I don't suppose you'd ever try to assassinate me for them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我树敌不少...我想你不会为了他们而暗杀我吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieRelationships
Of course I've fucking never been in a relationship. You'll forgive my saying so, but what an absurd question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然没谈过恋爱，请原谅我这么说，但你这问题问得太荒谬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelat_00033e1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at me. I'm an emotionally dead killer. I've been called a "soulless husk of a human", which seems apt enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看着我。我是个情感上已经死了的杀手，我曾被称为“没有灵魂的人类躯壳”，我人如其名。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelat_00033e1d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if someone were so insane as to desire me, do you truly believe I could reciprocate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使有人疯狂到想要我，你真的相信我能回报他吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelat_00033e1d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have feelings, or empathy, or warmth. I'm not even capable of feeling the most basic physical pleasures that come with relationships.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有感觉，没有同情心，也没有温暖，我甚至感觉不到最基本的生理上的愉悦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelat_00033e1d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't even have platonic friends. I'm not like you. When I die, I'll die alone and unmourned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至没有柏拉图式的朋友。我不像你，当我死的时候，我会孤独而无人哀悼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelat_00033e1d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Cherish what you have. It's more than you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...珍惜你所拥有的，它比你认知的要多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelat_00033e1d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever had any kind of romantic relationship in your life?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这辈子有过恋爱关系吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBuddies
I'm... I apologize. That was cruel of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我道歉，是我的看法太残忍了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuddi_00033e1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... Value you, and your companionship. I've never had anything to compare it with. You'll forgive me if I stumble over my words, sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...很珍惜你和你的陪伴。没有任何东西可以与之相比，如果我有时说话结结巴巴，请原谅我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuddi_00033e1f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I meant no offense. I can say no more than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无意冒犯，我只能说这么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuddi_00033e1f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 3
What do you mean you don't have friends? What about me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么叫你没有朋友？我是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBuddies2
Thank you. I'll make it up to you by killing anyone who actually tries to cause you harm. Surely that's fair?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！我会杀了任何想伤害你的人来补偿你，这样公平了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuddi_00033e22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, lead on. I'll follow you as long as you'll have me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯,继续吧，只要你有我，我就会跟着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuddi_00033e22_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No harm done, Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事，查理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieButtBuddies
Don't be absurd. Why would you have any interest in me, like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别傻了，你为什么会对我感兴趣？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034422_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm very sure I just explained how I'm incapable of affection. There are thousands that would be more suitable for your... feelings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很确定我刚解释了我是如何没有感情的，有成千上万的人更值得你付出......感情
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034422_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No doubt you would be happier pursuing somebody that isn't fundamentally broken, inside and out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，你会更乐意去追求一个内在和外在都没有彻底崩溃的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034422_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, maybe we could be more than just friends, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们可以不只是朋友，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be absurd. Why would you have any interest in me, like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别傻了，你为什么会对我感兴趣？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034423_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm very sure I just explained how I'm incapable of affection. There are thousands that would be more suitable for your... feelings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很确定我刚解释了我是如何没有感情的，有成千上万的人更值得你付出......感情
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034423_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No doubt you would be happier pursuing somebody that isn't fundamentally broken, inside and out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，你会更乐意去追求一个内在和外在都没有彻底崩溃的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034423_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, maybe we could be more than just friends, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们可以不只是朋友，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieKillcount
When you say "men", do you specifically mean adult males, or just mankind in general? Because the latter number is far higher.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你说“人”时，你是指成年男性，还是指一般的人类?因为后者的数字要高得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliekillc_00033e24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for specific numbers... I have no idea. Likely triple digits either way. I'm quite good at what I do, and my prices are very reasonable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于具体的数字......我不知道，可能是三位数。我对自己的工作很在行，价格也很合理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliekillc_00033e24_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing is my profession. I suppose I'm just not interested in making a sport of it, keeping track of numbers and personal records.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀人是我的职业。我想我只是没有兴趣把它当作一种娱乐，记录数字和个人记录。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliekillc_00033e24_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
How many men have you killed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了多少人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePipBoy
Ready for an anticlimax?
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好扫兴了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliepipbo_00033e26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I purchased it. At an exorbitant price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以高价买下了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliepipbo_00033e26_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I read about their uses, and heard testament to how they were the one of the few times Vault-Tec produced something that actually worked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我阅读过它们的用途，并听说它们是避难所科技生产的少数几个真正有效的产品之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliepipbo_00033e26_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I decided it would be a useful tool for my work. No doubt you agree, from personal experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得这对我的工作很有用，从个人经验来看，你无疑是认同我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliepipbo_00033e26_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you get that Pip-Boy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪儿弄来的Pip-Boy？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNoFeelings
I mean what I say. I have no feelings. My emotions are dead. I can experience some instinctual fear or frustration, but little more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是认真的，我没有感情，我的情绪已经死了，我能感受到一些本能的恐惧或挫折，但仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienofee_00034421_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joy, rage, misery, lust... I have none of these things. It extends to physical sensations, too. I don't really feel pain or pleasure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快乐、愤怒、痛苦、欲望....这些东西我都没有。它也反映到身体上的感觉，我真的感觉不到疼痛或愉悦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienofee_00034421_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps it's all a result of how broken my mind is, or maybe it's actually acute nerve damage. I don't know. I don't particularly care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这都是因为我的心碎了，或者实际上是急性神经损伤。我不知道，我也不是特别在意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienofee_00034421_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
When you say you have no feelings, what exactly do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你没有感情，到底是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieButtBuddies2
Well, that's farcical. Besides, even if you're not technically paying my wages, I still consider you to be my client. {not upset}I'm an assassin, not a hooker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有点可笑。再说了，就算你没给我发工资，我还是把你当成我的客户。{平常地}我是刺客，不是妓女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034426_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That said, while your persistence over this subject is mildly obnoxious, I'm not overly bothered. I've found you relatively trustworthy, so far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也就是说，虽然你在这个问题上的坚持有点令人讨厌，但我并没有过度被烦扰。到目前为止，我觉得你还是比较值得信任的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034426_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out of respect, I suppose I'd allow you to broach this topic again, once I'm no longer under contract to you. {beat, grumbling}If you actually care that much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出于尊重，一旦我们的合同结束，我想我可以允许你再次提起这个话题。{牢骚地..}如果你真的那么在乎的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, I have a very clear job to do, and you have... Whatever it is that motivates you. Let's get back to work, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 与此同时，我有很明确的工作要做，而你有...不知道什么在激发你这种情绪，我们回去工作，行吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034426_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 4
Come on, you're really not willing to give me a chance?
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你真的不愿意给我机会吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieButtBuddies3
You didn't offend me. I'm not even capable of feeling offense, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有冒犯我。我甚至都不会觉得冒犯，你懂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034427_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose it's actually almost flattering that you would even consider me for such a thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是觉得你居然会考虑让我做这样的事，简直太荣幸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034427_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rest assured, the issue here is my wealth of emotional and psychological problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放心，这里的问题是我的丰富的情感和心理问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034427_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've no doubt you'll find someone capable of returning your affections, some day. But for now, let's just get back to business, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信总有一天你会找到一个能回报你爱的人。但现在，我们还是谈正事吧，好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebuttb_00034427_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I didn't mean to offend you. I won't bring it up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我不是有意冒犯你，我不会再提这件事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieExitDialogue
Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieexitd_00036254_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough talk for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在说得够多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieManlyDudeName
Met many men named Charlotte, have you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 见过很多叫查理的男人，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemanly_00036257_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No offense, but isn't Charlie a guy's name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但查理不是男人的名字吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNotHiring
Fine. I've already been paid, so I don't care one way or another. If you change your mind, it seems you know where to find me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我已经拿到钱了，所以不管怎样我都不在乎。如果你改变主意了，我想你知道去哪儿找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienothi_00036259_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I don't need any assistance at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我现在不需要任何帮助了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's what you'd prefer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你喜欢的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienothi_0003625b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I don't need any assistance at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我现在不需要任何帮助了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFollowersOpinion
I respect their conviction, even as I'm convinced that they're doomed to fail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊重他们的信念，但我认为他们注定失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefollo_00038048_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Accessible medical aid and the free exchange of ideas are appealing concepts, and most Followers I've met truly believe in what they're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 便捷的医疗援助和自由的思想交流是吸引人的概念，我遇到的大多数天启追随者都对他们所做的事情深信不疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefollo_00038048_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, they're operating from a perspective that most people are inherently good, which doesn't really seem to be true, in my experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，他们的观点是大多数人都是天生善良的，根据我的经验，他们的观点行不通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefollo_00038048_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blithely ignoring reality, no matter how well intentioned, will eventually lead to sorrow and failure. It's only a matter of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 轻率地忽视现实，不管意图有多好，最终都会导致悲伤和失败。这只是时间问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefollo_00038048_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about the Followers of the Apocalypse?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对天启追随者有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAssassinNumbers
Well, that depends on whether you believe the term actually has requirements before it can accurately apply to a person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这取决于你是否认为这个术语能否准确地描述一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieassas_0003804a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no shortage of people who claim themselves to be assassins. If you take them at their word, then the Mojave is flooded with the profession.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有很多人自称是刺客。如果你相信他们的话，那么莫哈韦就到处都是这种职业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieassas_0003804a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, most of these sorts consider "assassination" to mean walking right up to their target and announcing their murderous intent. Then they die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，大多数这类人认为“暗杀”就是径直走向他们的目标，宣布他们的谋杀意图。然后他们就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieassas_0003804a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In my eyes, they're nothing more than worthless thugs, not assassins... No matter how much they might crow otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，他们不过是些毫无价值的暴徒，而不是刺客......不管他们怎么宣称。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieassas_0003804a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actual professional killers, who operate covertly and professionally, are few and far between. So be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真正秘密而专业地行动的职业杀手是少之又少的，就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieassas_0003804a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how many assassins are in the Mojave, you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你觉得莫哈韦沙漠里有多少刺客？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePrices
Are you asking for personal reasons? I'm afraid I can't accept any contracts from you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是出于个人原因？恐怕我不能接受你的任何合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_0003804c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I strongly prefer anonymity from my clients. Dead drops, encrypted communication... Couriers. It's safer for them, and for myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我更希望在客户面前保持匿名，秘密传递情报，加密通信...快递。这样对他们和我都更安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_0003804c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, in general, I don't have a fixed price point. It depends on the target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但一般来说，我没有固定的价位。这取决于目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_0003804c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some random outlaw nobody? Couple hundred caps. High-ranking military personnel? At least a thousand, likely more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 某个无名小卒？几百瓶盖。高级军事人员？至少得一千，或者更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_0003804c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: President Kimball? 100,000 up front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 金博尔总统？100000以上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_0003804c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how much do you charge for your services?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你的服务收费一般是多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePricesKimball
Could I? Absolutely. Would I? ...Unlikely. The only ones I can think of with both the motive and the financial incentive would be the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能吗？绝对的。但我有机会吗？...没有的。我能想到的唯一一个既有动机又有经济能力的就是军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_0003804e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a faction so enraptured by Social Darwinism, they're rather infatuated with the notion that women are incapable of murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于一个对社会达尔文主义如此着迷的派系来说，他们相当崇信女人不会杀人的观念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_0003804e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their loss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是他们的损失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_0003804e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seriously think you could kill President Kimball, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会真以为你能杀了金博尔总统吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...No, courier. No, I don't think I could kill a man that is already dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...不，邮差，我不认为我能杀一个已经死了的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_0003804f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seriously think you could kill President Kimball, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会真以为你能杀了金博尔总统吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePricesPlayer
You have a remarkable talent for surviving attempts on your life, and it tends to go poorly for the prospective killers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在求生方面有非凡的天赋，这对潜在的杀手来说往往是不利的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_00038051_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Factoring personal risk, I'd require... At least 50,000. Possibly more, depending on other factors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到个人风险，我需要...至少50000，也可能更多，取决于其他因素。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_00038051_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next time some amateur killer fails to execute you, search their body for the death order they inevitably stuffed into their pocket...
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次某个业余杀手没能干掉你的时候，搜搜他们的尸体，看看他们会不会把死亡指令放在口袋里......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_00038051_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More likely than not, the payout being offered is laughably small. As if you needed further proof of how worthless an assassin they are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更有可能的是，支付的酬金少得可笑，仿佛你还需要进一步证明他们是多么不值钱的杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprice_00038051_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, hypothetically, how much would you charge to kill me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 假设，杀了我，你会收多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWhyAccept
I'm excellent at killing people. The entity that hired me wants me to follow you and kill anyone who would wish to do you harm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很擅长杀人，雇我的人想让我跟着你杀掉任何想伤害你的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyac_0003864d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of your enemies scare me, and I'm being paid a very agreeable amount, enough to retain my services over a long stretch of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的敌人我都不怕，而且薪水很不错，足以在很长一段时间内维持我的服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyac_0003864d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody wants you alive, courier. Should you feel honored, or terrified?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人要活捉你，邮差。你应该感到荣幸，还是害怕呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyac_0003864d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't get it. Why hire an assassin for bodyguard work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白，为什么要雇杀手做保镖？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWhoHiredYou
If they haven't told you themselves, I'm not going to speculate on their identity or motives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们还没有亲口告诉你，我就不去猜测他们的身份和动机了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhohi_0003864f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've worked for them before, and they've been reliable, as far as clients are concerned. That's all you need to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前为他们工作过，就客户而言他们很可靠。这就是你需要知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhohi_0003864f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing personal. Discretion is part of my contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无关个人，谨慎是我合同的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhohi_0003864f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who hired you for this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁雇你干的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCrierKidBark
You might be surprised by just how many people want that crier boy's head on a pike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会惊讶有多少人想把那个爱哭鬼的脑袋插在长矛上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecrier_00038c4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieJudgeCompanions
Eliza seems to be suffering the delusion that her myriad of angry opinions actually matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊丽莎似乎有一种错觉，以为她那无数愤怒的意见在别人看来很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If all somebody has to complain about are trivialities, it's easy to gauge what an idyllic life they've been blessed with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果一个人抱怨的都是琐事，那就很容易判断出他们的生活是多么的田园诗意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about my other companions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我的其他同伴怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This one drinks too much. I wouldn't rely on her any more than was necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个人喝得太多了。除非必要，我不会依赖她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about my other companions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我的其他同伴怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Medical expertise is always useful, and this one seems adept enough with energy weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 医学专家的知识很管用的，而且这个人似乎很擅长使用能量武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about my other companions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我的其他同伴怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Between myself and Boone, I don't expect you'll be in much danger from would-be assassins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我和布恩中间，我不认为你会受到别的刺客的威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he wanted into the assassination business after the war, I think he has the skills and temperament to be almost as good as I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他想在战后从事暗杀工作，我认为他的技能和气质几乎和我一样好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about my other companions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我的其他同伴怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganBurnHer
Huh. Well, checkmate, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，很好，将军！我猜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburnhe_00039ef5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it, I was looking forward to acting like a dumbass grunt, delegating you with bitchwork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我本来还想表现得像个傻逼，让你去干这事呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburnhe_00039ef5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, yes, you got me. This is what happens when we always have the same operative delivering messages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你说对了，这就是我们总让同一名特工传递信息的后果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburnhe_00039ef5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name is still Morgan. Still need you to do a job for us. The cover was nothing personal, we just prefer to operate discreetly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 名字还是摩根，还需要你帮我们做件事。这不是针对个人，我们只是更喜欢谨慎行事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburnhe_00039ef5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were going to offer you 200 bucks for your time. I'll bump that up to... Let's say 800, and additional benefits upon completion of the job. Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们本来打算给你200块的，我把它加到...假设是800块，工作完成后还会有额外福利。干不干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburnhe_00039ef5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDBurnedApril to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDBurnedApril + 1
Are you with the Office of Mojave Affairs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是莫哈维事务办公室的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNiptonConvo
This seems counterintuitive. I don't know that the Legion is quite as pragmatic as they declare themselves to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这似乎是违反直觉的，我不知道军团是否像他们宣称的那样务实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNiptonProceed
Nipton collaborated with the Legion. Aided them in their trap for the NCR and the Powder Gangers. And yet... Look at their reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尼普顿与军团合作，帮助他们对付NCR和炸药帮，然而......看看他们的现在的回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this is how the Legion repays those who assist it, why would any future towns opt for anything other than fighting to the very last man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果军团就是这样回报那些帮助他们的人的，那么他们所侵略的城镇有什么理由不选择战斗到一兵一卒呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab08_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAmbientShutup
Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieambie_0003ab07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quiet, I'm not looking for conversation right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安静，我现在不想聊天。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNipton1
Evidently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They simply seem like a more disciplined raider band. I grew up surrounded by raiders, and strung-up corpses were a familiar sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们看起来就像一支更有纪律的掠夺者团体，我从小就被掠夺者包围着，吊死的尸体是我熟悉的景象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel as though they were more honest. They did it because it amused them. They never claimed that acts of barbarism would create a better world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他们更诚实，他们这样做是因为他们觉得有趣，他们从未声称野蛮行为会创造一个更好的世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the bloodshed in the world can't change human nature. I don't think Caesar is reading the right historical texts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界上所有的流血事件都改变不了人性，我认为凯撒没有读对历史文献。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion claims to be pragmatic, but they're just sadistic killers, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团自称是务实的，但他们只是残忍的杀手，仅此而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNipton2
...So, is the Legion being directed by a child, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...所以，军团是由一个孩子指挥的，还是...？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nipton was never NCR territory. All the Legion has managed to convey is that they're entirely unreasonable, and motivated primarily by carnage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尼普顿从来都不是NCR的地盘，军团的行为所传达的信息是他们完全不讲道理，纯粹受屠杀的驱使。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If anything, this will simply unite people against the Legion, even if it means reluctantly allying with NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有的话，这只会让人们联合起来对抗军团，即使这意味着不情愿地与NCR结盟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "The NCR may be corrupt and ineffectual, but at least they only want to tax me, which is more than I could say of the Legion."
