ESP.TRADUIT: “NCR可能腐败无能，但至少他们只想向我征税，这比我对军团能说的要多。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something to that effect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 差不多是这个意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's about sending a message to the Mojave, that the NCR cannot protect them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是在向莫哈韦人传达一个信息，即NCR无法保护他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNipton3
I'm aware of the reasoning behind the slaughter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道屠杀背后的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, the crime Nipton was so guilty of was to side with the Legion. If this is how Caesar repays those who collaborate, nobody else ever will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，尼普顿犯下的罪行是为了军团而犯下的，如果这就是凯撒对合作伙伴的回报，那以后没人会这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It simply seems, to me, that if a cornered foe knows that he has no chance to escape, he will fight harder out of spite and rage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，如果一个被逼到绝境的敌人知道他没有机会逃跑，他会出于怨恨和愤怒而更加努力地战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For as flashy as Caesar's methods may be, he's making his conquest more difficult than it has to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管凯撒的手段可能很华丽，但他却让征服变得更加困难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although, I suppose that was already evident, considering how many Legionaries aren't equipped with firearms or first aid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管，我想这已经很明显了，要考虑到有多少军团士兵没有配备精良武器或急救用具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienipto_0003ab0e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This was punishment for Nipton's crimes. It's justice, not butchery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是对尼普顿罪行的惩罚，这是正义，不是屠杀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganFilthyLiar
Geez, that's a pretty harsh way to frame it. 100% accurate, but so harsh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，你这么说也太刻薄了，你说的没错，但太刻薄了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganfilthy_0003b71b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's your sense of adventure? Come on, now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的冒险精神哪儿去了？来吧，现在！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganfilthy_0003b71b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. If you know what the OMA is, you know we do some cloak-and-dagger plausible-deniability covert-ops nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无所谓，如果你知道莫哈维事务办公室是什么，你就知道我们做了一些看似合理的秘密行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganfilthy_0003b71b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And yes, sometimes, that means we commit the unforgivable atrocity of fudging the truth with outside operatives. You'll get over it. Eventually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，有时候，这意味着我们犯下了不可原谅的暴行，并且对外捏造了真相。最终你会习惯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganfilthy_0003b71b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, will you accept this trivially easy operation, or are you going to refuse because I'm a mean person that lied about my exact occupation once?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是愿意接受这个简单的行动，还是拒绝？就因为曾经隐瞒过我的职业我就是一个卑鄙的人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganfilthy_0003b71b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would I want to work for someone who just lied to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为什么要为一个刚刚对我撒谎的人工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganWhatJob
Just gotta make a little run to a farm shack, maybe a half-hour away, tops. Pick up something, bring it on back. Easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去一间农舍，最多半个小时的路程，拿点东西回来。一件容易的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganwhatjo_0003bd1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not allowed to give out more details unless you accept the job, so... I'm sure you're dying of curiosity...
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你接受这份工作，否则我不能透露更多细节，所以...我敢肯定你好奇得要命......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganwhatjo_0003bd1f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganRefuseForever
Well. You've completely defied my expectations of you. ...Congratulations...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，你完全辜负了我对你的期望...恭喜...？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganrefuse_0003e128_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Get out. Idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，出去，白痴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganrefuse_0003e128_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaaDeniedRyanMessage
No. I'm not interested. Don't contact me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不感兴趣，别再联系我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganAcceptJob1
Alright, that's perfect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这很完美。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganaccept_0003bd23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to be heading to one of the shacks on the Horowitz Farm. It's been co-opted by a person of interest we're investigating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去霍洛维茨农场的一间棚屋，我们正在调查的一名嫌疑人去过那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganaccept_0003bd23_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He likely won't be there, so don't worry about that. Instead, worry about finding a gray, metal briefcase. We know it's stashed in there, somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他可能不会在里面，所以不用担心。但你要留意的是一个灰色的金属公文包，我们知道它就藏在那里的某个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganaccept_0003bd23_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get that briefcase, don't let it get shot or burned or anything silly like that, and bring it back to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把那个公文包带来，别让它被枪打中，或者被火烧了其他什么蠢事，把它安然无恙交给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganaccept_0003bd23_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Job's simple, and then you get paid. Good luck, and all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很简单的工作，然后你就能得到报酬。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganaccept_0003bd23_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMorganQuest1 10
Fine, I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我做就是了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaHackerAlexWhatIsIt
Well that's what we're going to fucking figure out, because I'm a fucking god at this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我们要搞清楚的，因为我是这方面的上帝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0703A4FB] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult04\aaamorganq_aaahackeralexwh_0003bd31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some encrypted conspiracy nutjob's psychotic ramblings. Heh. "I'm so slick, the NCR will never know I'm on to them!" You lose, bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些被加密过的疯子神经病的胡说八道，呵呵。“我太油滑了，NCR永远都不会知道我发现了他们!”你输了,婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0703A4FB] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult04\aaamorganq_aaahackeralexwh_0003bd31_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That fucking hack Feldstein only wishes he could work with shit this high-technical. Heh, how's your robot fuckbuddy feel now, Melvin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个该死的黑客费尔德斯坦只想捣鼓这些高科技的东西。嘿，你的机器人现在感觉怎么样，梅尔文？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0703A4FB] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult04\aaamorganq_aaahackeralexwh_0003bd31_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you're still here? Fuck off and let me work. Go talk to Morgan. Some of us actually have fucking jobs to do here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你还在这里？滚开，让我工作。去和摩根谈，我们中有些人还真他妈有工作要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0703A4FB] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult04\aaamorganq_aaahackeralexwh_0003bd31_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what exactly is in this briefcase?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，这个公文包里到底有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaHackerAlexGoodbye
Pfft. Whatever. Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啐，无所谓，滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alex [0703A4FB] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult04\aaamorganq_aaahackeralexgo_0003bd33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well Alex, pleasant as this conversation has been, I need to report back to Morgan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿利克斯，虽然谈话很愉快，但我要向摩根汇报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganQuest1Reward
Oh, well, let me address that right now. Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我现在就说，干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganquest1_0003bd36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An extra reward is that I get to let you in on a little secret. It turns out... I'm not actually in the military.
ESP.TRADUIT: 额外的奖励是我可以告诉你一个小秘密，实际上...我并不是军人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganquest1_0003bd36_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no, this is actually an Office of Mojave Affairs operation. This briefcase runaround? Just seeing if we could rely on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，这实际上是莫哈韦事务办公室的行动，这个公文包是借口，只是想看看我们能不能信任你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganquest1_0003bd36_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, don't worry yourself over this bureaucratic nonsense. Just a formality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，别在意这些官僚主义的瞎闹了，只是走个形式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganquest1_0003bd36_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I think I may have a related job here, let me see if they've forwarded me the file...
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我想我可能有相关的工作，让我看看他们是否把文件转发给我了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganquest1_0003bd36_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem NCRMoney100 2
Right. I don't think you even told me how much I was being paid for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对的，我觉得你都没告诉过我，我赚了多少钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to remind me. I always keep paperwork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用提醒我，我总是留有纸质文件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganquest1_0003bd37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, that briefcase run was just a little... Let's call it a quality assurance test. Want to make sure you're competent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个公文包的事有点...让我们称之为质量保证测试，以确保你有能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganquest1_0003bd37_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I may have a related job here, let me see if they've forwarded me the file...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我可能有相关的工作，让我看看他们是否把文件转发给我了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganquest1_0003bd37_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem NCRMoney100 8
800, I think you said it was?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得你说的是800？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieTribalVillageBark
Interesting. What would bring the Khans and Fiends to blows? Perhaps the Khans tried to save the villagers? Too late, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣，是什么让大汗帮和恶魔帮打起来的?也许大汗帮试图拯救村民?太晚了，我觉得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlietriba_0003c332_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBitterSpringsConvo
I've heard about what happened here. Makes me feel confident in my own methodology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经听说这里发生的事了，让我对自己的方法很有信心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c337_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody bothered with performing recon, gathering intel as to whether or not their targets were even present.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有人会费心进行侦察，收集有关他们的目标是否存在的情报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c337_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The commanders had no grasp on the situation on the ground, and the soldiers had no idea what they ought to be doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 指挥官们不了解地面上的形势，士兵们也不知道自己应该做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c337_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR even failed to capitalize on it for propaganda purposes. They could have used it as a show of their strength and unfettered resolve.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR甚至没有将其用于宣传，他们本可以用它来展示他们的力量和冲破任何障碍的决心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c337_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Instead, they meekly apologize and deflect blame. They come off as idiotic, bloodthirsty, and weak-willed. Ridiculous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相反，他们谦恭地道歉并转移责任，他们表现得愚蠢、嗜血、意志薄弱，荒谬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c337_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
aaaCharlieBitterSprings1
I leave matters of ethics and morality to philosophers and philanthropists. I'm an assassin. I don't see much inherent value in human life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把伦理和道德问题留给哲学家和慈善家。我是一个杀手，我看不出人的生命有什么内在价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c339_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whether or not the attack was justified is irrelevant to me. I'm simply unable to grasp how they failed so badly on so many levels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次攻击是否正当与我无关，我简直无法理解他们为何在这么多层面上都失败得如此严重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c339_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An organized military accidentally massacres a village of noncombatants. It sounds like the punchline to a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一支有组织的军队意外地屠杀了一个平民村庄，这听起来像是笑话的笑点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c339_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. Fretting over the past is a mistake. Shall we proceed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 无所谓了，对过去耿耿于怀是个错误，我们继续好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c339_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It almost sounds as if you approve of the idea behind the attack, if not the methods.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听上去你好像很赞同攻击背后的想法，如果不是方法的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBitterSprings2
I think they already have. The people of the Mojave despise them. They've made themselves out to be murderous conquerors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他们已经在付出代价了，莫哈韦人鄙视他们，他们把自己变成了凶残的征服者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c33b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a nation so fond of espousing the importance of justice and democracy, this is a stain they can never wash away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于一个如此热衷于拥护正义和民主重要性的政权来说，这是一个他们永远洗不掉的污点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c33b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Bitter Springs massacre was an atrocity, and the NCR has to pay for what they did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 苦泉大屠杀是一场暴行，NCR必须为他们的所作所为付出代价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBitterSprings3
Perhaps. The enmity between the NCR and the Khans is very old. Each side has wounded the other. Fault depends on who you believe drew first blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许，NCR和大汗帮之间的敌意由来已久，双方都伤害了对方，错误取决于你认为谁先让对方见了血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c33d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't particularly care who struck first, nor do I believe any one side is morally justifiable. I have no stake in any of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不特别在意谁先出手，我也不相信任何一方在道义上是正当的。我跟这事一点关系都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c33d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Above all else, the infamous Bitter Springs Incident, Massacre, whatever you want to call it... It was all utterly pointless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最重要的是，臭名昭著的苦泉事件...大屠杀，不管你怎么称呼它...都毫无意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebitte_0003c33d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Khans brought this on themselves. The NCR did what was necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是大汗帮自找的，NCR做了必要的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganBurkeCheck
Well... It seems that my contact got himself distracted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...好像是我的线人走神了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburkec_0003d533_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's this ongoing manhunt for an NCR fugitive right now. Some senator's son was getting too handsy with the kids, and fled when he got busted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在正在追捕一名NCR逃犯，某个参议员的儿子对儿童施暴，被抓后就逃跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburkec_0003d533_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems my contact is busy trying to monitor this fugitive situation, rather than giving me my necessary intel. Prick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我的线人正忙着监视这个逃犯的情况，而不是给我必要的情报，他妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburkec_0003d533_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... It seems I got nothing for you, at the moment. I suppose your choices are to wedge your thumb firmly up your ass and wait patiently...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...看来我现在没什么工作给你。我想你的选择是把拇指牢牢地塞进屁股里，然后耐心地等待......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburkec_0003d533_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, if you really care, you could go and join in this manhunt and resolve shit quickly. They'd pay you, too, if that helps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，如果你真的在乎，你可以加入我们的追捕行动迅速解决问题。如果成功的话，他们也会给你钱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburkec_0003d533_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check back with me later, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得，你可以过会儿再来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburkec_0003d533_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaaNRBurkeMessage
Well? You have a job for me, or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好?你到底给不给我工作?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out I do. Good. Here's a dossier on this guy. You can read it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上有。好，这是那家伙的档案，你可以读也可以不读。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburkec_0003e730_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, Blake, the lunatic who had that briefcase you retrieved, is almost certainly in correspondence with this guy in the dossier, here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，布莱克，你取回的那个公文包的主人，几乎可以肯定和卷宗里的这个人有联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburkec_0003e730_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaEddieHurstDossier 1
Well? You have a job for me, or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好?你到底给不给我工作?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out I do. Good. Here's a dossier on this guy. You can read it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上有。好，这是那家伙的档案，你可以读也可以不读。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburkec_0003e731_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, Blake, the lunatic who had that briefcase you retrieved, is almost certainly in correspondence with this guy in the dossier, here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，布莱克，你取回的那个公文包的主人，几乎可以肯定和卷宗里的这个人有联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganburkec_0003e731_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaEddieHurstDossier 1
Well? You have a job for me, or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好?你到底给不给我工作?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganExplainBriefcase1
Oh, that tantalizing, was it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太诱人了，是吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e725_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, maybe once you complete this monumental task that I've assigned you, we can discuss it further.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许等你完成了我交给你的这项重大任务，我们可以进一步讨论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e725_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on, now. There's a sweaty hacker that is desperately crying out for this briefcase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，继续。有个满头大汗的黑客拼了命的想得到这个公文包。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e725_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, I need to know what was going on in that shack where I found the briefcase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，我想知道我找到公文包的那个棚屋里发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganOkayLeaving
Yep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganokayle_0003e724_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'm going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganExplainBlake
Ah. That was the temporary safehouse of the enigmatic Mr. Blake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，那是神秘的布莱克先生的临时安全屋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e727_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blake is some paranoid anarchist nutjob. He does it all. Crazy manifestos, pirate radio stations, encrypted communications... All of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布莱克是个多疑的无政府主义者。他什么都做，疯狂的宣言、海盗电台、加密通讯......一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e727_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's mostly obsessed with the evil secret agendas of the NCR government, but he's more than happy to theorize about House and/or Caesar, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他主要沉迷于NCR政府邪恶的秘密议程，但他也很乐意为高谈阔论豪斯或凯撒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e727_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Why would you care about this, hmm?" I hear you asking.
ESP.TRADUIT: "你为什么要关心这个"我听到你在问了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e727_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For one, this dick keeps trying to incite his lunatic followers to harass NCR personnel and damage or steal our property.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，这个混蛋一直试图煽动他的疯狂追随者骚扰NCR人员，破坏或窃取我们的财产。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e727_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worse, he's actually managed to, on occasion, worm his way into something classified, whereupon he gleefully exposes it to the world at large.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更糟糕的是，他有时还设法潜入一些机密的领域，然后兴高采烈地将其公之于众。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e727_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're trying to win a war here. We don't have the time to deal with petty sabotage and intelligence leaks from this paranoid asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在努力赢得一场战争，我们没时间去处理这个多疑的混蛋的小阴谋和泄露的情报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e727_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I need to know what was up with that shack where I found your briefcase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我得知道我找到公文包的那个棚屋是怎么回事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganExplainBriefcase2
Encrypted hard drives. That originally belonged to us. Well, not "us" as in the OMA, but "us" as in the NCR as a whole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加密的硬盘。原本属于我们的，不是莫哈维事务办公室里的"我们"，而是NCR里的"我们"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e729_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No doubt he already cracked them and backed-up all of the classified intel. We're just analyzing it to see if he left anything behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，他已经破解了并且备份了所有的机密情报，我们只是在分析看看他有没有留下什么线索。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e729_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At this point, we've just accepted that he has bolt-holes and escape plans for every possible scenario.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这一点上，我们已经收到了他有各种可能的藏身之处和逃跑计划的情报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e729_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Catching him is nigh on impossible, but if we startle him, we can usually get our hands on whatever he left behind. Little bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准确地抓住他几乎是不可能的，但如果我们吓到他，我们通常可以拿到他留下的东西，小混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e729_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well. Eventually he'll slip up, and that will be the end of that. He wants to speculate about government black sites? That's where he'll be kept.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，最终他会失手的，那他就完了，他不是整天推测政府的黑狱吗?他就会被关在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganexplai_0003e729_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what was in that briefcase, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个公文包里到底有什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganOMADetails
That's classified. I love that response, it never gets old.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是机密。我喜欢这个回答，它永远不会过时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganomadet_0003e72b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Office of Mojave Affairs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说莫哈韦事务办公室吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganSawyerCallback
I'm aware you've worked with us in the past, but the name of your contact means nothing to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你以前和我们合作过，但你联系人的名字对我来说毫无意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorgansawyer_0003e72d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We operate in compartmentalized cells, under false identities. It could be that I've worked alongside your Sawyer at some point. No idea, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们用假身份，单独行动。可能是我曾经和你的索耶一起工作过，但不知道，真的不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorgansawyer_0003e72d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our intelligence is centralized, but we've ensured that one cell cannot compromise any others, under any circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的情报是集中的，但我们保证了一个小组在任何情况下都不能危及其他小组。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorgansawyer_0003e72d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I worked with an OMA operative named Sawyer. You know him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和一个叫索耶的OMA特工合作过，你认识他吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganAboutAlex
Ah, yes. Alex. What a repulsive man, isn't he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，对，阿利克斯，他真是个令人讨厌的人，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a savant with encryptions, and a complete ass in every other respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个加密专家，但除此之外在其他方面都是个十足的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like yourself, he's an independent contractor. Unlike you, Alex is worthless in the field. He's here for one job, then we cut him loose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和你一样也是个独立承包人，跟你不一样的是他在这个领域没什么价值。他来这里只做了一件事，然后我们就解雇了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he were a trifle less arrogant, perhaps he could have made something of himself. Oh well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他不那么傲慢，也许他还能出人头地，吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up with Alex?
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿利克斯怎么了?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganStartEddiesQuest
That's the name. Supposedly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这个名字，据说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganstarte_0003ed34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurst worked in close proximity to some government officials, about a decade ago. Seems he may have been collecting some privileged information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大约十年前，赫斯特曾与一些政府官员有过亲密接触，看来他可能在收集一些机密信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganstarte_0003ed34_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't bore you with the classified specifics, but Hurst is implicated in selling some intelligence to Blake, our briefcase thief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想跟你说机密细节，但赫斯特涉嫌向布莱克，就是那个偷公文包的人，出卖情报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganstarte_0003ed34_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurst is holed up in Red Rock Canyon, we believe. Shacked up with some Great Khan friends of his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们认为赫斯特躲在红石峡谷，和他大汗帮的一些朋友住在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganstarte_0003ed34_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need a third party, you, to make contact with Hurst. Do whatever you need to do to squeeze Blake's location from him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要一个第三方，就是你，去找到赫斯特，尽你所能从他那里逼问出布莱克的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganstarte_0003ed34_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes, on a different note, here's something you may be interested in. I hired an assassin for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的，另一方面，这是你可能感兴趣的事，我为你雇了个刺客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorganstarte_0003ed34_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaEddieHurstQuest 10
Eddie Hurst. Who is this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾迪·赫斯特？他是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMorganCharlie
Did I get you going?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我让你走了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorgancharli_0003ed36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I've contracted an assassin, a rather skilled one, to back you up, if you deem it necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，如果你认为有必要的话，我已经雇了一个相当熟练的刺客来帮你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorgancharli_0003ed36_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're quite an asset to the Office. It wouldn't do for you to fall prey to angry raiders or Legion retribution squads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是我们的重要人才，这能保障你不会成为愤怒的掠夺者或军团暗杀小队的猎物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorgancharli_0003ed36_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This assassin said that you could contact them in Freeside. It's near that water pump; I'll mark it on your map there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在自由城找到这个刺客，就在水泵附近，我会在你的地图上标出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorgancharli_0003ed36_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, that's all I have for you. Let me know what sorts of valuable intelligence you can squeeze out of Hurst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，这就是我给你的全部信息。把你你能从赫斯特那里得到的有价值的情报告诉我就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : April Morgan [070193D4] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaamorganq_aaamorgancharli_0003ed36_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaCharlieHelpNote 1 ShowMap aaaCharlieMapMarkerREF
Excuse me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstProceedQuest
Oh, for fuck's sake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，看在他妈的上帝的份上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0003fb14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll tell you the same story I've told everyone else, okay? I don't fucking know who Blake is, and I don't give a fuck, neither.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟别人说过同样的故事了，好吗?我他妈不知道布莱克是谁，我也不在乎他是谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0003fb14_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, look, I stole some fucking documents, this Blake guy wanted to buy them, he operated through a courier, so I never met him...
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我偷了一些该死的文件，这个叫布莱克的家伙想买这些文件，他通过一个邮差进行联络，所以我没见过他...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0003fb14_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We made our wonderful exchange through a dead drop, so I never fucking met him. That's it. Now, fuck off, NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们通过情报传递点进行了一些精彩的交流，但我从没见过他。就是这样，现在滚吧，NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0003fb14_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You Eddie Hurst? I need to ask you about a guy named Blake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾迪·赫斯特吗?我想跟你打听一个叫布莱克的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstPoceed2
Oh, not a company man, eh? Independent contractor, then? Ha, you're just like me, friendo. I fell into the same old scam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不是组织的人，对吧?独立的承包人?哈，你跟我一样，朋友，我又落入了同样的圈套。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpo_0003fb16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was working for the Burke estate. Clerical bullshit, total garbage. Wasn't trusted with nothing, but I grabbed the good papers all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为伯克家族工作。办事员的话就是废话，什么都不能信，但我还是找到了一些有用的文件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpo_0003fb16_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was 14 years ago. Old Henry has more important things to worry about, like his nasty fucking son.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是14年前的事了，而且老亨利现在有更重要的事要操心，比如他那可恶的儿子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpo_0003fb16_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I met that little fucker a couple of times. Heh. I laughed when I heard what happened to him. Goes to show, you grow up wealthy, you end up an ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过那小混蛋几次，哈。当我听到发生在他身上的事时，我笑了，出身富贵，最后却成了混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpo_0003fb16_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not with the NCR. I'm a third party, just asking some questions for a job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与NCR无关，我是第三方，只是问些工作方面的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstBurkeCheck
That was you? Ha! Good fucking job!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你干的?哈!干得真他妈漂亮!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_00040111_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you hear the little bastard confess? Full confession, guilty of all charges, no need for a big show trial.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到那个小混蛋的忏悔了吗?全部认罪，所有罪名成立，不用搞什么公审。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_00040111_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! I just know his Senator daddy was waiting in the wings with his corrupt legal team, ready to get the child-rapist off scot-free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈!我只知道他的参议员老爸和他腐败的法律团队在一旁等着，准备让那个儿童强奸犯逍遥法外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_00040111_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope! Adam spilled his guts to the whole world. I can just imagine how purple the Senator's face got when he saw his "legacy" carted off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不!亚当向全世界吐露了心声。我可以想象，当参议员看到他的“家族遗产”被带走时，他的脸涨得有多紫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_00040111_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And let me tell you, some rich-boy senator's son, never worked a day in his life, soft and weak as can be... Locked up in serious prison...
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我告诉你，某个富翁参议员的儿子，一生中从未工作过一天，软弱无能...被关进监狱...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_00040111_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that same soft little bitch is in there for fucking kids? Heh, I think little Adam is going to be on the receiving end of his favorite hobby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个软弱的小贱人因为强暴儿童而关进监狱。我觉得小亚当会成为他的爱好付出代价
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_00040111_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Serves him fucking right, you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我说，他活该。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_00040111_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the one that brought Adam Burke back to trial.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我让亚当·伯克重回法庭的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was you? Well why the fuck hasn't someone slapped a medal or twelve on your chest? Ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干的?那为什么他妈的没人在你胸口上拍一枚或者十二枚奖章?哈!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_00040112_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I met that little shit a couple of times. As a kid, I wanted to slap the teeth out of his entitled mouth. Guess he got worse with age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过那小混蛋几次，当他还是个孩子的时候，我就想把他的牙齿从他的嘴里打出来。我觉得他年纪越大会越坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_00040112_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bet his daddy'll never forgive you. That asshole was fucking obsessed with "the Burke Legacy" and his part in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌他爸爸永远不会原谅你的，那个混蛋沉迷于"伯克家族遗产"和他在其中的角色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_00040112_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck him. I worked for that prick, and I can say with confidence that him, and that entire family, can all burn in hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操他妈的，我为那个混蛋工作过，我可以自信地说，他和他的整个家庭，绝对会下地狱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_00040112_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Adam Burke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了亚当·伯克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstProceed3
Not a liar. I told you the truth already. I told the truth a dozen times. NCR dogs keep coming after me, barking the same bullshit story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不骗你，我已经告诉你真相了。我说了很多次真相了，但NCR的狗一直追着我，吠着同样的狗屁话语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0004072a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I was still in Cali, no doubt they'd have thrown me into a very tiny cell and left me to rot. But the military ain't arresting nobody.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我还在加州，他们肯定会把我关进一个小牢房，任我自生自灭，但军方不会逮捕任何人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0004072a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what it is? I think that they're looking for a fall guy. They want to pin all the intel leaks they can onto me, alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道是为什么吗?我觉得他们在找替罪羊，他们想把所有泄露的情报都栽赃给我一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0004072a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And why not? They know I'm good for at least one intelligence brief. I'm a junkie, ha-ha, nobody cares to defend us druggie shits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不呢?他们知道我至少掌握一份情报简报。我是个瘾君子，哈哈，没人愿意为我们这些瘾君子辩护。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0004072a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, I know you're just some contractor. Nobody in NCR would lay a finger on that Burke kid, no way. Not with the clout his daddy swings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我知道你只是个外部人员，NCR里没人敢碰伯克家那小子，任何人都不敢。不只是因为他爸爸的影响力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0004072a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck Blake. I got some dirt on the dirtiest family in the whole fucking country. And I can promise you, they already want you dead, mailman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操他妈的布莱克，我掌握了这个国家最肮脏的家族的丑事，我可以向你保证，他们早就想让你死了，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0004072a_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you really don't know how to find this Blake guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的不知道怎么找到那个叫布莱克的家伙吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstProceed4
I want to kick the Burke estate in their balls, friend. And since you've already spat on the Senator's precious legacy, you oughta help me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要踢爆伯克家族的蛋蛋，朋友。既然你已经对参议员的宝贵遗产吐了口水，那你应该帮我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0004072c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mr. Big Senator won't ever forget what you did. He's a vindictive old cunt, and he'll hound your ass until you're dead and buried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 参议员先生永远不会忘记你的所作所为，他是个记仇的老婊子，他会一直缠着你直到你尸骨无存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0004072c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I'll tell you what. I can sweeten the pot for you. If you really care that fucking much about that Blake moron, I might be able to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你，我可以给你点甜头。如果你真的那么在乎那个叫布莱克的白痴，我也许能帮上忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0004072c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you the truth. I don't know where he is, and I've never met him. But I could probably bait him out. Whatever, he don't mean shit to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说的是实话，我不知道他在哪，我也没见过他。但我可以引他出来，无所谓的，他对我一点价值都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0004072c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got a deal? You'd be fucking crazy to say no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 成交了吗?你要是拒绝就太他妈吃亏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpr_0004072c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want from me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底想要我怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstAcceptDeal
Now we're fucking talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们他妈的在说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstac_00040d29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The plan is this: I know of three family contacts that ain't blood relations, or weird-loyal servants, like that creep Zed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 计划是这样的：我知道有三个家族联系人既没有血缘关系，也不是什么奇怪的忠仆，比如那个变态泽德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstac_00040d29_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You pick their brains, get them to cough up anything they know about Burke's scheming bullshit, and bring it back here to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去打探他们的想法，让他们说出所有他们知道的关于伯克阴谋的事，然后回来告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstac_00040d29_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We throw it all together, along with everything I know, and all your dealings with Adam the kid-toucher, and we put together the narrative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们把所有的信息拼在一起，包括我知道的，还有你和那个儿童强奸犯亚当的合约。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstac_00040d29_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We get everything in place, we release it publicly, and I get your pal Blake to stick his head up to investigate. Everybody wins. Except Burke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们把一切准备好，公开发布，然后我找那个叫布莱克的伙计出来调查，这样我们每个人都赢了，除了伯克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstac_00040d29_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, the three contacts I'm aware of, named Paul Winters, Stan Gold, and Kevin Massey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所知道的三个联系人：保罗·温特斯，斯坦·戈尔德，和凯文·梅西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstac_00040d29_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaEddieHurstQuest 20
Fine, I'm in. What do you have in mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好,我加入。你有什么想法?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstRefuseDealForever
Yeah? Fine, dumbass. I don't give a fuck. You're the one they want dead, so have fun with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗?好吧,笨蛋。我才不管呢，反正你才是他们想杀的人，好好享受吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstre_0004072f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaaDeniedRyanMessage
I want nothing to do with this. Leave me out of your scheming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想跟这事扯上关系，别把我卷进你的阴谋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstKevinMassey
Massey worked on the Burke's ranch, back west. The Brahmin industry is what made the Burkes rich, and they're still in business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 梅西在西部伯克家的农场工作，婆罗门产业让伯克一家变得富有，他们现在还在经营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstke_00040d2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those Brahmin baron types have always been ruthless, but anything that happened on the Burke estate is beyond me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些婆罗门男爵总是很无情，但伯克家族发生的任何事都超出了我的理解范围。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstke_00040d2b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wanna know more, gonna have to talk with someone who was there. Now, I know Massey got arrested a while back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想知道更多，就得和在场的人谈谈，我知道梅西前不久被捕了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstke_00040d2b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I also know that the prison got busted open, and all the ex-cons are wild and free. Our guy might just be with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我也知道监狱被破门而入，所有的囚犯都自由了，我们的人可能被他们收买了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstke_00040d2b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaKevinMasseyQuest 10
Tell me about Kevin Massey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说凯文·梅西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstZed
Zed? He's the security chief for the Burke estate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 泽德吗?他是伯克家族的安全主管。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstze_00040d2d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He does whatever the Burkes need done, and gives them plausible deniability while he's at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伯克一家需要他做什么，他就做什么，还能给他们合理的推诿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstze_00040d2d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently, he's been knocking around the estate, doing the dirty jobs for the head of the family for over a century.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，一个多世纪以来，他一直在庄园里游荡，为一家之主做些肮脏的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstze_00040d2d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll tell you right now, when Burke cries for your head after that shit with his son, it'll be Zed hiring the assassins for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就告诉你，如果伯克因为他儿子的事哭着要你的命，泽德一定会替他雇杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstze_00040d2d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned Zed. Who's that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到的泽德，他是谁?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstZed2
Ghoul. Bigger and faster than most ghouls you meet, though. Most of 'em got pretty bad muscle atrophy. Not Zed, though. Guess he works out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个尸鬼，不过比你遇到的大多数尸鬼都要大和快，他们大部分都有严重的肌肉萎缩，但泽德没有，我猜他经常锻炼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstze_00040d2f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zed's been with the family for over a century? Is he a mutant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 泽德和这家人在一起一个多世纪了?他是变种人吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstRRC
NCR keeps sending their people to interrogate me. If I was in Cali, they'd throw me in a cell and leave my ass to rot.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR一直派人来调查我，如果我在加州，他们会把我关进监狱，任我自生自灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstrr_0004132a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As it is, I just get soldiers and freelancers, like you, hounding my ass. Enough's enough of that shit, I say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我只是被士兵和像你一样的自由职业者追着我的屁股跑。 够了，我说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstrr_0004132a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of those assholes are going to bother fighting through the heart of Khan territory just to have me say: "Dunno where Blake is" again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些混蛋应该不会为了让我再说一遍“不知道布莱克在哪里”而穿越大汗帮领土的中心地带。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstrr_0004132a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, my buddy Three-Piece is in the Khans. He and I go way back. He vouched for me, so the Khans are okay with me hanging around, for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外，我哥们三件套是大汗帮的。我和他是老相识了，他为我做了担保，所以大汗帮暂时同意我留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstrr_0004132a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you in Red Rock Canyon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么来红岩峡谷?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstBurkeBackground
I did clerical bullshit for one of his campaigns, back 14 years ago, I think it was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 14年前，我为他的一次竞选做过文书的狗屁工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_0004132c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I wasn't witness to anything too out there. Burke ain't dumb enough to openly discuss his dirty business around random peons like me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我也没有什么有价值的情报。伯克不会蠢到在随随便便的一个人面前公开谈论他的肮脏勾当。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_0004132c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I know my fair share of lesser crimes. There was serious embezzlement, bribery, bit of blackmail here or there...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我知道我也犯过一些小罪过，这里或那里有点贪污、贿赂、敲诈......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_0004132c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And of course, he's good buddies with President Kimball. That one ain't so shady on it's own, but we all know he's getting kickbacks from it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，他和金博尔总统是好朋友。这个案子本身并没有那么可疑，但我们都知道他从中拿回扣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstbu_0004132c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You worked for Burke. What did you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为伯克工作过，你做的什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyAdvanceQuest
I did. I was a ranch hand on their estate back in California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做过，我是他们在加州的农场的保安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyadvanc_00041927_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not particularly interested in politics nor the familial rivalries of Brahmin dynasties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对政治和婆罗门王朝的家族争斗都不是特别感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyadvanc_00041927_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sense you're angling for some sort of specific information, though. What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我觉得你想知道一些具体的信息，是什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyadvanc_00041927_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you worked for the Burke estate. Care to answer some questions about that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你在伯克家工作，能回答我一些问题吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyAdvanceQuest2
Ah, I see what this is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我知道这是什么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyadvanc_0004192a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I believe I could tell you a few things that may interest you. However, I'm in a delicate situation here. I'd need something in return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我相信我可以告诉您一些您会感兴趣的事情。但是，我现在的处境很微妙。我需要一些回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyadvanc_0004192a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing immoral, just helping get me to a safer position than Powder Gang territory. Agreed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是什么不道德的事，只是帮我找个比炸药帮更安全的地方，OK?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyadvanc_0004192a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to bring the Burkes down. I need to know if you saw anything suspect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想扳倒伯克家族，想知道你有没有看到过什么可疑的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyAcceptDeal
Excellent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyaccept_0004192c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I like to plan ahead. When I was arrested, I contacted a friend of mine in the Mojave to put together a little supply cache for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我喜欢提前做计划。当我被捕时，我联系了一个在莫哈韦的朋友帮我准备了一些补给。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyaccept_0004192c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't expect my exit from prison would be near as explosive as it was, but I did have some vague notions of slipping away one night, sight unseen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没想到我从监狱里出来会有这么大的轰动，但我确实有个模糊的想法，某天晚上偷偷溜走，没人发现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyaccept_0004192c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've tried several times to contact my friend, but I've have no luck. Knowing how things are, I expect something unpleasant may have occurred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着联系了几次我的朋友，但都没联系上。就我所知，我想可能发生了什么不愉快的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyaccept_0004192c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you would be so kind as to head to the tribal village near Goodsprings and retrieve my supplies for me, I would be most grateful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能好心地前往清泉镇附近的部落村庄帮我取回补给，我将不胜感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyaccept_0004192c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaKevinMasseyQuest 20
I accept your terms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我接受你的条件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyRefuseDeal
Then I'm disinclined to provide you with anything you may desire for your Burke smear campaign.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我可不愿意为你的伯克家诽谤计划提供任何你想要的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyrefuse_0004192e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have a change of heart and find yourself more agreeable, I likely will as well. Until then, adios.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你改变心意，觉得自己更讨人喜欢了，我可能也会的。在那之前,再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyrefuse_0004192e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not doing busywork for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来给你干活的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyContinueQuest
Much obliged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乐意效劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseycontin_00041933_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yes, excellent. He even managed to scrounge up an assault rifle. Very handy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,是的,好极了。他甚至设法弄到了一把突击步枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseycontin_00041933_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The village was full of Cazadors? I hope you killed them all, painfully. My friend what put together this supply cache deserved better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 村里全是大毒蜂?我希望你把它们都痛苦的杀掉了，我的朋友应该把这些东西藏得更好一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseycontin_00041933_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, this will help quite a bit. However, I can't help but notice that there isn't a change of clothes in this box, anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，这个会帮上大忙的。然而我不禁注意到，这个盒子里到处都没有换洗的衣服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseycontin_00041933_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't believe it would be wise for me to venture into the world, still wearing this nifty blue shirt that proudly advertises my fugitive status.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为我仍然穿着这件漂亮的蓝色衬衫在世界上冒险是明智的，它骄傲的宣示着我的逃犯身份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseycontin_00041933_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could I trouble you to grab a set of leather armor for me? It would come in handy for a career I'm strongly considering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能麻烦你帮我找一套皮盔甲吗?对于我正在考虑的职业生涯来说，这迟早会派上用场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseycontin_00041933_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaKevinMasseyQuest 40
I got that supply cache you wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿到了你要的补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyLeatherArmor1
Much obliged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乐意效劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyleathe_00041939_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, you wanted to know if I knew of any questionable activities on the Burke estate, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道我是否知道伯克家有任何可疑活动，对吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyleathe_00041939_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem ArmorLeather 1 aaaKevinMasseyREF.additem ArmorLeather 1 aaaKevinMasseyREF.removeitem ArmorNVPGPlain 1
setstage aaaKevinMasseyQuest 50
Here, I got some leather armor for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，我给你拿了件皮甲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyLeatherArmor2
Oh, went for the reinforced armor, did we? Very much appreciated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，去买强化盔甲了，是吗？非常感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyleathe_0004193b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, you wanted to know if I knew of any questionable activities on the Burke estate, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道我是否知道伯克家有任何可疑活动，对吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyleathe_0004193b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem ArmorLeatherReinforced 1 aaaKevinMasseyREF.additem ArmorLeatherReinforced 1 aaaKevinMasseyREF.removeitem ArmorNVPGPlain 1 rewardkarma 15
setstage aaaKevinMasseyQuest 50
I got you a set of reinforced leather armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你准备了一套加固皮甲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyFreesideWhatDo
I've taken up work as a bodyguard for hire, on behalf of the Followers of the Apocalypse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受雇做保镖，代表天启追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyfreesi_0004193f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers don't need any more gunmen protecting the Mormon Fort, but I convinced them that I could take care of tourists, at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者们不需要更多的枪手来保护摩门要塞，但我说服他们至少我可以照顾好游客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyfreesi_0004193f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't make quite as much as I would have if I were working for myself, but I greatly respect the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我挣的钱没有我为自己工作挣的多，但我非常尊重天启追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyfreesi_0004193f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's nice to have steady work that actually feels like it's doing some good, in addition to lining my pocket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有稳定的工作是很好的，而且感觉是在做一些好事，除了赚钱以外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyfreesi_0004193f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyGoodbye
Adios.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseygoodby_00041941_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyBurkeJob
Was a ranch hand on their estate back west. With how much land they have, and how many Brahmin, they need all the workers they can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是他们西部庄园的农场工人。他们有那么多土地，又有那么多婆罗门，他们需要能找到的所有工人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburkej_00041943_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I know you're referring to the senator. I didn't work for him, though I saw him come to the ranch from time to time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你指的是参议员，我没有帮他做事，尽管我经常看到他来农场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburkej_00041943_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The man in charge of the Burke Brahmin enterprise is Tobias Burke, the senator's younger brother. He paid my wages, but otherwise we rarely spoke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掌管伯克家族婆罗门事业的人是托拜厄斯·伯克，参议员的弟弟。他给我付工资，但除此之外，我们很少说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburkej_00041943_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was friends with his son, Patrick. He's a good sort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是他儿子帕特里克的朋友，他是个好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburkej_00041943_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was your job for Burke?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为伯克家做过什么工作?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyBurkeTobias
My employer at the time, yes. I rarely saw the man himself, for a number of reasons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当时的雇主，是的。由于种种原因，我很少见到他本人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburket_00041f40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The estate was fucking gargantuan, for one. For another, he had a great many employees like myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，这个庄园太他妈庞大了，另一方面，他有很多像我一样的员工。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburket_00041f40_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In any event, I can tell you that he was a fairly harsh sort of individual. He lacked humor, put it that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，我可以告诉你，他是一个相当严厉的人，可以说他缺乏幽默感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburket_00041f40_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I saw him, he was bedridden. Bad case of the cancer, I understand. Apparently, he's still alive. Barely. He won't be long for this world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我上次见到他时，他已经卧床不起了，癌症很严重，我理解。虽然他还活着，但他也活不了多久了。
