ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburket_00041f40_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Tobias Burke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说托拜厄斯·伯克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyBurkePatrick
Patrick? Good friend of mine, really. We're around the same age, and he was oddly keen to see the groundwork of his father's operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帕特里克?我的好朋友，真的，他和我年龄相仿，奇怪的是，他对父亲的事业没有兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburkep_00041946_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was off work, we would often spend time at nearby bars, chasing various skirts. All in good fun; he wasn't like his cousin Adam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我下班的时候，我们经常在附近的酒吧消磨时间，追逐各种各样的女人。一切都是好玩，他不像他堂兄亚当。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburkep_00041946_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last time I saw him, he was enlisting in the army. I don't think anybody was thrilled with his decision, but he stuck by it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我上次见到他时，他正在应征入伍，我想没有人对他的决定感到兴奋，但他坚持了下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburkep_00041946_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said that his country needed him more than his dad's Brahmin empire ever could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他的国家比他父亲的婆罗门帝国更需要他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburkep_00041946_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way I heard it, he's a bonafide war hero now. No doubt his family approves of his military career, now that it brought the family more prestige.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，他现在是一个真正的战争英雄了。毫无疑问，他的家人肯定他的军旅生涯，因为这给他的家庭带来了更多的威望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburkep_00041946_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Patrick Burke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说帕特里克·伯克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyTerrifyThreaten
N-now look, I-I am fully aware that you could kill me right this second, and there isn't much I could do to stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听...听着，我...我很清楚你现在就能杀了我，我也没办法阻止你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyterrif_00041f42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: H-however, my request is o-only a measure to keep myself alive. If y-you don't help me, I'll be dead anyway, even if I talked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然..然而，我的请求只是为了保住自己的性命。如果你不帮我，就算我说了，我也会死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyterrif_00041f42_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assure you, I'll tell the other Powder Gangers nothing but good things about you if you assist me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我向你保证，如果你帮助我，我会告诉其他炸药帮你有多好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyterrif_00041f42_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, uh, I'll also give you all the money I have on my person, j-just as an apology for inconveniencing you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还会把我身上所有的钱都给你，作为给你带来不便的道歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyterrif_00041f42_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, please enjoy it in good health.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着吧，祝你健康
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyterrif_00041f42_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem Caps001 43 rewardkarma -25
You can tell me now, or you can scream it in agony as I crush your skull under my boot-heel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在可以告诉我，或者也可以在我用靴子后跟压碎你的头骨时痛苦地尖叫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMasseyBurkeDirt
Well, one oddity that springs to mind were the women that were trucked in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想到的一个奇怪的事情是那些被卡车运进来的女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburked_00041f44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every few months, a cargo truck would pull into the estate, and a few dozen women would exit the back and head inside. Couple days later, they leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每隔几个月，就会有一辆卡车驶进庄园，几十个女人会从后面出来，进入庄园。几天后，就离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburked_00041f44_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were very pretty. Not hookers from Reno, which was my initial thought. And there were never any parties or anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她们很漂亮，不是里诺的妓女，这是我最初的想法。也没有开过任何派对之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburked_00041f44_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew better than to start asking questions, so I never did. Hmm, what else...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道不该问，所以我也没问。嗯,还有什么......?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburked_00041f44_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yes. The estate had a small handful of armed guards, private employees, mind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,是的，庄园里有一小部分武装警卫，注意，是私人雇员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburked_00041f44_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On one occasion at the nearby bar, I overheard a pair of them having a loud-ass drunken conversation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次，在附近的酒吧里，我无意中听到他们俩醉醺醺地大声交谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburked_00041f44_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talking about how they "got that Strauss bitch" the night before, for "the boss".
ESP.TRADUIT: 说他们前天晚上为"老板" "抓住了那个叫施特劳斯的婊子"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburked_00041f44_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coincidentally, a woman with the surname of Strauss died the night before, in strangely vague circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巧合的是，一个姓施特劳斯的女人在前一天晚上去世了，死因不明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburked_00041f44_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, this same woman was an old business partner of Mr. Tobias, and apparently they had a rather hostile falling out. She was going to sue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个女人是托拜厄斯先生的老生意伙伴，显然他们之间有过敌意的争吵，她正打算起诉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburked_00041f44_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all I know. Thanks for helping me with that little favor. I'm off to Freeside now. Hopefully I survive the journey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只知道这些，谢谢你帮我这个小忙。我现在要去自由城了，希望我能挺过这段旅程。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburked_00041f44_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adios.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kevin Massey [07000DCB] (mod) Quest : ([07001750]aaaKevinMasseyQuest) One Foot on the Platform EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaakevinma_aaamasseyburked_00041f44_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaMasseyBurkeNote 1
That's right. Tell me anything you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才对，告诉我你知道的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieULKitchenBark
This place smells like death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方有股死亡的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulkit_00042b3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieGourmandStart
Ah, the rich and frivolous, throwing their money around on ostentatious displays of personal indulgence, as a mark of prestige.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，有钱人和轻浮的人，把他们的钱到处挥霍，炫耀个人的放纵，作为威望的标志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know which number is higher: How many of these sorts I've killed, or how many I've had as anonymous clientele.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道是我杀过的这类人更多，还是我的这类匿名客户更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b41_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieGourmandProceed
I mean that many of these prospective aristocrats here are frivolous with their own money, as well as with other people's lives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，这里的许多未来的贵族对待自己的金钱和他人的生命都很不严肃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A man who earns just enough to subsist will have to be very sure of what he's doing before he will commit to paying somebody like me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个收入只够维持生计的人，必须非常清楚自己在做什么，然后才能承诺付钱给像我这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b46_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It lends an appropriate sense of gravity to the decision to have another person killed for your own reasons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你自己的原因而杀害另一个人的决定，会有一种适当的负罪感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b46_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But men who will cheerfully pay hundreds for a steak, just to pat themselves on the back for affluence, think nothing of paying for death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，那些愿意花几百美元买一块牛排，只是为了炫耀自己的富裕的人，根本不在意死亡需要付出的代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b46_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so, what for most people is a serious decision with grave consequences, becomes just a frivolous bit of cheap revenge for these sorts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，对于大多数人来说，一个会带来严重后果的严肃决定，对于这些人来说只是一种轻率的廉价报复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b46_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At the very least, they tend to reserve assassinations for those they deem to be rivals, and not so much for the ones they would consider inferior.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少，他们倾向于把暗杀那些他们认为是竞争对手的人，而不是那些他们认为低等的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b46_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a rare combination of bloodlust, cowardice, wealth, and misanthropy that would compel someone to contract an assassin on total strangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一种罕见的嗜血、懦弱、财富和厌世的结合，会迫使一个人为了杀另一个完全陌生的人雇一个刺客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b46_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieGourmand1
I have no moral objections. I don't really have any morals at all, really. An aversion to sadism is the closest I come, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有道德上的异议。我一点道德都没有，真的，我觉得，我只是厌恶施虐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If my price is paid, if my client doesn't telegraph some diabolical plan to stab me in the back, if I believe I can kill the target... I accept.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我付出了代价，如果我的委托人不在背后阴我，且我相信我能杀死目标......我接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b48_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care whether the target "deserves" to die, nor do I care how repulsive my client may seem to be. I'm a professional, no more and no less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎目标是否“罪有应得”，也不在乎我的客户看起来有多令人反感。我是专业的，不管别的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b48_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That said, I recognize that in a truly just world, these sorts of men would be lined up against the wall... Myself along with them, no doubt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也就是说，我能认识到，在一个真正公正的世界里，这种人会靠墙站成一排......毫无疑问，我也在其中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b48_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hm. Surely that's enough pontification for the moment. Shall we proceed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，目前看来，这已经足够自以为是了。我们继续好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_00042b48_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have moral objections to their missions, why accept the contracts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你对他们的任务有道德上的异议，为什么要接受合同?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieGourmand2
And they're deeply enthralled by the notion that they alone control the world, even as they need people like me to do their dirty work for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们深深着迷于这样一种观念，即使他们需要像我这样的人来为他们做肮脏的工作也自认为自己控制着世界，。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_0004373d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just remember, people like you and I have experienced hardships. Difficulties that force us to adapt to the harsh brutalities of life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住，像你我这样的人都经历过困难。困难迫使我们去适应残酷的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_0004373d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But these sorts of men are so cushioned, they're devastated if you so much as tell them "no".
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这种类型的人很软弱，如果你对他们说“不”，他们就会崩溃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_0004373d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps they should tread more carefully. Such lifestyle choices tend to make enemies, and they're ill-equipped to survive such encounters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许他们应该更加小心行事。这样的生活方式往往会让他们树敌，而他们没有足够的能力在这样的遭遇中生存下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_0004373d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_0004373d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, ultra-wealthy high-society people tend to be stupid and malicious. That's not news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，超级富有的上流社会的人往往愚蠢而恶毒，这不算新闻了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieGourmand3
I've been saving them up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟我一直在酝酿这些话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegourm_0004373f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, that was a lot of fancy words, Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，这话可真好听，查理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFiendVaultBark
Shall we kill them all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要把他们全杀了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefiend_00043741_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieRRCDrugBark
Ugh. Don't mind me if I start breathing through my scarf. I despise the smell of chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，别介意我用围巾挡住口鼻，我讨厌化学药品的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierrcdr_00043746_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieDiagnosePTSD
[SUCCEEDED] Not overly surprising. It's not really something I devote much thought towards. I try not to think about myself at all, truth be told.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]实话实说，不足为奇，我并没有花太多心思去考虑这个问题。我尽量不去想自己...。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliediagn_0004374b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I'll eventually get past it. Or I won't. I've learned to live with things being what they are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我最终会熬过去的，也可能不会。我已经学会顺其自然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliediagn_0004374b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not inclined to sign up for therapy, so I can recount how I was tortured as a child, and now I kill people for a living and feel empty inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想去接受心理治疗，这样我就得讲述我小时候是如何被折磨的，现在我以杀人为生内心空虚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliediagn_0004374b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate your concern, however. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我很感谢你的关心，谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliediagn_0004374b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 5
set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
Are you aware that you exhibit signs of severe PTSD?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你有严重创伤后应激障碍的症状吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNVClinicConvo
Ah, the clinic. I've had some extensive work done here. Many of my first few contracts financed the medical enhancements I purchased here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,诊所，我在这里做了很多治疗。我最初的一些合同中为我在这里购买的医疗服务提供资金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_00044371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNVClinicProceed
Initially? Repairing some of the damage done to me by my owners when I was a child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最初是修复小时候主人对我造成的伤害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_00044376_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flushing my system of narcotics and other foreign substances. Then there was tendon damage, broken bones that had healed improperly...
ESP.TRADUIT: 清除我体内的麻醉药品和其他异物...然后是肌腱损伤，骨折愈合不当......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_00044376_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They offered to give me fertility treatments, but I'm not interested in reproducing. I don't much care for children, so I can do without.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们提出给我做生育治疗，但我对生育不感兴趣，我不太喜欢孩子，所以不做也行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_00044376_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once that was all done, I purchased several of their performance-enhancing implants. As many as my body could take, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些都完成以后，我买了几个他们的表现增强植入物。我的身体能装多少就装多少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heightened reflexes, better eyesight, hearing, etc. Anything that would aid my ability to efficiently kill my targets with little effort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反应增强，更好的视力，听力等。任何能帮助我轻松有效地杀死目标的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_00044376_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
What sort of work did the clinic do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 诊所为你做过什么工作?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNVClinic2
I did not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If a rifle has a crack in the stock, or a warp in the barrel, etc, you would go to have repairs done, make it as serviceable as you could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果步枪枪托上有裂缝，枪管上有翘曲等等，你应该去修理，让它尽可能的好用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if your rifle was completely melted down into slag, there really wouldn't be any fixing it. Bringing it to a gunsmith would be a waste of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你的步枪完全熔化成炉渣，那就真的没有什么可修理的了。把它交给枪匠纯粹是浪费时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's an allegory in there somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个寓言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, this clinic also offers mental health treatment. Did you receive any?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个诊所也提供心理健康治疗，你做了吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNVClinic1
Such is life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是人生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a group as idealistic as the Followers to be around for as long as they have, they must be willing to make some moral compromises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于一个像天启追随者这样理想主义的团体来说，他们必须愿意做出一些道德上的妥协。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not as if my blood money came with a detailed explanation of how I had earned it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的血汗钱并没有附带详细解释我是如何赚到它的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, I already got paid. I could have spent it on whores or substances. Instead, it funneled into an organization that at least tries to do good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，我拿到了工资，我本可以把钱花在妓女或毒品上。相反，它流向了一个至少试图做好事的组织。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As if "good" is some objective, quantifiable goal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就好像“好”是一个客观的，可量化的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel like the Followers wouldn't approve of your method of financing them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得天启追随者们不会赞同你资助他们的方式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNVClinic3
True. But, my services don't come cheap, and I'm quite prolific.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。但是，我的服务也不便宜，而且利润很高。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lawless frontier region, embroiled in a war, with stark class divisions... There's no shortage of work for an assassin in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个无法无天的边境地区，卷入了一场战争，有着明显的阶级分化......在莫哈韦，刺客不缺工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's rare for me to be unable to afford something, and when it does happen, well... I just work that much harder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说，买不起东西是很少见的，而当这种情况真的发生时，嗯......我只是更努力的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienvcli_0004437c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? These guys can get pretty pricey, especially with some of those implants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗?这些治疗或许很贵，尤其是那些植入物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieJobCriteria
Well, first and foremost, I require half of my commission up front. If a prospective client can't manage that, then there's no deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先也是最重要的，我需要先预付一半佣金。如果客户无法做到这一点，那就无法达成交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejobcr_00044fa6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beyond that, I'm not especially picky. Sometimes a client will be obviously untrustworthy, and I'll decline their contract for my own security.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外，我并不是特别挑剔。有时候，明显不值得信任的客户，我会为了自己的安全而拒绝他们的合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejobcr_00044fa6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The most common reason for me to decline a job, though, is if I don't believe I could kill the target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，我拒绝工作最常见的原因是，我不相信我能完成目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejobcr_00044fa6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A common example of this would be Caesar. I've been asked to kill him more than once, but I've always refused.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个常见的例子就是凯撒大帝，我不止一次被要求杀了他，但我都拒绝了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejobcr_00044fa6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see no way for a woman to get anywhere near Caesar, except possibly through slavery. And slaves lack for both weapons, and escape options.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看不出一个女人有什么办法接近凯撒，除非通过奴役，但奴隶们既没有武器，也没法逃跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejobcr_00044fa6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It isn't viable, and while I consider myself to be a consummate professional, I'm not so dedicated to my career that I'll kill myself in the attempt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是不可行的，虽然我认为自己是一个完美的专业人士，但我不会对我的职业如此投入，以至于在行动中杀死自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejobcr_00044fa6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, if I accept a contract, it will be carried out. I won't be bribed, intimidated, coerced, or convinced. If I have a target, they will die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，如果我接受了一份合同，那就一定会执行。我不会被贿赂，恐吓，胁迫或说服，只要我有目标，他们就会死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejobcr_00044fa6_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how do you choose your clients?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你是如何选择客户的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieHiddenValleyConvo
Hm. Hidden Valley. An organization with the longevity and secrecy of the Brotherhood tends to build a mystique around itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...隐秘山谷，一个像兄弟会一样长久而秘密的组织往往会在自己周围建立一种神秘感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fa8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their members believe so firmly in their own righteousness that it can be easy to forget that they're only human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的成员如此坚定地相信自己的正义，以至于很容易忘记他们只是凡人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fa8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Standing here in their inner sanctum, it's easier to get some perspective. See the Brotherhood for what it truly is, beneath all the layers of dogma.
ESP.TRADUIT: 站在他们的密室里，更容易看到一些东西。在教条的层层掩盖之下看清兄弟会的真面目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fa8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so... disappointed.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fa8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieHiddenValleyProceed
At a glance? I see a propensity for self-indoctrination. Denial of reality. An inability to accept, or even recognize, their own futility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乍一看吗?我看到了自我灌输的倾向，否认现实，无法接受，甚至承认自己的无用都那么难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A conviction they grasp so firmly that it borders on delusion. This notion that strict adherence to an old doctrine will save them all from reality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们牢牢抓住的信念近乎于妄想。这种观念认为，严格遵守旧的教义将使他们脱离现实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fad_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a dream. The dream we all share, until the day that we wake up. The dream that we have a measure of control over anything more than ourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个梦，共同的梦，破灭就是醒来的那一天。梦里我们能控制一切，而不仅仅是我们自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fad_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
What do you know about the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对兄弟会了解多少?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieHiddenValley1
They follow the doctrine written by their founder, generations ago. They venerate it as if it's some religious text, delivered down from on high.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们遵循着几代人以前的创始人所写的信条，他们崇拜它，就好像它是从天上降下的宗教经文。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They believe that, if they only just follow the words of their codex closely enough, that reality will fold over to ensure their prosperity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们相信，只要他们足够严格地遵循法典上的文字，现实就会折叠起来，确保他们的繁荣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even thinking critically about the words of their codex is tantamount to treason for them. Almost certainly, because it would damage the illusion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对他们来说，批判性地思考抄本上的文字就等于叛国，可以肯定的是，有脑子的人去思考这些信条，会破坏根深蒂固的错觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood of Steel, as an ideology, is untenable. The only way for the organization to continue is by violating the doctrine that defines them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一种意识形态，钢铁兄弟会的原则是站不住脚的，他们的组织要想继续下去，唯一的方法就是违背定义它们的原则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not a failure to adapt to ever-changing circumstances so much as it is... Refusal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 适应不断变化的环境并不是失败，而是......取舍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a light at the end of the tunnel, but they turn their back to it and somehow see it as a philosophical victory over everyone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 隧道的尽头有一束光，但他们背对着它，不知何故把它看作是战胜所有人的哲学胜利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb1_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the rules they followed led them to this... Of what use were the rules?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们遵循的规则导致他们这样做......那么这些规则有什么用呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb1_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose some may see their position tragic. Me, I just find it overwhelmingly pathetic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想有些人可能认为他们的处境很悲惨，而我却觉得这太可悲了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb1_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does that have to do with the Brotherhood's ideology?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这和兄弟会的意识形态有什么关系?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieHiddenValley2
Really? Because I've killed several people with a sharpened piece of metal; one of the least technical objects in the history of the planet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗?那我用一块锋利的金属杀过好几个人，金属这是地球历史上技术含量最低的物体之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Brotherhood's goal is peacekeeping, then perhaps they should try actually doing it for once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果兄弟会的目标是维持和平，那么也许他们应该试一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the goal is to simply sit upon a horde of advanced tech, then it seems as if they've accomplished it already. And yet, they're still dying out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们的目标只是盘踞在一堆先进的技术上，那么看起来他们已经实现了。然而，没法阻止他们仍在消亡的事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's almost fascinating. The stricter they follow their codex, the more certain the organization's death becomes. And still, they don't waver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这简直太迷人了，他们越严格地遵循法典，就越确保这个组织会消亡。然而，他们并没有发现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the technology in the world can't keep reality at bay. They'll realize this, eventually, when it's far too late to save themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界上所有的技术都无法阻挡现实，他们最终会意识到这一点的，那时拯救自己已经太晚了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Advanced technology in the wrong hands is dangerous. I respect the Brotherhood's goals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先进技术落到坏人手里是很危险的，我尊重兄弟会的目标。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieHiddenValley3
Well, you won't have to wait long. They're surrounded by enemies on all sides, and they've chosen to, almost literally, bury their heads in the sand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你不用等太久了，他们被四面八方的敌人包围着，他们选择了把头埋进沙子里思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder, are they truly blind to the writing on the wall, or is it nothing more than willful ignorance?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道，他们是真的对墙外的东西视而不见，还是仅仅是故意的无知?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, I wouldn't expect it to matter when their end finally comes. And it's fast approaching, I can see that, plain as day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，当他们的末日最终到来时，我都不指望这有什么关系。它正在迅速逼近，我能看出来，很明显。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehidde_00044fb3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood is a threat to the Mojave, and they can't die out soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会是莫哈韦沙漠的威胁，他们不可能很快消亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieRemnantsBark
When I was a girl, I used to dream about flight. Leaving the world behind... Now, it's enough if I can just avoid dreaming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我还是个小女孩的时候，我常常梦见飞翔，离开这个世界...现在，只要我不做梦就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieremna_00045ba7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFavoriteColor

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefavor_000461a5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... What's your favorite color?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你最喜欢什么颜色?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise
NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled
NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... Violet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...紫罗兰色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefavor_000461a6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Apparently.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...很明显。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefavor_000461a6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... What's your favorite color?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你最喜欢什么颜色?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePersonalMorality
Good? I struggle to think of how you could possibly misinterpret the word so loosely that it could ever apply to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好人?我很难想象你怎么可能把这个词误解得如此宽泛以至于它能安在我头上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm good at my job, I suppose. But a good person? No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我很擅长我的工作，但这不是好人干的活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461a8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Society as a whole has a fairly basic view of morality. Individual beliefs may waver from person to person, but some things are nearly universal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 整个社会有一套相当基本的道德观。个人信仰可能因人而异，但有些东西几乎是普遍的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461a8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There aren't many who would consider a killer-for-hire to be a good person. And if they did, it would be through an excess of caveats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有多少雇佣杀手会考虑做好人，如果他们真的有心做好人，那也是因为害怕或者被警告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461a8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No women, no children, only kill people that "have it coming" in some way or another, etc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不杀女人，不杀孩子，只杀那些“命中注定”的人，等等。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461a8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do kill women, and children, and people that nobody but my clientele would consider to "have it coming" in any capacity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确实杀害妇女、儿童，包括那些“命中注定”的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461a8_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hence, no society on earth would consider me to be a good person. Fortunately for me, I don't care about opinions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，世界上没有一个社会会认为我是一个好人。幸运的是，我不在乎别人的意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461a8_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you consider yourself a good person?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为自己是个好人吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePersonalMorality2
Oh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：哦（"oh"）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461aa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that case, I abstain from judgement. Judgement of myself, or of anybody else. It's pointless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这一点上，我不作判断。对自己或他人的评价，都是毫无意义的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461aa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't believe in morality. I believe in actions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不相信道德，我只相信行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461aa_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Morality is a coping mechanism. A method of self-affirmation. An acceptance that a set of unwritten societal rules dictates your value as a person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 道德是一种应对机制，一种自我肯定的方法。接受一套不成文的社会规则决定了你作为一个人的价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461aa_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "If I follow the rules of morality, then I am a good person, and I can sleep at night with no guilt." Something to that effect.
ESP.TRADUIT: “如果我遵守道德准则，那么我就是一个好人，晚上就可以安心睡觉了。”差不多是这个意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461aa_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't feel any guilt for my actions, yet my only difficulty sleeping comes from my memories of actions that others committed against me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不为自己的行为感到内疚，但唯一让我难以入睡的是想起别人对我做过的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461aa_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know exactly what I am. I'm a broken shell of a human, but I've reconciled my own nature, and so I don't allow my perception of self to bother me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很清楚我是什么人，我是一个破碎的人，但我已经调和了我自己的本性，所以我不允许我的自我认知打扰到我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461aa_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In truth, I don't believe that "bad people" or "good people" exist. I believe that people can commit bad acts, or good ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我不相信绝对的“坏人”或“好人”的存在。我相信人们可以做坏事，也可以做好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461aa_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you consider yourself a good person?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为自己是个好人吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461aa_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't ask what society thought of you, I asked how you would define yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有问社会如何看待你，我问的是你会如何定义自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePersonalMorality3
Do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because, by my reckoning, you're a prolific killer. You fraternize with killers, you're employed by killers, you're surrounded by killers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为在我看来，你是个多姿多彩的杀手。你和杀手交好，受雇于杀手，周围都是杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461ae_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if you truly believe, with every fiber of your being, that you've never once killed somebody who didn't deserve it... I certainly have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你发自内心地相信，你杀的人都罪该万死......我当然有过类似的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461ae_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a good person, wouldn't you be morally obligated to kill me, as justice for my own crimes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但作为一个好人，在道义上，你难道没有杀了我，为我犯下的罪行讨回公道的义务吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461ae_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Choosing not to do so... Would be apathy, or something akin to it. Certainly, nobody considers apathy to be a good, ethical trait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 选择不这样做......在道义上会是冷漠，或类似的东西。当然，没有人认为冷漠是一种好的道德品质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461ae_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, to be clear, I don't mean any offense. I'm not interested in judging you. As far as people go, I actually respect you quite a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先说清楚，我不是有意冒犯你，我对评判你没兴趣。就对他人的看法而言，我其实挺尊重你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461ae_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you see, I hope, what I mean with this morality business. Trying to live up to a vague ethical standard is an exercise in willful self-delusion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我希望你明白，我所说明的是，试图达到一个模糊的道德标准是一种自欺欺人的行为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461ae_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recognize yourself for who you are, not how you, or others, perceive you to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 认清你自己是什么人，而不是在意你或别人怎么看你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461ae_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have to like what you see in a mirror, I don't, but there's a victory in knowing what you are. I can say no more than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不必喜欢镜子里的自己，我不喜欢，但有自知之明也是一种成功。我只能说这么多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461ae_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to think I am, yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自认为我是，嗯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePersonalMorality4
But that isn't really true, is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但事实并非如此，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're aware of your own choices, surely. You're aware of the context and logic behind every step you've ever taken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定清楚自己的选择，你知道你所采取的每一步背后的事实和逻辑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461af_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is very little in the world that we can control. Less than we ever think. But the one thing we have undisputed control over is our choices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个世界上，我们能控制的东西很少，比我们想象中的要少。但有一件事我们无可争议地可以控制，那就是我们的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461af_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what choices you've made, and you know how society at large would likely frame the ethics of those choices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你做了什么选择，你也知道整个社会可能如何构建这些选择的道德框架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461af_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you lack is a personal determination as to whether or not your actions fall in line with your own moral beliefs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你所缺乏的是一种判断力，判断你的行为是否符合你自己的道德信念的判断力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461af_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll make it very simple, because I've figured this out for myself years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会说得很简单，因为我几年前就自己弄明白了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461af_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you truly feel that you cannot live with your own choices, then stop. Shoot yourself in the head and be done with all the guilt and self-doubt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的觉得你不能按照自己的选择生活，那就停下来，一枪爆了自己的头，摆脱所有的内疚和自我怀疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461af_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Otherwise, stand firm in your convictions, own your choices, and accept that the past is immutable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 否则就坚定你的信念，拥抱你的选择，因为过去是不可改变的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461af_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Believe me, there's a victory in that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，这是一种成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461af_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, I don't know, Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，查理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePersonalMorality5
Then why worry about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那为什么要担心呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_000461b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillNoJessieYet
Great. That's great. She's being indoctrinated into an NCR-saluting little drone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，真是太棒了，她正在被强行灌输成一种向NCR敬礼的小工蜂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnojess_000461b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can take some solace in the fact that she's safe, I guess. Still, it'd be nice to know for sure, instead of hearing about things second-hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想她很安全，这让我感到些许安慰，不过，知道确切的情况比听二手消息要好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnojess_000461b2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who told you she was in California? Some paper-pusher?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁告诉你她在加州的?一些摆弄文件的人吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnojess_000461b2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck it, go over his head. If you're still interested in helping me with this family bullshit, maybe you could talk to the guy in charge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的，这不是那些人能解决的问题，如果你还想帮我解决这个家庭问题，也许你可以和负责人谈谈?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnojess_000461b2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See if you can chat with the guy running that church. See if he can offer any clarity, I guess. Hell, I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你能不能和教堂的负责人谈谈，我想看看他能不能解释清楚。见鬼，我也不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnojess_000461b2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah. One other thing came up while you were gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的，你不在的时候又发生了一件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnojess_000461b2_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you got all wrapped up in the perpetual O'Neill family bullshit, you were helping me with peacekeeping shit, so...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你被奥尼尔家族的事缠住之前，你是在帮我搞维和什么的，所以...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnojess_000461b2_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A friend of mine from out of town is having some raider trouble. I volunteered your name. Sorry, I guess? I don't know if you care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个外地朋友被掠夺者找麻烦了，我主动报上了你的名字，不好意思,我猜你会感兴趣?我不知道你是否在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnojess_000461b2_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, if you want to help out, the place is called Humboldt Ranch. It's sorta near Bitter Springs. Tell them I sent you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，如果你想帮忙，那地方叫洪堡牧场，就在苦泉镇附近，告诉他们是我派你来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnojess_000461b2_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, I appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢了，真的很感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnojess_000461b2_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMainJessieQuest 70 setstage aaaHumboldtFarmQuest 10
I went to the church. They said Jessie was on a field trip to California with some others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去了教堂，他们说杰西和其他人去加州实地考察了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFactionPersonal
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefacti_00046e13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... Actually, I would prefer that the Legion doesn't take power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...事实上，我更希望军团不要掌权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefacti_00046e13_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would have to emigrate west to continue my work. The Legion wouldn't have much use, or tolerance, for my services.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的服务对军团没多大用处，他们也不会容忍我，到时候我就只能移居西部继续我的工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefacti_00046e13_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That said, it would be a mild inconvenience. I have no deeper stake than that. If you were to commit to working for Caesar, I'd accept that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，这也只是一点小小的不便，但我也没有其他更重要的利害关系了，如果你打算为凯撒效力，我也能接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefacti_00046e13_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any preference which faction ends up controlling the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得哪个派系最终会控制莫哈韦?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieEnemies
No, that won't be an issue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，再说那不是问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieenemi_00046e15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't leave a calling card on my eliminated targets. Even if they have vengeful friends or family, they wouldn't know I ever existed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会在我干掉的目标身上留下名片。即使他们有报复心很强的朋友或家人，也不会知道我的存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieenemi_00046e15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If somebody does know who I am, and does want me dead for whatever reason, I take care of it before it can become an issue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人真的知道我是谁，不管出于什么原因想要我死，我会在它成为问题之前处理好它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieenemi_00046e15_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no enemies. I don't permit such a thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有敌人，我不允许这样的人存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieenemi_00046e15_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
So... Out of curiosity, any chance of someone coming after you to avenge one of your targets?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...出于好奇，有没有人为了复仇追杀你?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboldtProceedQuest
Oh. Well, that's okay, then... Should be, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好吧，没关系，那么......应该是，行吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtp_0004862e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't think Ryan was going to actually try to fix this... Uh... Yeah, probably would have been better if he left it alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没想到瑞恩会想办法解决这个问题...嗯...是啊，如果他不去管可能会更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtp_0004862e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, look, I appreciate the intent, but the "raider trouble" is the kind of trouble that gets worse the more you mess with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，听着，我很欣赏你的意图，但掠夺者是那种你越惹它就越麻烦的麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtp_0004862e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, if you could just tell Ryan that, I'd appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能告诉瑞恩我的想法，我会很感激的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtp_0004862e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ryan O'Neill sent me, said you were having raider troubles?
ESP.TRADUIT: 瑞恩·奥尼尔派我来的，说你遇到了掠夺者的麻烦?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboldtRetardAnswer
If you were a raider, my trigger-happy sister would have put a bullet in your head, not let you waltz in here. Wanna try again, genius?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是个掠夺者，我那爱开枪的妹妹会一枪崩了你，而不会让你大摇大摆进来。想再试一次吗，天才?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtr_00048c29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [LIE] I'm a badass raider, you'd best do what I say!
ESP.TRADUIT: [说谎]我是一个很厉害的掠夺者，你最好照我说的做!

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboldtRaiderDetails
No! None of that, seriously!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！ 没有这些，说真的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtr_00048c2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, this is pretty delicate, I have things mostly handled right now. There's a lot to be said for not kicking Cazador nests, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，这很微妙，我现在有很多事情要处理。人们不踹掉大毒蜂的巢穴也有很多理由，不是吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtr_00048c2b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please just leave it be, okay? I know what I'm doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请不要管这件事，好吗?我知道我在做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtr_00048c2b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and before you go, could you tell Maggie not to open the gates for anyone without me giving her the go-ahead? Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，在你走之前，你能不能告诉玛吉在我没说允许的情况下就不要给任何人开门?谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtr_00048c2b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHumboldtFarmQuest 40
If the problem is raiders, just point me in their direction and I'll take them out. No problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果问题出在掠夺者身上，只要告诉我他们在哪，我就能干掉他们。没有问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboltGoodbye
Alright, good. Thank you. Oh, before you go, could you tell my sister not to open the gate for anyone unless I say so? Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，很好，谢谢你！你走之前，你能不能告诉玛吉在我没说允许的情况下就不要给任何人开门?谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltgo_00048c2d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHumboldtFarmQuest 40
Alright, I'll just be going, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那我走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboltAboutRaiders
Fine. Short version, we're being extorted by a raider crew, led by some prick named Dalton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，简而言之，我们被一个叫道尔顿的混蛋领导的掠夺者帮派敲诈了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltab_00048c7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While it's very unpleasant, Dalton's demands have been something we can consistently afford to pay. It's a lot of money, but we can survive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这很难受，但道尔顿的要求我们一直都能负担得起，尽管这是一大笔钱，但我们能活下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltab_00048c7b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, he's actually kept his word. His crew leaves us alone and keeps other gangs away from us, as long as we pay on time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，他确实遵守了他的诺言，只要我们按时交钱，他的人就不会打扰我们也不会让其他帮派靠近我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltab_00048c7b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't afford to piss him off. It's just me and my sister here. If he wanted us dead, we'd be dead. Or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不能惹毛他，这里只有我和我妹妹。如果他想要我们死，我们早就死了。甚至更惨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltab_00048c7b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I refuse to antagonize him. I can't risk Maggie's life like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拒绝与他作对，我不能拿玛吉的生命冒险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltab_00048c7b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what exactly is this raider issue that you don't want me to interfere with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你不希望我插手掠夺者的事到底是为什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboldtFamilyStory
Our parents established the farm. Maggie and I were born and raised here. We were happy, mostly safe... Everything was fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的父母建立了这个农场。玛吉和我在这里出生长大，我们很开心，基本上是安全的......一切都很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtf_00048c7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day, when I was about 11 or so, and Maggie was only two or three, a raider band, just like Dalton's, came calling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我大约十一岁，玛吉只有两三岁的时候，有一天，一帮跟道尔顿的人差不多的掠夺者来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtf_00048c7d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dad didn't negotiate with raider filth. He started shooting. I was young, but anyone growing up in the wastes learns to shoot early, so I helped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爸爸没有和掠夺者谈判，他直接开始射击。当时我还很年轻，但在荒郊野外长大的人都很早就学会射击，所以我帮了忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtf_00048c7d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mom stayed with Maggie, had to keep her out of danger. After me and dad drove the raiders off, we heard Maggie screaming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈陪着玛吉，让她远离危险。在我和爸爸赶走袭击者后，我们听到玛吉的尖叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtf_00048c7d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of those pieces of shit slipped through the line. Dad and I shot him to pieces, but it was too late. Mom was gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个混蛋从队伍中溜了出来，我和爸爸把他打得稀烂，但已经太晚了，妈妈被枪杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtf_00048c7d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was about a decade ago. It was hard without mom, but we got by.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是大约十年前的事了，没有妈妈很辛苦，但我们熬过去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtf_00048c7d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dad died last winter. Something with his lungs. Cancer, tuberculosis, I don't know exactly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸去年冬天去世了，他的肺一直有问题，癌症，或者肺结核，我也不清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtf_00048c7d_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't protect Maggie by myself. I hate Dalton, I hate his type, but if paying them off keeps my sister and I safe, then so be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一个人保护不了玛吉，我讨厌道尔顿那种人，但如果付钱能保证我和妹妹的安全，那就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtf_00048c7d_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How come it's just you two running this whole farm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么只有你们两个在经营这个农场?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboldtWhyNotLeave
Because I can afford to pay Dalton's protection fees. He's kept his word. Between all the threats and disgusting taunts, he's been honest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我付得起道尔顿的保护费，他信守诺言。在这么多的威胁和恶心的嘲弄中，起码他是可靠的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtw_00048c7f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is my home. I was born here. My parents are buried here. I'm not going to turn tail and run at the first bit of adversity. I have to endure it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的家，我出生在这里，我的父母葬在这里。我不能一遇到困难就转身逃跑，我不得不忍受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtw_00048c7f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不离开？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboldtBegKillDalton
No. I don't believe you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不相信你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtb_00048c81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you failed. If they killed you, or any of them escaped... Anything like that, and we'd be dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你失败了，如果他们杀了你，或者有谁逃跑了......那样的话，我们就死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtb_00048c81_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't risk that. I refuse to risk it. The cost is too high. I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能冒这个险，我也拒绝冒这个险，风险太大了，我很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtb_00048c81_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me put Dalton and his crew out of commission for you. It won't be an issue, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我帮你把道尔顿和他的手下干掉，不会有问题的，我保证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboltKnowRyan
