Up until last winter, I would sometimes take a caravan into the city to trade. I met Ryan when I was bringing some crops to Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去年冬天之前，我有时会跟随商队进城做生意，我去西区买庄稼的时候认识了瑞恩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltkn_00048c83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little while back, he actually sent a message asking if we were alright. I wrote back, and I guess he sent you after he got my letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久前，他还写信来问我们还好吗，我回了信，我猜他是在收到我的信后找到你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltkn_00048c83_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a good man, but he seems to have some fixation on solving all the world's problems. It'll burn him up, mark my words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个好人，但他似乎执着于解决世界上所有的问题，这会让他筋疲力尽的，记住我说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltkn_00048c83_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know Ryan O'Neill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么认识瑞恩·奥尼尔的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboltBangRyan
Jesus Christ, seriously? It's bad enough I have one child needling me about this, now there's a second one?
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶稣基督，认真的？有个孩子来烦我已经够糟了，现在又来了个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltba_00048c85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My dating life isn't any of her business, and she's family. I don't know what you think your excuse is, but I promise you I'm not amused.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是我的家人，但我的约会生活不关她的事。我不知道你问这个的目的是什么，但这一点都不好笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltba_00048c85_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your sister seems to think there's something between you and O'Neill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你妹妹好像觉得你和奥尼尔之间有什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboltBangRyan2
Did you need something else...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有别的什么事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltba_00048c87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWhyKillPeople
Because this is what I'm best at.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为这是我擅长的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My life put me on this path. My experiences, the lessons I learned, the people who educated me... It all led to me being what I am, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的生活让我走上了这条路。我的经历，我学到的教训，教育我的人......这一切造就了现在的我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c89_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last years of my adolescence were spent teaching me all the fine details required for my profession, and so, I excel at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在青春期的最后几年学会了我的职业所需要的所有细节，所以，我擅长于此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c89_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is what I am. It's likely not the path I would have chosen for myself, but there's very little in life we can control, let alone predict.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我。这可能不是我自己会选择的道路，但生活中我们能控制的东西很少，更不用说预测了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c89_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To do something else... Turn my back on the tools that I was given... It's lashing out, denying my own reality. It's childish, and futile. I refuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去做别的事情......放弃我的当下......那是在抨击和否认我自己的现实。这是幼稚的，徒劳的，我拒绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c89_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After your mentor died, why continue to kill people? You could have done anything you wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你导师死后，为什么还要继续杀人?你可以做任何你想做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWhyKillPeople2
Fatalistic? No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宿命论？不见得
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c8b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the opposite of my philosophy. I don't believe in fate, destiny, however you wish to describe it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那和我的哲学正好相反，我不相信命运，不管你怎么形容它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c8b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all chaos. We, as people, tend to assign our own meanings and interpretations to the chaos, to calm ourselves in the face of it all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宿命全是混乱。我们，作为人，倾向于给这种混乱赋予我们自己的意义和解释，好让自己在面对这一切时平静下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c8b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Events happen to us, often without our consent, or even knowledge. The first step to self-determination is acceptance of our past experiences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事情发生在我们身上，往往没有经过我们的同意，甚至不知情。所以自决的第一步是接受我们过去的经历。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c8b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can rail against the circumstances we find ourselves in, and so often, it burns us away. It accomplishes nothing but failure and misery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以抱怨我们所处的环境，但这往往会让我们精疲力竭，它只会带来失败和痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c8b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no greater plan. Nothing is preordained, and things don't need to have a reason before they occur. It is what it is, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但目前来看没有什么是更好的了，也没有什么是命中注定的，事情发生之前也不需要理由，它就是成为了事实，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c8b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It falls to each of us to make our own meanings for things, and live with the consequences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们每个人都有责任为事物赋予自己的意义，并承担由此产生的后果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewhyki_00048c8b_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That seems so fatalistic, though. Why bother with anything if we're so powerless?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这似乎太宿命论了。既然我们无能为力，为什么还要费事呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsAdvanceQuest
Well I don't know why she thinks I'd suddenly follow her instructions if someone else delivers 'em to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我不知道为什么她认为我会按照她的指示去做。虽然说这次不是她亲自来跟我说
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsadva_00049288_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you going to take care of our raider problem for us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会帮我们解决掠夺者的问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsadva_00049288_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your sister wanted me to tell you not to open the gates unless she gives you approval.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你姐姐让我告诉你，除非她同意，否则不要开门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsAdvanceQuestMore
What?! Why? That makes no sense!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么? !为什么?这没有道理!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsadva_0004928e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The raiders are the problem! How would killing them make the problem worse? They're robbing us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者才是问题所在!杀了他们会让问题变得更糟吗?他们在抢劫我们!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsadva_0004928e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, no. Megan begged me not to mess with them raiders. Said it would make everything worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,不。梅根求我别惹那些掠夺者，她说这会让一切变得更糟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsRaiders1
To hell with that, if someone else bothers us, you can kill them, too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 管他呢，如果有人来惹我们，你也可以杀了他们!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsraid_00049290_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care what her opinion is. She's only half of our population, and the other half says that those raiders gotta go! And die, preferably!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎她的意见。她只是我们家族总人口的一半，而另一半说那些掠夺者必须离开！死了更好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsraid_00049290_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I can pay you. Every cap I got, I'll pay you, if you can get rid of that gang. I promise, I'm good for it. I give my word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以付钱给你，如果你能把那帮家伙赶走，我就给你钱。我保证，我做得到，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsraid_00049290_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She says they're keeping other raider gangs from harassing you guys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她说这是为了防止其他掠夺者团伙骚扰你们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsRaiders2
She's such a coward!
ESP.TRADUIT: 她真是个胆小鬼!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsraid_00049292_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean... I love her, and I get why she's like this but... This is stupid. She thinks she's protecting us, but this is the opposite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是...我爱她，我知道她为什么这样，但...她很愚蠢。她以为她在保护我们，而事实恰恰相反。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsraid_00049292_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... Fine, I'll take care of this. I'm grown enough, I don't need to just wait and let her decide my life for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...好吧，我来处理。我已经长大了，我不需要再等她来决定我的人生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsraid_00049292_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She won't pay you to protect us? I will. If you can go to Dalton's hangout and kill him and his gang, I'll pay you everything I have. I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她不肯付钱让你保护我们吗?我愿意。如果你能去道尔顿的聚集地干掉他和他的帮派，我会把我所有的钱都给你，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsraid_00049292_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beats me. I offered to kill them, and she begged me not to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难倒我了，我提出要杀了他们，但她求我不要这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsRaiders3
Yes it is!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsraid_00049294_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That O'Neill guy sent you over to us, to help with our raider trouble. You came all the way here, from Westside, because he told you to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个奥尼尔派你来的，帮我们解决掠夺者的麻烦。你大老远从西区赶来，就是因为他让你这么做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsraid_00049294_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care what my sister says. She's only half the population of this ranch, and the other half wants you to finish the job O'Neill gave you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎我姐姐说什么，她只是这个农场一半的人，另一半的人想让你完成奥尼尔交给你的任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsraid_00049294_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can afford it. I mean it, you deal with Dalton and his gang, I'll pay you every last cap I got. I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我付得起，我是认真的，你搞定道尔顿和他那帮人，我就把所有的钱都付给你，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsraid_00049294_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, it ain't my problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 管它呢，不关我的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsAcceptQuest
Haha! Yes! We'll show them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈!是的!我们准让他们没好果子吃!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsacce_0004929c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I mean, I'll be there in spirit. Megan would have a heart attack if I ran off with anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我的意思是，我会在精神上支持你。因为如果我和别人私奔，梅根会心脏病发的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsacce_0004929c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you got here all the way from Westside. That's impressive enough. You can take out this raider crew, no sweat. I believe in you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你大老远从西区赶来，这很令我欣慰了，我相信你可以毫不费力地干掉这些掠夺者!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsacce_0004929c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'm gonna get your reward ready, for once you save us all. Uh, all... two of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我准备好你的奖赏了，这一次你救了我们所有人，呃...我们两个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsacce_0004929c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything you need before you go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你走之前还需要什么吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsacce_0004929c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHumboldtFarmQuest 50
Okay, I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会去做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsRefuseQuest
Well, then get off my property, you coward! I'll just kill them all myself next time they show up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就滚出我的地盘，你这个懦夫!下次他们再来的时候，我会亲手杀了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsrefu_0004929b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHumboldtFarmQuest 110
No, your money doesn't interest me. Solve your own problems, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我对你的钱不感兴趣。处理好你自己的问题，孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsHowMuchReward
I got... 1,083 caps. It's all yours if you get rid of that stupid gang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我攒了......1083瓶盖，如果你解决了那个愚蠢的帮派，就都是你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagshowm_00049299_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much are you offering, exactly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底出多少钱?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsHowAfford
Hey, I do my fair share of the work here. I get a share of the earnings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我在这里做我份内的工作，也能得到收益的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagshowa_0004929a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I'd get a bigger share if those raider assholes weren't extorting us.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...如果那些混蛋不勒索我们，我就能分到更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagshowa_0004929a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... Yeah... This is my life's savings right here. I'm prepared to give you all of it, that's how important to me this is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是...是的...这是我毕生的积蓄，我准备把所有的都给你，因为这件事对我来说很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagshowa_0004929a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you a little young to be throwing thousands of caps around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还这么年轻就能抛出几千瓶盖了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsSisterCoward
She's scared. Has been most of my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我大半生的认知里，她很害怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagssist_00049897_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was still a baby, we got attacked by a raider band. Megan and our dad fought 'em off, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我还是个婴儿的时候，我们被掠夺者袭击了，梅根和爸爸击退了他们，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagssist_00049897_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ma didn't make it. Megan's never got over it, even if she doesn't wanna admit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈没能挺过来。梅根一直都忘不了，即使她不想承认。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagssist_00049897_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She got by while dad was still around, but he died last winter. Now she's trying to do everything by herself, without actually doing anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸还在的时候她还坚持得住，但他去年冬天去世了。现在她什么事都想自己解决，但什么都解决不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagssist_00049897_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After what happened with ma, I think... I think Megan got scared of raiders. She couldn't beat them then, so she thinks she'll never be able to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈的事情之后，我觉得...我觉得梅根害怕掠夺者，她当时打不过他们，所以她认为自己永远也打不过他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagssist_00049897_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe once Dalton's crew is gone, she'll realize that they're weak. Ain't nothing worth fearing, but... I dunno. I just hope it helps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许等道尔顿的人走了，她会意识到他们很弱小。没什么值得害怕的，但是...我不晓得。我只是希望它能有所帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagssist_00049897_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why didn't your sister want me to kill the raider crew?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你姐姐为什么不让我杀了掠夺者?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsJob
Why's that, now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，现在？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsjob_00049899_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck finding any kinda farm out there that doesn't have their kids shooting before they're ten. I picked up a rifle when I was six.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你运气好到能找到一个没有孩子在十岁前就学会开枪的农场，我六岁的时候就拿起步枪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsjob_00049899_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, this is a 5.56 with minimal recoil. If those weak California troops can handle these, I definitely can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，这是还是后坐力最小的 5.56 步枪弹。 如果那些弱小的加州军队能够操控这种枪，那我绝对也可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsjob_00049899_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, are you on watch duty or something? Aren't you a bit young for that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在站岗还是怎么的?你是不是有点太年轻了?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsNCR
Well I don't see any reason I should. They ain't helping us any.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看不出我应该喜欢他们的理由，他们不会帮我们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsncr_0004989b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, even if they were here, y'know what they'd say? 'Cause I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说，就算他们在这儿，你知道他们会说什么吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsncr_0004989b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'd say that they'd keep us safe from all the raider gangs and outlaws and crazy wildlife out there, in exchange for a cut of our profits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们会说他们会保护我们不受暴徒，歹徒和疯狂野生动物的伤害，作为交换，他们会从我们的利润中分一杯羹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsncr_0004989b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now... How's that any different than Dalton's crew? They dress better? Give me a break.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...这和道尔顿的人有什么区别?衣冠正一点吗?饶了我吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsncr_0004989b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't like the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不喜欢NCR?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboldtNarc
I know that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtn_0004989e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's been bothering me ever since they first showed up. "You could hire some mercs for the money Dalton is demanding, problem solved."
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从他们出现后她就一直在烦我："你可以用给道尔顿的钱雇些雇佣兵，问题就解决了。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtn_0004989e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tried explaining to her, over and over. If I sent someone off to kill the raiders, and they failed, then we're dead. Or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我向她解释了一遍又一遍，如果我派人去杀掠夺者失败了，那我们就死定了，或者更惨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtn_0004989e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't risking it. If I wanted to wager everything I got on something I ain't certain on, I'd move to Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会冒这个险的，如果我想把我所有的钱都押在我不确定的事情上，我直接搬去维加斯不就好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtn_0004989e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I'm not changing my mind. I don't care what you say, and I don't much care for her arguments either. Heard 'em all before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会改变主意的，我不在乎你说什么，我也不太在乎她的论点，这些话我以前都听过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtn_0004989e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know your sister wants me to kill the raiders bugging you guys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你妹妹想让我杀了你们烦恼的掠夺者吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaltonBackground
Fuck off. Ask one of my crew, they'll tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚蛋。问我的手下，他们会告诉你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonbackgr_000498a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll tell you that I'm Dalton, and I'm the big boss of a whole crew of bad motherfuckers, and I'll piss on your skull if you bother me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们会告诉你我是道尔顿，是这群混蛋的老大，如果你烦我，我就在你头上撒尿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonbackgr_000498a2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the big dog around these parts. But you already knew that, didn't you, sweetheart?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是这里的老大，但你已经知道了，对吧，甜心?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonbackgr_00049ea1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can play dumb if you'd like. You knew this was a raider hangout, and you walked in anyway. I know your type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意，你可以继续装傻。你知道这里是掠夺者出没的地方，但你还是进来了，我了解你这种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too coy to ask for it up front, so you wanna make a sport of it. Might be I'll keep you for myself, unless you want me to share you with my crew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 羞于开口，所以你故意跑来这里展示。你想让我的人一起享用你还是让我独占你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonbackgr_00049ea1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaltonCrewBackground
Whatever you want to call it, I don't much give a shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么称呼我们，我都不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltoncrewba_000498a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're just a bunch of guys that like to drink and fuck and smoke, and most of all, we like raking in the cash and breaking heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们只是一群喜欢喝酒，做爱，抽烟的人，最重要的是，我们喜欢赚大钱，喜欢砸碎别人的脑袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltoncrewba_000498a4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bet you want to join, huh? Too bad. Ain't hiring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你也想加入?哈哈。很不幸，我们不招人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltoncrewba_000498a4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what? You guys supposed to be a gang or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以呢？ 你们应该是帮派之类的吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh. Gee, I wonder what such an innocent girl like you could want with a gang, hmm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵，哎呀，我想知道像你这样一个无辜的女孩想和一群男人在一起干什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltoncrewba_00049ea2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in luck, all my boys here enjoy a good lay, near as much as we like drinking, chems, and raking in the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很幸运，我们这里所有的男孩都享受着美好的生活，就像我们喜欢喝酒、嗑药和掠夺瓶盖一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltoncrewba_00049ea2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't looking for new hires, but if you wanna go ahead and handcuff yourself to the radiator, you'll fit right in all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是在找新员工，但如果你想把自己铐在暖气片上，那也OK。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltoncrewba_00049ea2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what? You guys supposed to be a gang or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以呢？ 你们应该是帮派之类的吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaltonJoinGang1
I run with badasses, not weak pussies like you. Besides, something's wrong with you. I can see it hanging over you like a fucking cloud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和一帮坏蛋一起混，而不是像你这样的小猫咪，而且你有点不对劲，你不知道你的目的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonjoinga_00049ea5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, I don't like your face. It makes me wanna do things to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，我不喜欢你的脸，它让我总想对它做点什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonjoinga_00049ea5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? Why wouldn't I be a good fit for you crew, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗?为什么我不适合你们呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whores already got a job, and it ain't gunslinging. Ain't that right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 妓女已经找到工作了，不是带枪的，对不对？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonjoinga_00049ea7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? Why wouldn't I be a good fit for you crew, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗?为什么我不适合你们呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaltonJoinGang2
Just a hunch. You roll in here with that weak little bitch energy, I just get a feeling you're hoping to be more than what you really are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是直觉，你带着那股柔弱的小婊子劲闯进来，我觉得你想要超越真实的自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonjoinga_00049ea6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep acting the badass, whatever helps you sleep at night. Just don't go getting a swelled head, or I might just have to cut it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续演坏蛋，只要能让你晚上睡得安稳就行。别自以为是，不然我就把你砍了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonjoinga_00049ea6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you think I'd ever want to join this shit gang you scraped together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你凭什么认为我会加入你拼凑的这个破帮派?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well gee, it might have something to do with the fact that you knew damn well what this place was, and you came inside anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是因为你很清楚这是什么地方，但你还是来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonjoinga_00049ea8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go ahead, keep acting like you're above it all. If you think my boys don't enjoy breaking in haughty bitches like you, you're dumber'n you look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，继续表现得你高高在上。如果你认为我的人不喜欢弄坏你这种傲慢的婊子，那你就比你看起来更蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonjoinga_00049ea8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you think I'd ever want to join this shit gang you scraped together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你凭什么认为我会加入你拼凑的这个破帮派?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboltAboutDalton
Dalton. Let's see, last time he talked with me about getting a cut of my earnings, my family's earnings... How'd he say it...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 道尔顿。让我想想，上次他和我谈论从我的收入中分一杯羹，我的家庭收入...他怎么说的来着...?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltab_00049eaa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "If you two bitches can't afford my protection, you could turn this place into a little bunny ranch. You two would be real popular with my boys."
ESP.TRADUIT: "如果你们两个婊子付不起保护费，你们可以把这地方变成小兔子农场，你们俩一定会很受我的男孩们的欢迎。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltab_00049eaa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That give you some notion what kinda guy he is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这让你知道他是什么样的人了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltab_00049eaa_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about this Dalton guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说这个道尔顿吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaltonDeathclawsAbout
Oh, wow, deathclaws. That's scary. I'm scared, since you brought that up. Oh geez.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,哇,死亡爪。这真可怕，你一提起，我就害怕了，哦天啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltondeathc_00049eac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey retard, deathclaws can't fit through the fucking doors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 白痴，死亡爪不会开门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltondeathc_00049eac_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You guys aren't worried about the deathclaws hanging out near your little hideout?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不担心死亡爪在你们这个小藏身处出没吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaltonAboutFarm
What the fuck about it? I don't give a rat's ass about fucking farming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈的到底是啥?我才不管他妈的什么农场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dalton [07027065] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaahumbold_aaadaltonaboutf_00049eae_1.ogg

What the hell?! Why?! Christ, we're going to die. If we're lucky, we're gonna die. If we're not, we'll be slaves. What the hell did you do that for?

ESP.TRADUIT: 我们付得起道尔顿的狗屁保护费，虽然有些勉强，但现在有什么能阻止其他掠夺者来这里呢?

[SUCCEEDED] That... that could actually work.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet... Caravan guards would work. Lemme think... Couldn't poach any from Crimson Caravan, but...

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldth_0004ab00_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，我想到了，最近巨石城附近发生了一些商队伏击事件，我敢说能在那找到一些失业的守卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldth_0004ab00_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I need you to find some guards down there. Tell them I'm offering room and board. I'm willing to negotiate about fees, if they show up.
ESP.TRADUIT: OK，我需要你去找几个守卫，告诉他们我提供食宿。如果他们能来，费用都可以商量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldth_0004ab00_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. Maybe... Maybe we're not dead after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，也许...我们最终不会死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldth_0004ab00_5.ogg
