ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldth_0004ab01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What we need are more bodies, people who can... Help us... Huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要的是更多的人能...帮助我们...嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldth_0004ab01_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guards. We need guards. Probably caravan guards, since they're used to the hours and wages we'd be talking about here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 守卫，我们需要守卫，商队守卫可能不错，因为他们已经习惯了我们现在谈论的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldth_0004ab01_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... I heard about some caravan ambushes down near Boulder City. I bet there are some out of work guards milling around down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...我听说巨石城附近有商队被打劫，我打赌那边肯定有一些失业的守卫在转悠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldth_0004ab01_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to speak with them. Tell them that I'm offering room and board, and I'll negotiate fees if and when they arrive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你去和他们谈谈，告诉他们我这儿提供食宿，如果愿意来的话薪酬也好商量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldth_0004ab01_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm counting on you, here. Please hurry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就指望你了，请尽快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldth_0004ab01_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHumboldtFarmQuest 80
Buy better guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 买更好的枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboldtDouchebag
Fuck that, you got us into this mess, and you owe us a debt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你的吧，是你把我们卷进来的，你欠我们人情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtd_0004ab29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You painted a giant target on our backs, and you're fixing it. We need guards, or something. You're finding them for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在我们背上画了个巨大的靶子，你得修复这个缺口。我们需要守卫之类的，你得帮我们去找。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtd_0004ab29_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard about some out-of-work caravan guards down near Boulder City. Tell them I'm offering room and board. I can negotiate pay if they arrive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你去和他们谈谈，告诉他们我这儿提供食宿，如果愿意来的话薪酬也好商量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtd_0004ab29_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get to it, and don't come back until you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吧，找不到就别回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtd_0004ab29_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHumboldtFarmQuest 80
Sounds like your problem, not mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来是你的问题，不是我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmAlfieBackground
Well, I'm Alfie, and that's Jessica and Chang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是阿尔菲，这是杰西卡和章。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfie [070449A3] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaahumbold_aaafarmalfiebac_0004ab2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't suppose you're running a caravan? We heard about some ambushers hanging around these parts. Gonna need some elite guards, like us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会是运营商队的吧？听说有一些抢劫商队的人在这附近埋伏，应该有人需要一些像我们这样的精英守卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfie [070449A3] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaahumbold_aaafarmalfiebac_0004ab2c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you guys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些家伙们是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmAlfieQualifications
Well, as it happens, I'm a veteran, which automatically makes me a certified badass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我是一名老兵，这就自然而然地让我成为了公认的坏蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfie [070449A3] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaahumbold_aaafarmalfiequa_0004ab2e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chang over there's been guarding caravans for the past five years. And Jessica... Has a big machine gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 章过去五年一直在做商队守卫，和杰西卡......以及一把大机关枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfie [070449A3] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaahumbold_aaafarmalfiequa_0004ab2e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, pretty damn qualified, if I do say so myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，如果要我说的话，我非常够格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfie [070449A3] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaahumbold_aaafarmalfiequa_0004ab2e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your qualifications?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的资历是什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmAlfieHired
Hmm... Well, that ain't caravan guarding, but I don't see what that matters...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...很好，虽然那不是商队守卫，但我觉得没什么关系...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfie [070449A3] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaahumbold_aaafarmalfiehir_0004ab30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, shit, worth a shot, I guess. Nobody around this dump is hiring, and getting paid would be a nice change of pace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，妈的，我认为值得一试，这破地方没人在招人，换一份拿钱的工作也不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfie [070449A3] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaahumbold_aaafarmalfiehir_0004ab30_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, we'll take a look. Room and board is a good deal. Alright guys, let's head north. See how this turns out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我们来看看，包食宿很划算。很好兄弟们，我们往北边去，看看结果如何。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alfie [070449A3] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaahumbold_aaafarmalfiehir_0004ab30_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHumboldtFarmQuest 90
How'd you feel about working on a farm? They're offering room and board. Fee is negotiable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得在农场工作怎么样?他们提供食宿，薪资面议。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboltQuestFinished
Thank god.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢天谢地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltqu_0004ab33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... I've been really on edge ever since dad died. It's been like every single thing around here was relying on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着...自从爸爸去世后，我一直很神经紧绷，好像这里的每件事都依赖我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltqu_0004ab33_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't been sleeping well. Jumpy all the damn time. Maybe... Not having to watch my back all the time will help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直睡不好，总是神经兮兮的。也许......不用一直提防周遭也是会有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltqu_0004ab33_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We owe you a lot. If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to ask. Thanks, I mean it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们欠你很多，如果你需要什么，尽管说。谢谢，我是认真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboltqu_0004ab33_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHumboldtFarmQuest 100
I found some guards at Boulder City. They seemed solid enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在巨石城找到了几个守卫，他们看起来够扎实。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFarmMagsNewHires
They're fine. Well, mostly fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们很好，嗯，基本没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsnewh_0004bd28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't trust Alfie's soul patch, but other than that, they're fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿尔菲那撮小胡子看起来很狡猾，但除此之外，他们都很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maggie Humboldt [070257A6] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femalechild02\aaahumbold_aaafarmmagsnewh_0004bd28_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, Maggie. How are the new hires working out for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨,玛吉，这些新员工工作得怎么样?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboldtNewHires
Pretty well, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好,真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtn_0004bd2a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Alfie guy sleeps a lot, but he's working graveyard shift, so I don't mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个叫阿尔菲的人睡得很多，但他上夜班，所以我不介意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtn_0004bd2a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Used to be, I could hardly sleep some nights. Too nervous, knowing we had no guards posted after dark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前到了晚上我都睡不着。太紧张了，因为我知道天黑后没有人站岗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtn_0004bd2a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think... We may actually be okay. Thanks again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得...我们应该真的不会有事了，再次感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtn_0004bd2a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's the hired help working out for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 雇来的帮手对你来说有帮助吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieMickRalphBark
I believe I bought my rifle here, years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得几年前在这里买的枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemickr_0004d533_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieForlornHopeTentBark
Killing all the commanders of this camp would be trivially easy. That the Legion hasn't done so suggests either incompetence, or laziness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死这个营地的所有指挥官是轻而易举的事。但军团没有这样做，说明他们要么是无能，要么是懒惰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieforlo_0004d538_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieUlyssesBark1
For a man with nothing interesting to say, he's in no hurry to stop talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个没有什么有趣的东西可说的人，却一直滔滔不绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_0004d53d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieUlyssesBark2
The most efficient way to neutralize your target would be to snipe him from afar, before he can speak... It would also make him shut up, for once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 压制你的目标最有效的方法是在他开口说话之前从远处狙击他，这也能让他彻底闭嘴，一次就够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_0004d554_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstPaulWinters
Old-time bounty hunter. Real effective, real ruthless. 50 years back, you wanted someone dead, you hired Winters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他以前是干赏金猎人，业绩显著，非常无情。在50年前，你想让人死，就雇温特斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpa_0004f037_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, when I was working for Burke, I got to see some financial records. 'Bout 40 years ago, the Burke Estate made a lot of payments to Winters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我为伯克工作的时候，看到过一些财务记录，大约40年前，伯克庄园给温特斯付了一大笔钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpa_0004f037_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, it didn't say what he did to earn the money, but... Well, only one thing I know Winters ever did for a career, and that was killing folks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上面没说这笔钱用来干什么的，但是...我知道温特斯只做一件事，那就是杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpa_0004f037_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, he killed people for the Burkes, got paid by the Burkes. Probably innocent witnesses or something, since that's the family way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以他为伯克家杀人，从伯克家拿钱，也许杀的是无辜的证人之类的，因为证人死亡是他们家族得以发展的前提。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpa_0004f037_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I happen to know that he's living in some shack, up by the cliffs north of Vegas. Go there, say hello, see what the old man knows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我碰巧知道他住在维加斯北边悬崖边上的一个小屋里。过去打个招呼，看看那老头知道些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpa_0004f037_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably some salacious shit, huh? Hopefully this guy can sink the motherfuckers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望这家伙能杀死那些好色的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstpa_0004f037_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaPaulWintersQuest 10
Who's Paul Winters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 保罗·温特斯是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieHurstWintersRetort
He killed people for a living, and yet some junkie with a score to settle knows his name and his location. Bounty hunters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他以杀人为生，却有个要算账的瘾君子知道他的名字和位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliehurst_0004f039_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersAboutBurke
Senator Burke? I never worked for him. First time I met him, he was a newborn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 参议员伯克吗?我从没为他工作过。我第一次见到他时，他还是个婴儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_0004f03c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tracked some bounties for his daddy, Carson Burke. He's been dead... What, twenty years now? Hell, I don't remember.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为他爸爸卡森·伯克干过一些赏金任务。他已经死了...什么，二十年过去了？见鬼，我不记得了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_0004f03c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What're you after, eh? You trying to get some kinda political dirt on them? Give me a break.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要什么，嗯?你想拿他们的政治丑闻说事吗?饶了我吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_0004f03c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you worked for Senator Burke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你为伯克参议员工作过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersBountyHunter
Just "a" bounty hunter, huh? Figures, may as well fade into obscurity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是“一个”赏金猎人，对吧？ 数字，可能有点模糊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbount_0004f042_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In my prime, I figured I was the top dog in the Mojave. Any target, no matter how ruthless or well-armed, I killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我年轻的时候，我认为我算是莫哈韦的老大。任何目标，无论多么残忍，装备多么精良，我都能干掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbount_0004f042_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Young punks with something to prove all came to me, looking to learn my methods, or to kill me and take glory as my killer. Never worked for 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 年轻的小混混们都想学些什么，他们来找我，想学我的技巧，或者想杀了我，以杀我为荣。但他们没有一个如愿的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbount_0004f042_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tully, Alquist, Pyke... They're "big names" in the business because they're emulating me. Assuming they ain't faded into obscurity, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 塔利、阿尔奎斯特、派克......这一行的“大人物”，他们都是在模仿我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbount_0004f042_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you were a bounty hunter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你以前是一个赏金猎人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersProceed1
If they've wronged you somehow, grab a rifle and wrong them back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们以某种方式给你造成麻烦，拿起步枪，把他们也麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersproce_0004f03e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. I was never paid for silence. I don't give a goddamn. Sure, I can tell you about what I did for them...
ESP.TRADUIT: 无所谓，我从来没有因为保密而得到过报酬。我才不管呢，当然，我可以告诉你我为他们做了什么......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersproce_0004f03e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...For a price.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...作为代价的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersproce_0004f03e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got one last score to settle, but my ass is past retirement. I'll be damned if I go to my grave without attending to this, but age beat me down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有最后一笔帐要算，但我已经退休了。年龄把我击垮了，如果我还逞强，我就死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersproce_0004f03e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care of it, and I'll talk all you want about my work history. Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞定它，我就跟你说我的工作经历，成交吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersproce_0004f03e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to bring the Burkes down. Know anything that might help me with that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想扳倒伯克一家，你有什么能帮到我的吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersAcceptQuest
Good. Now... I've killed more folks than I could ever hope to count. And 99 times out of 100, it weren't personal. Just doing my job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的...我杀的人多到我都数不过来了。不过一百次中有九十九次，都不是为我个人而杀的，我只是在干活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersaccep_0004f63e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But this one is about as personal as it gets. See, I wasn't always alone like this. I had a wife. And a son.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我唯一的私事。我并不是一直单身狗的，我有妻子和一个儿子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled

ESP.ORIGINAL: My boy, James, ran himself a respectable saloon. He didn't kill folks for a living, and that was fine by me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我儿子詹姆斯经营着一家体面的酒馆，他不以杀人为生，我也没意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersaccep_0004f63e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One night, I was drinking and chatting with the boy. Everything was quiet, until we hear shots in the street. Lady screaming bloody murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一天晚上，我和那孩子正在喝酒聊天。一切都很安静，直到我们听到街上的枪声，一个女人大声尖叫着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersaccep_0004f63e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: James grabbed his shotgun and was out the door before I was even to my feet. {grumbling}I was showing my age twenty damn years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没来得及站起来，詹姆斯就抓起猎枪走了出去。{牢骚地...}二十年前，我就已经老了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersaccep_0004f63e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear two more shots as I get to the door. I get outside, there's James, bleeding out like a dog in the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我走到门口时又听到两声枪响，当我出去之后，詹姆斯就趟在那里，像条狗一样躺在街上流血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersaccep_0004f63e_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got out there, just in time to see this goddamn ghoul rev up his ancient motorcycle, and off he went.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我出去的时候，正好看到这个该死的尸鬼开着他的古老摩托车离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersaccep_0004f63e_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dennis Godwin. I asked around, that's his name. You kill him for me, I'll say anything you goddamn want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丹尼斯·戈德温。我四处打听到了他的名字，你去杀了他，你想知道什么我就说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersaccep_0004f63e_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaPaulWintersQuest 20
Fine, what are your terms?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你的条件是什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersRefuseQuest
Heh. No skin off my back, kid. If this shit matters to you, you gotta play by my rules. If not... Well... Bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵，小子，这件事跟我毫无关系，如果对你很重要，你就得按我的规矩来。不然的话...很好...再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersrefus_0004f041_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not here to do your errands for you, old man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来帮你跑腿的，老头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersAboutPyke
Heh. Laslow Pyke, Mr. Aviators. That boy was all business. He mostly came to me for advice on getting the good contracts, not anything about killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，拉斯洛·派克，飞行员先生。那个男孩完全是个生意人，他来找我主要是想问我哪里能接到好合同，而不是寻求关于杀人的建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_0004f044_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He weren't much of a hunter. He preferred to wait for his targets to come to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不是个好的猎手，他更愿意等待他的猎物来找他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_0004f044_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'd set up ambushes. Let his targets walk into the explosives he rigged up. If any of 'em survived, Pyke and his boys opened up with the automatics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他设下埋伏，让他的目标走进他布置的炸药里。如果有人活下来，派克和他的手下就会用自动步枪射击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_0004f044_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess that's one way to do it, sure. Whatever it takes to do the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这也是一种方法，不惜一切代价完成任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersabout_0004f044_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Pyke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说派克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersNeverKilledDennis
I was a couple years away from retirement when that motherfucker killed my boy. I was already getting slow, and I couldn't catch up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个混蛋杀我儿子的时候，我还差几年就退休了，我手脚已经开始变慢了，我追不上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersnever_0004f640_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And he may as well've been a ghost. Nobody knew anything more than his name, at most. No contacts, no friends, no hometown. Just a trail of bodies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就像个鬼魂一样。除了他的名字，谁也不知道别的，没有联系人，没有朋友，没有家乡，跟一具尸体似的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersnever_0004f640_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's ridiculous. Now that I'm almost 80, I finally know where he is... And I can't get there. It's too far. I'm done. I'll never catch him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太荒谬了，现在我快80岁了，我总算知道他在哪里了......但我去不了那里，太远了。我完了，我永远抓不到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersnever_0004f640_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The best I can do... Is see to it that he's down in hell, waiting for me to arrive. I'll be there soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能做的最好的事...就是让他下地狱等着我，我很快就到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersnever_0004f640_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How come you never caught Godwin yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你自己怎么没抓到戈德温?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDennisWintersSent
Paul Winters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保罗·温特斯.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadenniswinter_0004f645_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I don't know who the fuck that is. Someone I've wronged, clearly. Not surprising. I've killed many people. Some of them had friends or family.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我他妈不知道那是谁。不过显然是我误杀的人，不奇怪，我杀过很多人，他们中的一些人有朋友或家人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadenniswinter_0004f645_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here on behalf of Paul Winters. Seems you owe him a blood debt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是代表保罗·温特斯来的，看来你欠他血债。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDennisInitiateCombat
This old song and dance, eh? I know it well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这首老歌和舞蹈，嗯？我对它很熟悉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisinitia_0004f647_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
<Attack> I'm here to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>我是来杀你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDennisBackground
I've been around since before the war, kid. Everything, everyone I ever cared for is dead. Been dead for goddamn centuries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从战前活到现在了，孩子。我在乎的每件事都过去了，在乎的每个人都已经死了几个世纪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004f649_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I an indiscriminate murderer? Yeah, I guess I am. I don't give a shit. I don't kill people out of some deep, personal animosity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一个不分青红皂白的杀人犯吗?是的，我想是的。我才不管呢，我不会因为深深的个人仇恨而杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004f649_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I kill them because I don't care. Because they were an obstacle, because they had something they didn't want to part with. Because it was convenient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀他们是因为我不在乎，因为他们是障碍，因为他们有不想放弃的东西，因为很容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004f649_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're all just going through the motions, ain't we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都只是装模作样，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004f649_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what? You're just some indiscriminate murderer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那又如何?你只是个滥杀无辜的杀人犯?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDennisBackground2
Me, my wife, our three girls... We didn't live in the city. We lived a few miles out. We weren't in the blast radius. But we were close enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，我妻子，我们的三个女儿...我们不住在城里。我们住在几英里外，我们不在爆炸范围内，但也很接近了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004f64b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My wife and I did everything we could. But seeing our girls... Their hair falling out, their gums bleeding... It was hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和我妻子已经尽力了，但看到我们的女儿...头发脱落，牙龈出血......这简直是地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004f64b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My wife was the first to die. She hanged herself. So... I put my daughters out of their misery. We were all suffering. So I ended it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我妻子是第一个死的，她上吊自杀了。所以...我让我的女儿们摆脱了痛苦，我们都在受苦，所以我结束了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004f64b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that was dealt with, I shot myself in the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那之后，我朝自己的头开了一枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004f64b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...And then I woke up. Somehow, I botched my own suicide, with a magnum to my fucking skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...然后我醒了，不知道为什么，我自杀失败了，我脑袋上留有一个该死的大洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004f64b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I crawled into the desert. I figured something out there would kill me soon enough, but it just never happened. And here I am, 200 years later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爬进了沙漠，我以为那里会有什么东西很快就会要了我的命，但我就是没死。200年后的今天，我仍然活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004f64b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieDennisDeathResponse
Ah, yes. "I suffered great personal tragedy, and so I'm justified in my psychotic behavior". That's a tired old excuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,是的。"我遭受了巨大的个人悲剧，所以我的精神病行为是合理的"，一个老套的借口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliedenni_0004fc47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDennisBackground3
I don't give a goddamn what "other people" choose to do with themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的不在乎“别人”如何对待自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004fc49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost everything. Everything that mattered to me, gone. And for what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我失去了一切，对我来说重要的一切都消失了，为什么呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I survived the rads. The process was agony, but I pulled through and stood on the other side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辐射让我活了过来，这个过程很痛苦，但我挺过来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004fc49_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if... if my girls would have done the same? What if I didn't put them out of their misery? What if I just murdered my daughters for nothing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果......如果我的女儿们也这么做呢?如果我不去让她们摆脱痛苦呢?如果我只是无缘无故地杀害了自己的女儿呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004fc49_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, to be clear, whoever the fuck your friend Winters is, I don't care. I don't care about him, or whoever it was that I killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以说清楚，不管你的朋友温特斯是谁，我都不在乎。我不在乎他，也不在乎我杀的那个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004fc49_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I don't care about you, neither. And you know what? I'm tired of talking. Come on and die already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有我也不在乎你，你懂吗?我都说烦了，来吧，去死吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dennis Godwin [0704DCD9] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleghoul02\aaapaulwin_aaadennisbackgr_0004fc49_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
And? You're not the only pre-war ghoul. Most of the others don't kill people for no reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后呢?你不是唯一的战前尸鬼，大多数尸鬼不会无缘无故杀人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersKilledDennis
You did?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawinterskille_0004fc4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then... That's it. I've outlived all my enemies. If anyone out there still wants me dead, I don't know who they are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后...就是这样。我比我所有的敌人都长寿，如果还有人想杀我，我也不知道他们是谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawinterskille_0004fc4b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been alive for a long time. I've done more than my share of awful things. To think, that after all of that, I'd outlast them all... Insanity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经活了很久了，我做过太多可怕的事了。想想看，在经历了这一切之后，我却比他们都活得长......太疯狂了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawinterskille_0004fc4b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, a deal's a deal. Anything I did for the Burke Estate, I'll tell you. What do you want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，交易就是交易，我为伯克家族所做的一切，我都告诉你，你想知道什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawinterskille_0004fc4b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Godwin for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我替你杀了戈德温。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersBurkeJob
Guess you'd call it a hitman. Not really any different than my usual bounty hunter work, except these guys weren't wanted by the law.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你会称之为杀手，和我平时的赏金猎人工作没什么不同，只是这些人不是被法律通缉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc4d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, to be clear, I didn't do any work for the Burke Estate, I did work for one man: Carson Burke, the senator's daddy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，澄清一下，我没有为伯克家族做任何工作，我只为一个人工作:卡森·伯克，也就是参议员的父亲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc4d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed business rivals, untrustworthy employees, scorned mistresses... Carson weren't into politics like his boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀死了商业对手、不值得信任的员工、受人鄙视的情妇......卡森不像他儿子那样热衷政治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc4d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaPaulWintersQuest 40
What was your job for the Burke Estate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在伯克家族做什么工作?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersBusinessRivals
All for the sake of the Burke Brahmin Empire. That's where most of the family's money comes from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切都是为了伯克家的婆罗门帝国的壮大，他的家族产业是他们家大部分金钱的来源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbusin_0004fc4f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They ain't the biggest Brahmin family in California, but they're up there. Top five, at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不是加州最大的婆罗门家族，但他们在榜上，至少前五名。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbusin_0004fc4f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Carson was very selective with his targets. Even if he wasn't personally in politics, he had the ear of a lot of important government types.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡森对目标非常挑剔。虽然他本人不参与政治，但很多政府人物都和很尊敬他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbusin_0004fc4f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If a Brahmin baron in his neck of the woods was supporting the wrong political factions, Burke gave me the green light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果一个婆罗门男爵在他的地盘支持错误的政治派别，伯克就会给我来生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbusin_0004fc4f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the head of the family suffered some "accident" in some kinda way, Burke would buy up their assets for himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦一家之主遭遇某种形式的“意外”，伯克就会收购他们的资产。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbusin_0004fc4f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He got richer, and the opposing political bloc got weaker. And, I got paid. That was the bit that mattered to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他变得更富有，而对立的政治派系变得更弱，我得到了报酬。这一点对我来说很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbusin_0004fc4f_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, most of those folks weren't guilty of nothing more than being in the way. I don't really have any qualms about killing them, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 对他而言，大多数人死的原因不过是碍事而已，杀了他们我也并没有什么顾虑，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbusin_0004fc4f_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if you're looking for dirt on the Burkes, there you go. Their former patriarch loved him some assassinations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你要找伯克家族的丑闻，那就去吧，他们的前族长喜欢搞一些暗杀行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersbusin_0004fc4f_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about these business rivals you killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说你杀死的那些商业对手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersBurkeMistresses
What, are you kidding me? Hell yes, he had mistresses. Tons of 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，你在开玩笑吗?他当然有情妇，成吨的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He and his wife hated each other. They had two sons, Henry and Tobias, and other than that, they avoided one another, whenever possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和他的妻子互相憎恨。他们有两个儿子，亨利和托拜厄斯，然后，他们总是尽可能地回避对方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc51_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, Carson got his fill from local girls. Now, he didn't like professional whores. He liked to turn respectable girls into whores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，卡森从当地女孩那里寻求满足，他不喜欢职业妓女，他喜欢把体面的姑娘变成妓女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc51_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Socialites, entertainers, the daughters of other dynasties... He'd offer them so much cash, they couldn't imagine turning him down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 社会名流、艺人、其他婆罗门王朝的女儿们......他愿意给她们那么多现金，她们无法想象如何拒绝他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc51_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And once he'd had a woman, he'd only have her but that one time. Afterwards, he'd have them thrown out on their asses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦他得到一个女人，他只会玩一次。之后，他就会把她们赶出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc51_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if any of them started talking about what a wretched man he was, how he couldn't get away with treating them like that, well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果她们中的任何一个开始说自己是一个多么可怜的人，他怎么能这样对待她们的话，嗯......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc51_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: World's a violent place. Hard to see it coming if you're the victim of, say... A mugging gone wrong, for one example.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，世界是个充满暴力的地方，如果你是受害者，你很难预见它的到来......举个例子，某个劫匪的目标不小心挑错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc51_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burke had mistresses?
ESP.TRADUIT: 伯克有情妇?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersBurkeTraitors
Oh yeah. See, I wasn't ever in Carson's inner circle. He has himself a little elite squad of killers and thugs, answered only to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢,是的。听着，我从来都不是卡森的核心人物，他有一小队精英杀手和暴徒，只听他指挥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They generally handled "internal" business for the family. I was mostly kept on retainer to deal with issues that needed some plausible deniability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们通常为家族处理“内部”事务，我基本上是被聘来处理一些需要合理撇清嫌疑的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc53_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, on the rare occasion that one of his private security people got cold feet, someone outside the security team would have to take them out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，在极少数情况下，比如他的私人安保人员临阵退缩了，那么安保团队之外的人就得把退缩的人干掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc53_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Otherwise, they could run and squeal about whatever shady business they were doing on behalf of the boss. They knew things no-one else did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 否则，他们就会跑出去，把老板做的所有见不得人的勾当大声公布——他们知道别人不知道的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc53_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As the nutjobs across the river might say: "Quis custodiet ipsos custodes?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像河对岸的疯子会说的那样:"看守们由谁来看守呢？"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawintersburke_0004fc53_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Untrustworthy employees?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们有不值得信赖的员工吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaStanGoldHello1
My problem? Gee, well, I guess it's that I have some random slack-jawed cunt drooling over me, while I'm trying to eat and chat with my buddy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的问题吗?天啊，好吧，我猜是因为我在和我的朋友吃饭聊天的时候，有个下巴松弛的女人对着我流口水吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldhell_0004fc58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The slack-jawed cunt is you, by the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便说一句，那个下巴松弛的婊子就是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldhell_0004fc58_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other than that... I'm great! Golden even! Heh. I'm rich, I'm gorgeous, I've got serious actresses and musicians, lining up to suck my fat cock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外......我太棒了!简直是黄金!哈，我有钱，我美丽动人，我有正经的女演员和音乐家，排队等着给我舔肥鸡巴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldhell_0004fc58_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I'll say again: What. The fuck. Do you. Want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我再说一遍：什么。他妈的。你。想要什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldhell_0004fc58_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, what's your problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，你有什么问题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaStanGoldHelloProceed
Yeah? Well, I want the first lady to give me a handy next time I'm eating dinner with the president, but we don't always get what we want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗?我希望下次我跟总统吃晚餐时，第一夫人能帮我一把，但我们不是总能得到我们想要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldhell_0004fc5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, wait, she'd totally do that if I waved some of my mega-millions in her face. Guess it's just cretins like you that have to be disappointed. Aww.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，等等，如果我拿着我的百万美元对着她挥手，她肯定会这么做的。看来只有像你这样的白痴才会失望，哇哇哇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldhell_0004fc5a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the fuck should I bother talking to you about whatever inane bullshit that you want to natter on about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈为什么要跟你说你想听的那些无聊的屁话?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldhell_0004fc5a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to tell me your business with the Burke family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要你告诉我你和伯克家的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaStanGoldHello2
Awwww, did I hurt the widdle baby's widdle feelings? Booooo fucking hooooo, poor baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哇哇，我伤害到小宝贝的感情了吗？booooo~操你妈的~hooooo~可怜的孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldhell_0004fc5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you. I'm so rich, they need to invent a new word to describe just how fucking loaded I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈的，我太有钱了，他们需要一个新词来形容我有多有钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldhell_0004fc5c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you know what that means? It means I can piss on little peasant bitches like you - with impunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这意味着什么吗?意思是我可以在你这样的小乡下婊子身上撒尿而不受惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldhell_0004fc5c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you could try being polite. That might be a good starting point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你可以试着礼貌点，这或许会是一个好的开始。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaStanGoldTerrify
