ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I think the best thing for my mental health right at this moment would be to discuss something else. Shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我想现在对我的精神健康最好的办法是谈点别的，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliediagn_00050877_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I respect that, but I think you should reconsider. You won't get better if you don't try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊重这一点，但我觉得你应该重新考虑一下，如果你不尝试，就不会好起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaStanGoldBurkeBusiness2
That's it! Honest!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样！诚实！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldburk_00050e77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, my shit is well fucking worth it. I got cash, I got perfect-ten sluts on lock, you best fucking believe I party like a fucking god.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我的东西绝对他妈的值得。我有现金，我有十来个荡妇，你他妈最好相信，我开派对像个神一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldburk_00050e77_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaStanGoldBuddies
I got my boy Jansen, he fucks bitches like a... like a fucking... uh, like a machine that was designed to fuck bitches. Yeah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有我的男孩詹森，他像一个...像一个该死的...就像一台专为上婊子而设计的机器！耶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldbudd_00050e79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that there pair of titties is Layla, some whore with big ol' dreams of superstardom. I might make her dreams come true, if she persuades me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那对奶子是蕾拉，一个梦想着成为超级明星的妓女。如果她能说服我，我也许能使她的梦想成真。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldbudd_00050e79_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are your friends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁是你的朋友?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaStanGoldVegas
Oh, it's all very serious business, right? But, my fucking business is pleasure, so this is a fucking lucrative vacation, feel me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是很严肃的事，对吧？但是，我的工作就是娱乐，所以这是一个赚钱的假期，懂吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldvega_00050e7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First off, I'm here to buy up a little independent smut studio. That's how I became the goddamn Porn King of California, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我要收购一家独立的小色情片工作室，这就是我能成为加州色情片之王的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldvega_00050e7b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever see any of them "Busta Nutt" skin flicks? Shit's tight, so I'm buying up Alberta Studios, and getting my share of the cash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看过"布斯塔·纳特"的春宫戏吗?太劲了，我要买下阿尔伯塔制片厂，分一杯羹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldvega_00050e7b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard their lead actor broke his contract, but whatever. I'll just force 'em to cast my boy Jansen in the lead role. Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说他们的男主角毁约了，不过无所谓的，我会强迫他们让我的儿子詹森演主角，随便
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldvega_00050e7b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, New Vegas is fucking flooded with skanky whores that will degrade themselves any which way for a fat payday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，新维加斯到处都是为了一大笔钱不惜一切代价贬低自己的下流妓女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldvega_00050e7b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing like seeing a bitch with delusions of classiness, getting down and dirty for a quick buck. That's my fucking production motto, motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么比看到一个自以为高贵的婊子，为了一笔快钱而不择手段更爽的事了。这是我的工作座右铭，操他妈的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stan Gold [0700C537] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaastangol_aaastangoldvega_00050e7b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brought you to Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么风把你吹到拉斯维加斯来了?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstAboutAdam
Well, it seems that poor ol' Adam got sick of being given his own medicine. Lil' bitch hanged himself in his cell last night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来可怜的亚当受够了自己曾给别人吃的苦头，小婊子昨晚在牢房里上吊自杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstab_00051479_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah, I got word from one of my sources back west. Adam's prison life consisted of daily beatings and non-consensual fun in the showers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我从西部的一个线人那里得到消息。亚当的监狱生活包括每天的殴打和在淋浴时的非自愿享乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstab_00051479_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exactly the same shit that sick fuck liked to inflict on his victims. Well, they're still alive, while he's swaying from the light fixtures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和那个恶心的变态喜欢对受害者做的一模一样。现在他们还活着，而他却挂在灯光下摇摆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstab_00051479_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! Oh man, what a fucking piece of shit he was. That's just... poetic. Such a beautiful end to such a repulsive cunt-creature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈!老兄，他就是一坨屎。只是...如此富有诗意，如此令人厌恶的婊子，如此美丽的结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstab_00051479_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, no doubt his senatorial daddy is gonna blame you for this. Guess you're in it all the way with me now, mailman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，他那个当参议员的老爸会为此怪罪你的，我猜你现在只能跟我站一边了，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstab_00051479_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, that's your bit of good news for the day. What'd you want to chat about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 差不多了，这就是你今天的好消息。你想聊些什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstab_00051479_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstStanProceed
That right? Shit, normally I'd suggest you stick his head in a vise, but I don't think you can get away with that in the middle of the Tops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对吗？该死，通常我会建议你把他的头塞进老虎钳里，但我不认为你能在上好佳赌场里轻易逃脱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstst_0005147a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... Lemme think... Uh... Oh, I got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...让我想想......嗯...哦，我知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstst_0005147a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just gotta assfuck him with insider info. Really break his spirit, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就把内幕消息塞到他屁眼里，让他真的精神崩溃，如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstst_0005147a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In addition to all the cash he got from Senator Burke, I happen to know he's been sending some of his own money to a different Burke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了他从伯克参议员那里得到的现金，我碰巧知道他把自己的一些钱汇给了另一个伯克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstst_0005147a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fucking reverend, of all people. Why a porn producer would be paying off a fucking clergyman, well... It's probably shady, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 居然是一个他妈的牧师，为什么一个色情片制作人会付钱给一个该死的牧师，嗯...这可能很可疑，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstst_0005147a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bad for him, the reverend is right here, in the Mojave. I bet he'll know something that would make Stan really shit himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不幸，牧师就在莫哈韦沙漠。我打赌他会知道些能让斯坦吓得屁滚尿流的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstst_0005147a_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lessee, the church should be down near the Aerotech refugee camp. Go and chat with the reverend, see what intel he's sitting on, yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 教堂应该在航空科技难民营附近，去和牧师聊聊，看看他知道什么，是吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstst_0005147a_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaStanGoldQuest 50
Gold is holding out on me. I know he isn't giving me all the details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 戈尔德瞒着我，我知道他没有告诉我所有的细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeAboutSenator
Of course I know him. We're first cousins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然认识他，我们是近亲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't seen him a while, however. He's quite focused on his political career, whereas I try to keep my concerns centered on spiritual matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我有段时间没见到他了。他非常专注于他的政治生涯，而我尽量把我的关注点放在宗教问题上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a79_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I probably don't need to tell you this, but the soul of the Mojave is in grave danger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能不需要告诉你这些，但莫哈韦人的灵魂正处于极度危险之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a79_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place seems to bring out the worst in people. Personal greed above all else, the glorification of wealth and hedonism... Terrible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方似乎把人最坏的一面都暴露出来了，个人的贪婪高于一切，对财富的颂扬和享乐主义......糟透了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a79_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now, with the Legion poised to assault the Hoover Dam, the entire Mojave is in peril. I pray the NCR can be our salvation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，随着军团准备进攻胡佛水坝，整个莫哈韦都处于危险之中。我祈祷NCR能拯救我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a79_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know Senator Burke?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识伯克参议员吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeBackground
I did, yes. I know pride should be avoided, but I can't help myself from taking some satisfaction in the good work that we're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我，对。我知道应该避免骄傲，但我情不自禁地从我们所做的出色工作中获得了一些满足感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeback_00051a7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Republic has done an exemplary job in reigniting the flames of the old world. Between the government and OSI, we're well on our way to recovery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 共和国在重新点燃旧世界的火焰方面做得堪称典范。 在政府和OSI之间，我们正走上复苏之路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeback_00051a7b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, something that always stood out to me as a boy, was the NCR's foundation seemed to lack any ties to God. Only men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，当我还是个孩子的时候，有一件事总是让我印象深刻，那就是NCR的建立似乎与上帝没有任何联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeback_00051a7b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I founded Burke Ministries to correct this oversight, and bring the good news to our citizenry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我成立了伯克事工来纠正这一疏忽，给我们的公民带来福音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeback_00051a7b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our facilities back west are more impressive, of course, but I felt the Mojave needed spiritual aid even more than California did. So here I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我们在西边的设施更令人印象深刻，但我觉得莫哈韦人比加州人更需要精神援助，所以我来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeback_00051a7b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You founded this church?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你创立了这个教堂?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeAboutSenator2
Crimes? Surely you're exaggerating, yes? Hen- The Senator is, I will confess, a touch on the ruthlessly pragmatic side, yes...
ESP.TRADUIT: 罪行？你肯定是夸大其词了，对吧？我得承认，这位参议员有点冷酷，是的......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alas, I think that mindset is an unfortunately common side-effect of playing the political game. I'm grateful I chose to focus on God.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唉，我认为这种心态是玩政治游戏的不幸的常见副作用，我很感激我选择专注于上帝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a7d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, don't begrudge the Senator for playing into his role. It's the system itself that we need to reform, and that's what I aim to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请不要因为参议员扮演了他的角色而嫉妒他，我们需要改革的是体制本身，这也是我的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a7d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless... You're referring to that unfortunate business with Adam. That... reeked of criminality, I'm sad to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非...你指的是亚当那件不幸的事，那件事散发着犯罪的气息，我很遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a7d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand that Adam is no longer with us. I pray for his soul, and I'm keeping his father in my thoughts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道亚当已经不在了，我为他的灵魂祈祷，我也一直挂念着他的父亲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a7d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you aware of your cousin's crimes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你表弟的罪行吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeAboutAdam
Ah, I'd only met him a few times, when he was a young boy, you understand. I haven't been present in California itself for... 14 years now, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我只见过他几次，那时候他还是个小男孩，你懂的。我在加州已经有...我想已经14年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a7f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adam's choices, monstrous as they were, belonged to him alone. I'd never want to imply that his father could bear any culpability, but still...
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当的选择，虽然可怕，却只属于他一个人。我不想暗示他父亲有任何过错，但还是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a7f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I often wonder, if Adam had been given more religious education as a boy, if he would have turned out differently?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经常会想，如果亚当小时候接受了更多的宗教教育，他会不会有不同的表现？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a7f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: May I ask, what's this about? Adam, his father...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以问一下，亚当，他父亲......怎么样了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00051a7f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know Adam, reverend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识亚当吗，牧师?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeAdamTruth
Oh, my.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，天哪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeadam_00051a85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you had your reasons. I understand that Adam was a fugitive, and may not have been willing to surrender peacefully.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你有你的理由，我知道亚当是个逃犯，他可能不愿意和平投降。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeadam_00051a85_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you should know, killing a man, for any reason, is not a choice to be made lightly. It can carry grave consequences, in this life, and the next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你要知道，无论出于何种原因，杀人都不该是轻易做出的选择，它会带来严重的后果，今生来世都一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeadam_00051a85_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should seek forgiveness while you can. Those who live by the gun tend to die by it, often when they least expect it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该尽可能地寻求原谅。那些靠枪生活的人往往会死于枪下，而且往往是在他们最意想不到的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeadam_00051a85_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the one that killed Adam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我杀了亚当。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, I see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,我明白了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeadam_00051a86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I thank you for your service, and for your mercy while dealing with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感谢你的服务，感谢你在处理这件事时的仁慈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeadam_00051a86_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was surprised when I heard that he had taken his own life. It only further cements my belief that he lacked an understanding of spirituality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我听说他自杀的时候，我很惊讶。这只会进一步加深我的信念，即他缺乏对精神性的理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeadam_00051a86_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, thank you once again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，再次感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeadam_00051a86_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the one that brought Adam in alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我把亚当活着带回来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeAdamLie
Did you? Well, I'm sorry for your loss. I'll pass Henry your sympathies when I see him next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？对你失去朋友我深表遗憾，下次见到亨利时，我会转达你的同情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeadam_00051a83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [LIE] I was friends with Adam a few years back, that's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: (谎言)几年前我和亚当是朋友，仅此而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeAdamDeflect
I wish that the papers would print words of spiritual encouragement and compassion, instead of this exploitative muckraking tabloid dreck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望报纸能刊登精神上的鼓励和同情的文字，而不是像小报那样大肆揭露丑闻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeadam_00051a84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adam's sins were great, but I hope that we may learn from his mistakes, and forgive him his trespasses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚当的罪是很大的，但我希望我们能从他的错误中吸取教训，原谅他的罪过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeadam_00051a84_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, just read about it in the papers. Wanted to hear your take.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，看报纸就知道了，想听听你的看法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeAboutJessie
Oh, well, I'm afraid I don't know the specifics about that sort of thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，恐怕我不知道这类事情的细节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00052097_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We do organize field trips so that our students can see the NCR, but I'm not the one that handles the details of that program.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会组织实地考察，这样学生们就能看到NCR，但我不是负责这个项目细节的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00052097_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd be wanting to speak with Deacon Paulson, but he's the one leading the California trip. You'll have to wait for their return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该想和保尔森执事谈谈，但他是加州之旅的领队，你得等他们回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00052097_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I help you with anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有别的事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkeabou_00052097_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMainJessieQuest 80
I'm trying to see one of your students, named Jessie O'Neill. I was told she's out of state?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要见你的一个学生，叫杰西·奥尼尔的，有人告诉我她不在这个州?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeStanProceed
I'd be curious to know where you learned that bit of information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很想知道你从哪里得知的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052099_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I preferred to keep financial records like that private to avoid this precise conversation. Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我更愿意将这样的财务记录保密，以避免这种精确的会话，非常好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052099_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I find Mr. Gold's choice of profession to be repulsive and an overall detriment to the community.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得戈尔德先生的职业选择令人厌恶而且对整个社会有害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052099_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be that as it may, my primary concern is to always aim for the greater good, and his financial contributions are a means to that end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，我主要关心的是始终以更大的利益为目标，他的财政捐助是达到这一目的的一种手段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052099_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maintaining the ministries requires a good deal of money. Expanding our programs requires even more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维持这个事工需要大量资金，扩大我们的项目则需要更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052099_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The donations we receive from our congregation are very appreciated, but they aren't enough to keep our ministries operational.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们非常感激会众的捐款，但这些捐款不足以维持我们的事工运作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052099_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The price of the good work we do is, unfortunately, paid in part with dirty money. I'd ask that you don't spread that around, if you don't mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我们做这些好事的代价，有一部分是用脏钱来支付的。如果你不介意的话，我希望你别到处宣扬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052099_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is it that Stan Gold, the porn producer, is sending you payments?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么色情片制作人斯坦·戈尔德，会掏钱给你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeStanContinue
Oh, I couldn't tell you. I assume he's trying to buy his way into heaven, in lieu of actually changing his behavior.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我不能告诉你。我猜他是想花钱见上帝，而不是真正想改变自己的行为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052695_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, his money is being put to good use, and for that, I am willing to overlook his profession and... Mannerisms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，他的钱被用在了很好的地方，为此，我愿意忽略他的职业和...言谈举止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052695_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is Stan paying you, though?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么斯坦要付钱给你?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeStanContinueMore
It's not my place to pass judgement, although I confess that speaking with Mr. Gold wasn't particularly enjoyable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我承认与戈尔德先生谈话不是很愉快，但我没有资格发表评论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052697_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wasn't on good behavior, either. I'd prefer he not return to our establishment again, unless he's looking to learn from us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的行为也不好，我不希望他再来我们这里，除非他想向我们学习。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052697_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you've met Mr. Gold. Charming man, isn't he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你见过戈尔德先生了，很有魅力的人，不是吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRevBurkeStanFinal
Hmm? Oh, forget I mentioned anything. It's not my place to discuss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯?哦，当我没说，这不是我该说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052699_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么需要我帮忙的吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reverend Burke [07003025] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaarevburkevoice\aaaburkech_aaarevburkestan_00052699_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaStanGoldQuest 60
What do you mean? What did he do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么意思?他做了什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMonicaStanProceed
Oh. Yes. Him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的，他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicastanpr_0005269b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was here, and I truly hope he never returns. He made a great deal of disgusting comments towards me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他来过这里，我真心希望他永远别回来，他对我说了许多令人作呕的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicastanpr_0005269b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when he left, he took one of our interns with him. I assume he promised her an outrageous amount of money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他走的时候，还带走了我们的一个实习生，我猜他答应给她一大笔钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicastanpr_0005269b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand that Stan Gold, the porn producer, visited here? Am I correct?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道色情制作人斯坦·戈尔德来过这里？我说得对吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMonicaStanProceed2
Yes, he did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicastanpr_0005269d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe her name was... Uh... Raya, I think. Decent student, but, well... Maybe not so devout, evidently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想她的名字是...嗯...拉娅，我想。正经的学生，但是...显然，也许没有那么虔诚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicastanpr_0005269d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We never saw her again. I'd rather not know what sorts of jobs he assigned to her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们再也没见过她，我宁愿不知道他给她分配了什么工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicastanpr_0005269d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaStanGoldQuest 70
He took an intern?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他找了个实习生?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaStanProceed
Ah, well, there's a load of things I never wanted to think about again, all wrapped up in one convenient question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，好吧，有很多事情我不愿意再想了，其实都集中在一个简短的问题里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_00052c99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I was enrolled in that church. I wanted to learn medicine, and they didn't charge anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我也加入了那个教堂，我想学医，他们不收任何费用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_00052c99_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers in Freeside don't really have the personnel to teach wannabe doctor idiots, so I sprung for the church, instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由之城的天启追随者们真的没有人力来教那些想当医生的白痴，所以我就去了教堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_00052c99_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then, one day, in strolls that fucking prick, Gold. He had a meeting with the reverend, but he didn't leave after it was done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后有一天，那个该死的戈尔德来了。他和牧师见了面，但会面结束后他没有离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_00052c99_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Instead, he patrolled the church grounds, looking at everyone there. Then he comes to me, says he'll give me five grand to follow him to California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相反，他在教堂的场地上巡视，观察那里的每一个人。然后他来找我，说给我五千瓶盖让我跟着他去加州。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_00052c99_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said if I refused, the reverend would have me kicked out of the church anyway. 5000 was more caps than I'd ever seen before, so I went along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说如果我拒绝，牧师无论如何都会把我赶出教堂，5000瓶盖比我以前见过的都多，所以我就去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_00052c99_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I say? I was a very stupid 15-year-old.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能说什么呢?我当时是个非常愚蠢的15岁孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_00052c99_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you left Burke Ministries at the urging of Stan Gold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你在斯坦·戈尔德的催促下离开了伯克事工。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaStanProceed2
Yeah, yeah. So, as soon as we got out of the church, I got directed into the back of a truck, with Stan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,是的。所以，我们一走出教堂，我就和斯坦一起坐进了一辆卡车的后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_00052c9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the second the doors shut, Stan starts barking questions at me. "Are you a virgin? You got a clean bill of health? Can you act?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 门一关上，斯坦就开始问我问题：“你是处女吗?你身体健康吗?你能表演吗?”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_00052c9b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said he'd make me a movie star, and I'd get paid accordingly, but, first he needed me to "pass an oral examination."
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他会让我成为一个电影明星，我也会得到相应的报酬，但是，首先他需要我“通过一个口试”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_00052c9b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's me slipping some euphemistic double-entendre in there. His actual words were, and I quote: "Suck my fat cock, bitch."
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，是我把这句话说得太委婉了，他的原话我引用一下："舔我的肥鸡巴，婊子。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_00052c9b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then what happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后发生了什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMonicaSecurity
Trust me, you're not the first person to think that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，你不是第一个这么想的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicasecuri_00053297_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The reverend spared no expense when it came to our security. We have emergency shutters that can block off the doorways, if necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 牧师为我们的安全不惜一切代价，如有必要，我们有紧急百叶窗，可以挡住门口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicasecuri_00053297_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We also have a small security force, led by Mr. Brecker. They keep watch outside the building, and so far we've had no trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还有一支小型安全部队，由布瑞克先生领导。他们在大楼外面放哨，到目前为止我们还没遇到什么麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicasecuri_00053297_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, in the worst case scenario, we have an emergency exit a little past our student's sleeping quarters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在最坏的情况下，我们也有一个紧急出口，就在学生宿舍稍微过去一点的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicasecuri_00053297_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this building safe from outlaws? It seems like they'd have an easy time breaking in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这栋楼安全吗?看起来他们很容易就能闯进来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMonicaBrecker
He's our security chief. He doesn't really talk much, but the reverend pays him to keep us safe from raiders, and he's done a fine job so far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是我们的安全主管，他话不多，但牧师给他钱让他保护我们免受掠夺者袭击，到目前为止，他干得不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Monica Nelson [0700236C] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaburkech_aaamonicabrecke_00053299_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who is Mr. Brecker?
ESP.TRADUIT: 布瑞克先生是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaStanProceed3
You bet your ass he was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以绝对肯定他参与了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_000538ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gold kept saying he paid Burke good money to buy my ass, so I better not disappoint him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 戈尔德一直说他给了伯克一大笔钱来买我，所以我最好别让他失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_000538ac_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway... After that was done with, the truck pulled up by some old warehouse. Stan told me to stay in the back of the truck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何......在那之后，卡车停在一个旧仓库旁边。斯坦让我待在卡车后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_000538ac_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He got into the passenger seat up front, and suddenly a dozen other women climb into the back of the truck with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他坐到了前面的副驾驶座位上，突然十几个女人和我一起爬进了卡车的后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_000538ac_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stan tells us all not to speak, and then we drive off. Was packed into the back of that truck for goddamn hours. Only got one bathroom break.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯坦叫我们不要说话，然后就开车了。我们被塞在卡车后面好几个小时，只上了一次厕所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_000538ac_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's disgusting. Do you think the reverend was in on this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太恶心了，你觉得牧师也参与了吗?

Hmm... No, I think that's enough of pro bono storytime with Granny Raya.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a complete moron. I can tell you're compiling some sort of evidence. Sounds like... Something that would implicate Burke, yes?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastanpr_000538ae_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can give you all the details you want, but I want something in return. Specifically, vengeance for destroying my life.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Stan for me, and I'll sing whatever song you like, with paperwork to back it up. Otherwise... I'm not in the mood to chatter away anymore.

Stan! No!
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯坦！不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jansen [0700C536] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult02\aaastangol_aaajansengohost_00054ac6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat.player
aaaNVRayaStanDead
Well... Good. That's good. I hope you actually did kill him, and you're not just telling me what I want to hear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...好，这很好，我希望你真的杀了他，而不是在撒谎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastande_00054ac8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, a deal's a deal. I'll give you the salacious bits I know you're really looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，交易就是交易，我会给你想要的色情部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastande_00054ac8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So. Me and a bunch of other girls were in the back of a truck, driving to California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我和其他几个女孩坐在一辆卡车的后座上，开往加州。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastande_00054ac8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We arrived at some big ranch estate, and we all got herded out to some building with beds for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来到了一个大庄园，我们都被赶到了一个有床的房子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastande_00054ac8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of Stan's makeup people came and made sure we all looked our best. Then some guys with guns showed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯坦的一些化妆师来了，确保我们看起来都是最美的，然后几个拿着枪的人出现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastande_00054ac8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The gunmen said we were going to be the "entertainment" at a high-society party, and if we didn't behave ourselves, we'd be shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些枪手说我们将成为上流社会聚会上的“娱乐”，如果我们不守规矩，就会被枪毙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastande_00054ac8_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They meant it, too. Next night, we're dropped off at Stan's mansion and told to mingle with rich, important fucks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们也是认真的，第二天晚上，我们被送到斯坦的豪宅，还被告知要和有钱有势的人交往。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastande_00054ac8_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If any of the rich assholes wanted us, we had to go along with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有哪个有钱的混蛋想要我们，我们就得附和。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayastande_00054ac8_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stan Gold is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯坦·戈尔德死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaPartyPurpose
Well, him and Stan were the real winners. See, Stan's mansion has a lot of bedrooms. And they're all bugged with cameras and hidden mics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和斯坦才是真正的赢家，斯坦的宅邸有很多卧室，而且都装了摄像头和隐藏的麦克风。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayapartyp_00054aca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All of those rich, important men, most of 'em were married. And even if they weren't, a decent number of us girls were a few years underage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有那些有钱有势的男人，大多数都结婚了。我们当中的很多女孩都是未成年。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayapartyp_00054aca_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stan got blackmail on all of 'em. And he sold his blackmail material... To one Senator Burke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯坦对他们所有人进行了勒索。，他把他的勒索材料卖给了一位叫伯克的参议员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayapartyp_00054aca_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, I shouldn't know this, but after the party, I went to ask Stan for the five grand he promised me. Stupid, I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，我不该知道这件事的，派对结束后，我去问斯坦要他答应给我的五千块。这很蠢，我知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayapartyp_00054aca_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was about to knock on his door, but I stopped when I overheard him and the Senator discussing the price for the previous night's blackmail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正要去敲他的门，但当我无意中听到他和参议员在讨论前一天晚上敲诈的价格时，我停了下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayapartyp_00054aca_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ran back to the rest of the girls, and we got shipped back to Vegas that afternoon. None of us got paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跑回其他女孩那里，那天下午我们被送回维加斯，我们都没有得到报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayapartyp_00054aca_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that was the end of my dreams of practicing medicine and making anything of my life. Hence, I truly hope you killed Stan for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我行医的梦想和我的人生的梦想的终结。所以，我真心希望你帮我杀了斯坦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayapartyp_00054aca_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaStanGoldQuest 110
What does this have to do with Burke?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这和伯克有什么关系?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaWhistleblower
Right. Yeah, some hooker runs to the paper and starts screaming about a conspiracy she witnessed between two of the NCR's richest men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对啊，是，有个妓女跑到报社尖叫着说她目击了NCR的两个最富有的人之间的阴谋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayawhistl_00054acc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure that would have gone really great for me. Can't believe it slipped my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信这对我来说会很好，真不敢相信我竟然没有这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayawhistl_00054acc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You didn't expose this story to the press or anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没把这事告诉媒体吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaGoodbye
Eh, no reason for me to start now. Thanks, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，客套话，不过还是谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayagoodby_00054ace_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care of yourself, Raya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 照顾好自己，拉娅。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNVRayaCharity
Are... Are you serious?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你是认真的吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayacharit_00054ad0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... Don't even know what to say, besides... Thank you. I owe you... Everything. And I'll never be able to repay you for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我都不知道该说什么，再说...谢谢你！我欠你...一切。我永远也报答不了你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayacharit_00054ad0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll... I'll use this to pay my way back to California. Fuck that church; I'm signing up with the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将...我要用这笔钱回加州，去他妈的教堂，我要加入天启追随者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayacharit_00054ad0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you again... So much. I promise, I'm not going to waste this. You have no idea what this means to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你...非常，我保证，我不会浪费这个机会的。你不知道这对我有多重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raya [07024B94] (mod) Quest : ([0704FC54]aaaStanGoldQuest) The Low, Sad Moan of Prey EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult06\aaastangol_aaanvrayacharit_00054ad0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 5000 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX ShowMessage aaaNVRayaEscapeMessage rewardkarma 100 aaaNorthVegasCindyREF.disable set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDSavedNVRaya to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDSavedNVRaya + 1
One second. It seems like you're owed 5000 caps. Take it. Think about studying medicine again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 稍等一下，他好像还欠你5000瓶盖，拿着它，再考虑考虑学医的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBodeanCourierWhoSent
A man with a nice hat. Have a nice day, pardner!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个戴着漂亮帽子的男人，祝你愉快，伙计!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Masked Courier [07011490] (mod) Quest : ([07011493]aaaBodeanVengeanceQuest) Vicious Cycle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult04\aaabodeanv_aaabodeancourie_000562d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX showmessage aaaBodeanCourierMessage aaaBodeanCourierREF.disable
Who's it from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁寄的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBodeanCourierGoodbye
Catch ya later, pardner!
ESP.TRADUIT: 待会儿见，伙计!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Masked Courier [07011490] (mod) Quest : ([07011493]aaaBodeanVengeanceQuest) Vicious Cycle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult04\aaabodeanv_aaabodeancourie_000562d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX showmessage aaaBodeanCourierMessage aaaBodeanCourierREF.disable
Okay, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMegHumboldtBodeans
Not since those inbred moonshiners all got shot up. Moving caravans through their "territory" was pretty nerve wracking, I have to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从那些近亲繁殖的私酒贩子都被射杀后就没有了，我不得不说，让商队穿过他们的“领地”真是让人伤脑筋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtb_000562da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd think us frontier ranchers would have some solidarity, but apparently that'd be asking too much. Whatever, they won't be missed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会认为我们边疆的农场主应该团结一致对抗那些混蛋，但显然这要求太高了。无论如何，他们不会被人想念的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Megan Humboldt [070257A5] (mod) Quest : ([070295A5]aaaHumboldtFarmQuest) No More Troubles EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult03\aaahumbold_aaameghumboldtb_000562da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBodeanCourierREF.enable
Any other outlaw troubles bothering you guys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他不法之徒给你们找麻烦吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieTopsCasinoBark
Smarter people than I have analyzed the futility of gambling on games of luck. All I have to add is that the games are incredibly boring, as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比我聪明的人曾分析过，在运气游戏上赌博是徒劳的。我所要补充的是，这些游戏也非常无聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlietopsc_000568d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieFreesideBark
I've seen more than my fair share of ghettos. They're all alike in the same ways. Perhaps poverty and degradation are the great human unifiers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见识过太多贫民窟了，他们都是一样的，也许贫穷和堕落是人类伟大的统一者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliefrees_000568dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieMoralCode
I've never claimed to follow some immutable code of ethics. I consider such things to be contradictory and pointless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没有说过要遵循某种不可改变的道德准则，我认为这样的事情是矛盾和毫无意义的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemoral_000568e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take killing, for instance. It's something we both do a good deal of, and it's a topic that is society is frustratingly ambiguous about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以杀戮为例，这是我们都做过很多次的事，也是一个令人沮丧的社会模糊的话题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemoral_000568e2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most religious texts forbid killing, most societies have very strict laws about killing, and most people would readily agree that it's a bad thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数宗教文献禁止杀戮，大多数社会对杀戮都有非常严格的法律，大多数人也会欣然同意这是一件坏事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemoral_000568e2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And yet, war is glorious, targeted vengeance holds an air of romantic drama, and self-defense is lauded across the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，战争是光荣的，有针对性的复仇带有浪漫色彩，自卫在废土上广受赞誉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemoral_000568e2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Ah, but, it's okay, because you were killing the enemy" is the inferred technicality. Yet that too is contradictory.
ESP.TRADUIT: “啊，但是，没关系，因为你杀死的是敌人”，这句话赞扬你。然而，这也是矛盾的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemoral_000568e2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If all sins are excusable when committed upon the "enemy", why is it that we define and punish war crimes? Why praise empathy and understanding?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果对“敌人”犯下的所有罪行都是可以原谅的，为什么我们要定义和惩罚战争罪？为什么要赞美同理心和理解？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemoral_000568e2_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's meaningless. Morality is what you choose to make of it, and I place no stock in the ethical values held by polite society. Whatever that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是没有意义的。道德是你选择如何去理解它，我不看重文明社会所持有的伦理价值观，不管是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemoral_000568e2_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was raised apart from society. I only entered it in the tail end of my adolescence. I can rightly say that I am not a part of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是在远离社会的环境中长大的，我只是在青春期的末期才进入这个行业，我可以正确地说，我与社会合不来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemoral_000568e2_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't live by some personal code. The closest that I come is avoiding pointless cruelty and sadism. Why fret over the minutiae?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有什么个人准则，最接近的准则是避免毫无意义的残忍和虐待，但为什么要为这些细节而左思右想呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemoral_000568e2_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm curious, what exactly is the code of morality you live by?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很好奇，你人生的道德准则到底是什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieMojaveOutpostConvo
I have a question, if you'll indulge me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个问题，如果你允许的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieMojavePostProceed
Do you support the NCR? Generally, I suppose, but specifically in regards to their desire to annex the Mojave. Everyone seems to have an opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你支持NCR吗?总的来说，我想，具体来说他们希望吞并莫哈韦，但每个人似乎都有自己的看法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
Okay, go ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的,请便。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieMojavePost1
Not particularly. Government agencies as well as private citizens make for prolific, and lucrative, work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么特别的，政府机构和普通公民一样，都在创造多产且有利可图的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That said, I've spent the majority of my professional life in the Mojave as it is now: Lawless and untamed. There's never been a shortage of work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 话虽如此，我职业生涯的大部分时间都是在莫哈韦沙漠度过的，就像现在这样:无法无天，无人掌管。从来都不缺工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568ed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, the NCR seems less honest. The very fact that they make use of my services, while simultaneously espousing rule of law is proof of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，NCR似乎不那么诚实，他们使用我的服务，同时又拥护法治，这就是证明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568ed_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The appeal of a democratic government is giving its citizenry a voice in the decisions that affect its entire society, I understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解，民主政府的诉求是让公民在影响整个社会的决策中有发言权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568ed_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And yet, so often the people involved are entirely self-interested, to the detriment of the citizens it's supposed to represent and defend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，牵扯其中的人都是完全利己的，这损害了它应该代表和捍卫的公民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568ed_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a system rife with hypocrisy, corruption, and vice; all the while preaching about the evils of these traits, and how they must be purged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个充斥着虚伪、腐败和邪恶的体系。与此同时，它又一直在宣扬这些特质是多么邪恶，以及应该如何清除它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568ed_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I'm morbidly curious as to why it is that people on the ground level, the ones most liable to be crushed by government, would support it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我真的病态地好奇为什么底层的人们，那些最容易被政府镇压的人，会支持它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568ed_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hence, my original question. Do you support it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，我最初的问题是，你支持吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568ed_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have a preference? Why are you asking me for mine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对此有偏好吗?你为什么要问我的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieMojavePost2
I see. I can't fault your decision. If nothing else, it would promise to be very lucrative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。我不能批评你的决定，如果不出意外的话，这对你来说是非常有利可图的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Governments like to claim that they exist to benefit the people on every level of its society. Yet, they're often most beneficial to individuals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 政府喜欢宣称他们的存在是为了造福社会各个阶层的人民。然而，它们往往对个人最有益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568ee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Winning the Mojave for the NCR would make you rich, famous, and respected. You could do nearly anything you'd like, with impunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为NCR赢得莫哈韦会让你富有，出名，受人尊敬，你可以做任何你想做的事而不受惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568ee_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do support the NCR, yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确实支持NCR，是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieMojavePost3
Fair enough. I have no personal investment in what system of government the Mojave chooses to accept... Or is forced to accept, as the case may be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了，我个人对莫哈韦人选择的政府体系没有任何投资...也许被迫接受，视情况而定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe we are each answerable only to ourselves, alone. I see no benefit in spreading a system that espouses an opposing ideology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信我们每个人只对自己负责，也只需要对自己负责，我认为推广一个支持对立意识形态的体系没有任何好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll kill who I'm paid to kill, and leave military matters to those who care for such things. It's no business of mine... Nor of yours, evidently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只需要杀掉那些雇佣我来杀的人，把军事问题留给那些关心这类事情的人，这不关我的事......显然也不关你的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no intention of supporting the NCR in this war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无意在这场战争中支持NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieMojavePost4
Is it? My understanding is that the NCR's inability to safeguard its people on the fringes of its territory is the primary reason so many detest it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗?我的理解是，NCR没有能力保护其领土边缘的人民，这是如此多的人讨厌它的主要原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many complain about heavy taxation, but from what I've seen, the real issue is heavy taxation with no benefits to show for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多人抱怨高税收，但就我所见，真正的问题是高税收却没有任何好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The people living deep in NCR territory are supplied with power, water, food, education, and relative safety.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生活在NCR核心地区的人们得到了电力、水、食物、教育和相对的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To live under such comparatively luxurious standards is worth a bit of taxation for most of the citizenry in question... Most of them, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于大多数市民来说，生活在这样相对奢侈的标准下是值得纳税的，至少大部分人是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's only the heart of their civilization. On the outskirts, it's a very different story. They pay the same taxes, with nothing to show for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但那只是他们文明的核心，在边缘地带，情况就大不相同了，他们付同样的税，却什么都得不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then, combine that with their tendency to overlook the activities of criminal elements, like me, if it benefits them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后，把这一点与他们不理会犯罪活动的倾向结合起来，比如我，对他们有利的话他们就不会管。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f1_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe their priority is profit. It would be ludicrously hypocritical of me to condemn them for that, but you seem to actually have faith in them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我相信他们优先考虑的是利润。当然如果我为此谴责他们，那就太虚伪了，但你似乎对他们很有信心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f1_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not saying this in an attempt to sway your opinions or choice of allegiance, mind you. I just think you should be aware of these things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请注意，我这么说并不是为了动摇你的观点或选择的忠诚，我只是觉得你应该知道这些事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f1_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Taking everything at face value is a fine way to get stabbed in the back by a blade you never saw coming. Keep it in mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以表面价值看待一切是一种很好的方式，很可能会被你意想不到的刀子从背后捅上一刀，记住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f1_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It isn't about getting rewarded. I support the NCR because it's protecting the people that need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是为了获得奖励，我支持NCR，因为它在保护需要它的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieMojavePost5
Well, you should have no worries on that front. They have no shortage of funds to pay those of us that do good work for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这方面你不用担心，他们不缺资金来支付我们这些为他们工作的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ideologies they espouse are irrelevant to us. What matters is that the metaphorical checks keep clearing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们信奉的意识形态与我们无关，重要的是，这些深处的帐要结清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I respect your commitment to professionalism. Utilize your skills to walk a path you don't dislike, and reap the benefits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊重你的敬业精神，利用你的技能去走你不喜欢的路，并从中获益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have that in common. I believe we work well together, and perhaps our shared methodologies are the reason for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们的共同点，我相信我们能合作得很好，也许我们共同的方法就是原因所在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, my curiosity is sated. Shall we move on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我的好奇心得到了满足，我们继续吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemojav_000568f2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
Goddamn right it's lucrative. They're going to owe me big once I win this war for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太对了，利润丰厚，一旦我为他们赢了这场战争，他们会欠我很多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCottonwoodConvo
Hmm. I suppose tailing you around is the only way I'd get to freely walk through Legion territory. Normally, stealth would be necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我想跟随你是唯一能让我自由穿越军团领地的方法。不然在通常情况下，必须得秘密行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000574e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCottonwoodProceed
A few times. I've received many contracts from individuals in the NCR, and as you may imagine, many of those individuals despise the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有那么几次。我从NCR的个人那里收到了很多合同，你应该能想象，很多人都仇视军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000574ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Naturally, the Legion isn't thrilled to have assassins from the west strolling through their lands and killing their people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自然地，军团对来自西方的刺客在他们的土地上游荡并杀害他们的人民并不感到兴奋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000574ee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if that assassin happens to be female and incapable of breeding, why, I may well be asking for a machete to the skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那个杀手碰巧是没有生育能力的女性，很可能会拿把砍刀砍到她的头骨上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000574ee_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I were seen. And that's the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我被看见的话，这是就是我的下场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000574ee_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
Have you been in Legion territory before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以前去过军团领地吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCottonwood1
It's a side effect of my pleasant upbringing as a slave to raiders. I suppose I ought to be grateful that's the extent of my internal damage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我成长过程中受掠夺者奴役的副作用。我应该庆幸我的内伤只有这么严重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000574f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't trouble me. I've no interest in bearing children. Even if I did, I somehow suspect that I'm not ideal parent material.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不困扰我。我对生孩子没兴趣，即使我能生，我也怀疑自己不是当父母的好料子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000574f2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you say you're "incapable of breeding", what does that mean, exactly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你“没有生育能力”，这到底是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCottonwood2
I don't hate anything. I think the society the Legion wants to create is inherently incompatible with human nature, and needlessly sadistic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不讨厌任何东西，我认为军团想要创造的社会本质上是与人性格格不入的，是不必要的虐待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000580f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Common thought would dictate that my own experiences with slavery, and all its associated horrors, would have me despise the Legion on principle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常的想法会告诉我，加之我自己的奴隶经历，以及与之相关的所有恐怖，会让我在原则上鄙视军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000580f4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But why should I extend the effort? What would it accomplish? My experiences were terrible, but that which does not kill me makes me stronger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我为什么要继续努力呢?它会实现什么?我的经历是可怕的，但那些没有杀死我的经历会让我变得更坚强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000580f4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {shrug}It is what it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: {耸肩}这就是事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000580f4_4.ogg
