ESP.ORIGINAL: And yet you don't seem to hate the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你似乎并不恨军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieCottonwood3
Legionaries tend to be quite skilled at navigating the land. Crouching in a bush would get me shot, most likely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团的士兵往往非常喜欢在陆地上行军，蹲在灌木丛里很可能会挨枪子儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000580f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mostly move at night, utilize distractions and diversions to keep attention focused away from my location, that sort of thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我大多在晚上活动，利用一些分散注意力的东西，诸如此类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000580f5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worth noting, when I say "Legion territory", I specifically mean the fringes. I've never been deep into Caesar's lands, nor would I ever wish to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要特别说明的是，我说“军团领地”，我指的是边缘地带。我从未深入过凯撒的领地，也不想深入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000580f5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the war is concluded, that will likely be the end of my dealings with the Legion. Who would bother paying me to kill them in peacetime?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦战争结束，我的军团生意可能就结束了，在和平时期谁会花钱雇我杀他们?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliecotto_000580f5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you sneak through Legion territory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么潜入军团领地的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieJacobstownConvo
Supposing I live long enough to retire one day, a place like this wouldn't be so bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 假如我能活到有一天退休，像这样的地方也就没那么糟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057aed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieJacobstownProceed
Eventually, perhaps. If nothing kills me first, I won't be able to do my job efficiently enough past a certain age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终,也许。如果没有什么能先杀死我，我过了一定年龄也无法有效的工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057af2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not so foolish as to persist doing dangerous work that I can't keep up with. I don't need constant stimulation, either. Retirement would be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还不至于傻到坚持做我跟不上的危险工作。我也不需要持续的刺激感，退休就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057af2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Preferably, somewhere cooler. Higher elevations suit me, as well. I'd swap the mutants for a lake, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好是在凉爽的地方，高海拔也适合我。不过我更想跟变种生物换一个湖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057af2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have a profession, though, do you? You just do whatever drifts your way, wandering from place to place between missions, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你没有职业，对吧?你只是随波逐流，在任务之间到处游荡，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057af2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm curious. What will you do with yourself once this war over the dam is concluded?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很好奇，一旦这场水坝之战结束，你打算做什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057af2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
You see yourself retiring some day?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有退休的打算吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieJacobstown1
Home is where you make it, I suppose. Unless the Legion were to take power, I would remain as well. Business is good here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想家就是你白手起家的家，除非军团掌权，不然我也会留下。这里生意很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057af4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though "home" implies a connection deeper than just the place where you live or do business. Perhaps in time, it would come to me, too. Who knows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然“家”意味着一种更深层次的联系，而不仅仅是你居住或做生意的地方。也许过一段时间，我想法也会改变，谁知道呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057af4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you have that high-end luxury suite at the top of the tower on the Strip. Easy to stay put when you're treated so well, no doubt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在赌城区的塔顶有一间高档豪华套房。毫无疑问，当你得到这么好的待遇时，确实会待在原地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057af4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Mojave is my home. I'm not going anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维是我的家，我哪也不去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieJacobstown2
I can respect that. There's a great deal to see out in the world. I'd like to look out on the ocean one day, myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊重这一点，外面的世界有很多东西值得一看，我自己也希望有一天能眺望大海。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057af6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figure I'll just keep wandering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我还是继续游荡吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieJacobstown3
Well, there's a great deal of East to explore. Whether or not it's civilized beyond Arizona, I couldn't say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，东方有很多地方值得探索，亚利桑那以外的地方是否文明，我没法说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057af8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would take extraordinary circumstances to push me beyond the Rockies. The further from civilization I go, the less need there is for my trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有在特殊的情况下我才能越过落基山脉，我离文明越远，我的职业就越没有价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_00057af8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll head east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我要往东走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieJacobstown4
I suppose that's one way to do it. Not everyone that excels at violence necessarily enjoys it. Many would be happy to hang up their guns for good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这是一种方法。并非所有擅长暴力的人都喜欢暴力，许多人会很乐意永远放下手中的枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_000580f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me, I don't care. My days of trauma and degradation are behind me, and assassin work doesn't bother me in the slightest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于我，我不在乎。我的创伤和堕落的日子已经过去了，暗杀工作一点也不困扰我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejacob_000580f3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was thinking of settling down in California. No more war or uncertainty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想在加利福尼亚定居，不再有战争或不确定性。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstWhyHateBurke
Man, I fucking hate rich assholes that think their bank accounts put them above basic fucking morality. That's Burke, to a T.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老兄，我真他妈讨厌那些认为自己的银行账户能让他们凌驾于基本道德之上的有钱混蛋，伯克这类人，丝毫不差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstwh_000580f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He has an important last name, he was born into wealth, he drinks fancy fucking wines while us regular people starve in the streets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有个很了不起的姓氏，他生下来就很有钱，他每天喝着他妈的高档葡萄酒而我们这些普通人却在街上挨饿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstwh_000580f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, yeah, I sold some of his documents to interested parties, but that don't mean I've got my hands in every data breach in the NCR!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，我把他的一些文件卖给了有兴趣的人，但这并不意味着NCR的每一次数据泄露都是我一手造成的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstwh_000580f7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting fucking scapegoated, all 'cause I enjoy a little chemical relaxation here and there. I know he's the one pursuing the charges!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈要当替罪羊了，就因为我喜欢时不时地放松一下，我知道是他在起诉我!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstwh_000580f7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, fuck him, and fuck his big fancy family dynasty. You make a habit of spitting on the little guy, eventually he's gonna get fed up. That's me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的，去他妈的家族王朝。你养成了朝小家伙吐口水的习惯，最终他会受够的，那就是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstwh_000580f7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you hate Senator Burke so much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么恨伯克参议员?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEddieHurstAllQuestsDone
Oh yeah? Well, don't keep me waiting, let me see what they have to say!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,是吗?别让我久等了，让我看看他们有什么要说的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstal_000580f9_1.ogg
NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, this is fucked up. But, damn if it ain't exactly the kinda dirt we were looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，这太操蛋了。但是，这不是我们要找的那种脏东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstal_000580f9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, if I'm reading this right... The girls Massey saw get trucked to the Burke Estate... Were the ones that Gold was shipping in from out of state.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，如果我没理解错的话...梅西看到的被卡车送到伯克庄园的女孩是戈尔德从州外运来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstal_000580f9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I bet if any of them decided to talk about what happened, then they'd get a visit from Winters. Oh yeah, I'm seeing the threads here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌，如果他们中有人决定谈论发生的事，温特斯就会猎杀他们。是啊，我看到线索了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstal_000580f9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, alright then. Keep those testimonies on your pip-boy doohickey, and let me get a copy. Too many of these get out there, they can't cover it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,好吧。把那些证词留在你的小玩意上，我去拿一份。这些东西太多了，他们掩盖不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstal_000580f9_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. Deal's a deal. I'll see if I can get your buddy Blake to stick his head up. Whether or not he does, we got some serious shit on Burke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，交易就是交易。我看看能不能让你的布雷克兄弟把头探出来。不管他有没有，我们对伯克的调查都造成了很严重的影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstal_000580f9_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, looking at this, I don't think the reverend has clean hands... But, he don't seem as dirty as his cousin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这个，我觉得牧师的手不干净...但是，他看起来不像他表弟那么脏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstal_000580f9_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shove this in his face, I bet he'll talk to save his own ass. Might get even more dirt we can add to the pile, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这个甩在他脸上，我打赌他会说出来救他自己一命的。也许我们还能得到更多的脏东西，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstal_000580f9_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, you go speak with him. While you're doing that, I'll be setting up a meet with Blake. Good luck, chief. We're closing in on it, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你去和他谈谈。在你这么做的同时，我会安排和布雷克的会面。祝你好运，大佬，我们现在就快抓到它了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstal_000580f9_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaEddieHurstQuest 30 player.additem aaaEddieHurstHolotape 1
I got the accounts from Massey, Winters, and Gold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿到了梅西，温特斯和戈尔德的账户。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fucking great. But, I'm gonna need you to hold on to what you got for a bit longer. I'm still trying to get in contact with Blake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真他妈的太棒了。但是，我需要你再坚持一段时间，我还在试着联系布雷克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstal_00059ee4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back later and we can really dive into this. In the meantime, I'm sure you got other jobs to take care of. No worries, I ain't going nowhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 稍后再回来，我们可以深入研究。与此同时，我肯定你还有其他工作要做。别担心，我哪也不去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eddie Hurst [07000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult07\aaaeddiehu_aaaeddiehurstal_00059ee4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got the accounts from Massey, Winters, and Gold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿到了梅西，温特斯和戈尔德的账户。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieThornConvo
Ah, now this is familiar, in all the worst ways. Throw in some torture and a bit of sexual abuse, and it'll be just like I was a child again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我最熟悉的地方了，再加上一些酷刑折磨和性虐待，我就会像回到了童年。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieThornProceed
It's a dirty, blood-spattered pit, where the drug-addled dregs of humanity can entertain themselves by watching dumb animals gore one another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个肮脏的，鲜血四溅的坑，在这里，那些吸毒的人类渣滓可以通过观看愚蠢的动物自相残杀来取乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When they aren't eviscerating each other for the sport of their owners, the animals are kept locked up in tiny, dark cells.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当它们不需要为了主人的娱乐而互相掏空内脏时，这些动物就被关在又小又暗的牢房里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592eb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Substitute the animals with slave children, and there you go: It's a near-perfect recreation of my childhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用奴隶儿童代替这些动物，你就懂了：这是我童年近乎完美的娱乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592eb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 2
What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieThorn1
I don't know exactly. Somewhere to the south of the Mojave. Not so far that it wasn't desert, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太清楚，莫哈韦沙漠以南的某个地方。当然，也没远到不是沙漠的程度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't really in a sound state of mind as I was led north, so tracking landmarks didn't occur to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我被带往北方的时候，我的精神状态不是很好，所以我并没有想到要跟着路标走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592ed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where was this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是在哪里?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieThorn2
You're joking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在逗我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592ef_1.ogg
NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the people of Westside honestly believe themselves to be the innocent victims of Fiend attacks?
ESP.TRADUIT: 西区的人真的认为他们是恶魔帮袭击的无辜受害者吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592ef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not condoning the Fiends, mind you. They're cruel and sadistic as any other raider band. But their conflict with Westside seems... reciprocal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请注意，我不是在宽恕那些恶魔帮，他们和其他土匪一样残忍，但他们与西区的冲突似乎...是相互的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592ef_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like this place. I don't like what it stands for, and I don't like these... people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢这个地方，我不喜欢它代表的意思，我也不喜欢这些......人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592ef_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's not just animals. Sometimes they throw captured Fiends into the arena, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，不只是动物，有时他们也会把抓来的恶魔帮扔进竞技场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieThorn3
...I'm fine, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我很好，谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... Have taken great strides to leave my past firmly behind me. I train my mind to prevent it from conjuring up memories of that miserable time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...迈出了巨大的步伐，将我的过去牢牢地抛在身后。我训练自己的大脑，防止它唤起对那段悲惨时光的回忆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592f1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walking into a facsimile of the worst part of my life caught me off guard, that's all. I'm fine. What's done is done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走进我生命中最糟糕的部分的复制品让我措手不及，仅此而已。我很好，木已成舟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592f1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Memories only hurt if you allow them to, and I'm no longer some wretched slave child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回忆只有在你自残的时候才会伤人，我也不再是可怜的奴隶孩子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592f1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll leave when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好了我们就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_000592f1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
You seem upset. Do you want us to leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来心烦意乱，你想要离开吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieChurchAmbushBark
Take cover. Ambush!
ESP.TRADUIT: 隐蔽。伏击！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliechurc_0005b4e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChurchCarterWhoYou
Carter. I run security here while Brecker is busy elsewhere. I've been just dying to make your acquaintance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡特，我负责这里的安保，而布瑞克在别处忙。我非常想认识你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carter [0705B4E1] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult04\aaaburkech_aaachurchcarter_0005b4ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChurchCarterEveryoneDead
Oh, those nice folks? Yeah, we killed them all and threw their bodies down a drainage shaft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那些好人?对了，我们把他们都杀了然后把尸体扔进了排水沟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carter [0705B4E1] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult04\aaaburkech_aaachurchcarter_0005b4ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If their deaths bother you, well, it is your fault we had to neutralize them. You just couldn't leave well enough alone, eh? Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们的死让你感到困扰，那就是你的错了，我们不得不压制他们。你就喜欢“多管闲事”，是吧?干的漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carter [0705B4E1] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult04\aaaburkech_aaachurchcarter_0005b4ee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to all the people that were here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的人都怎么了?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChurchCarterRevDead
I didn't kill the reverend; Brecker did. I just stood by and watched the old bastard as he got his throat cut open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有杀牧师，布瑞克杀的，我只是站在一旁看着那个老混蛋被人割喉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carter [0705B4E1] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult04\aaaburkech_aaachurchcarter_0005b4f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone suspected he wasn't going to stand up to questioning, so why give him the chance to go singing something he shouldn't?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人怀疑他经不起质疑，所以为什么要给他机会去唱他不应该唱的歌呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carter [0705B4E1] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult04\aaaburkech_aaachurchcarter_0005b4f0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you kill the reverend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么杀了牧师?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChurchCarterBrecker
He's doing his job. Be thankful you're dealing with me, instead. I kill my enemies with bullets. Brecker has his own ways. Much slower ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在做他的工作，你应该庆幸是在和我打交道，我用子弹杀死敌人。布瑞克有他自己的方式，那要残忍得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carter [0705B4E1] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult04\aaaburkech_aaachurchcarter_0005b4f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is Brecker?
ESP.TRADUIT: 布瑞克在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChurchCarterStartCombat
Funny, here I was about to say the same thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真有趣，我正想说同样的话呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carter [0705B4E1] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult04\aaaburkech_aaachurchcarter_0005b4f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
<Attack> Shut up and die already.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>闭嘴，去死吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChurchCarterTerrify
Ah hell, this one might be rough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，这次可能会很艰难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carter [0705B4E1] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\femaleadult04\aaaburkech_aaachurchcarter_0005b4f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaaChurchCarterREF.CIOS TerrifyingPresenceSpell
What good timing, I was just thinking that big cross on the wall needed a corpse nailed to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是好时机，我在想墙上的大十字架需要钉上一具尸体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBreckerSecuritySize
My security team operates in shifts. There's only ever a couple around here at any given time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的安保团队轮班工作，任何时候这里都只有一对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [07004FBD] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_aaabreckersecur_0005cd10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The rest are close enough to respond in the event of an emergency. If I'm not around, my second, Carter, is. Security is tight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其余的人员都很接近，足以在紧急情况下做出反应。如果我不在，我的第二个，卡特，在。保安很严密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [07004FBD] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_aaabreckersecur_0005cd10_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't see many security guards around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这附近没看到多少保安。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFinalBreckerWhy
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_aaafinalbrecker_0005cd16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was paid to keep his business secure. When he became a liability, I was paid to silence him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受雇保护他的生意，当他成为累赘时，我受雇让他闭嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_aaafinalbrecker_0005cd16_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why kill the reverend? Didn't you work for him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要杀牧师?你不是为他工作吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFinalBreckerEmployer
You can go to your grave blind and ignorant. I piss on last requests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该盲目无知地进入坟墓，我讨厌最后的请求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_aaafinalbrecker_0005cd18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you doing this for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是谁指使你们的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFinalBreckerCombat
Your bravado is repulsive. I'm going to enjoy eviscerating you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的虚张声势令人厌恶，我会好好享受把你开膛破肚的过程。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_aaafinalbrecker_0005cd1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
<Attack> Take your best shot, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击> 那你就全力以赴吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFinalBreckerCombatCaesar
{blunt}Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: {直言}是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_aaafinalbrecker_0005cd1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
I'm the one that killed Caesar. You really think you can kill me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我杀了凯撒，你真觉得你能杀得了我吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFinalBreckerCombatTaunt
I suppose dignity was too much to expect of you. This may be an act of mercy, you inbred filth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想对你的尊严要求太高了吧，这也许是一种仁慈的行为，你这下流杂种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_aaafinalbrecker_0005cd1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
All I see is a man wearing shades underground, bragging about how badass he is. Pathetic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只看到一个男人在地下戴着墨镜，吹嘘自己有多厉害，可悲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFinalBreckerCombatPissed
Oh, really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,真的吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_aaafinalbrecker_0005cd20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I was just thinking I'd hang you with your own intestines. Maybe you can use your last moments to think of a more clever threat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我想用你的肠子把你吊死，也许你可以利用你最后的机会想出一个更有效的威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brecker [0705CD03] (mod) Quest : ([07004FC1]aaaBurkeChurchDialogue) 07004FC1 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaaburkech_aaafinalbrecker_0005cd20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
I'm going to tear your heart out, you arrogant motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你的心挖出来，你这个傲慢的混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieEscapeSewerBark
No reason for us to let our guards down, but... I think we've evaded the worst of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有理由放松警惕，但是...我想我们躲过了最糟糕的情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieescap_0005df68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieReligionTree
Probably, yes. You seem surprised. I'm guessing... I don't strike you as religious, and so you wouldn't expect me to read a religious text, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许,是的。你看起来很吃惊，我猜......你觉得我不信教，所以你觉得我不会读宗教书籍，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelig_0005df6d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not religious, but I do make a habit of reading anything I get my hands on. Knowledge and information are their own rewards, I've found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是不信教，但我有个习惯，就是买到什么就看什么。我发现，知识和信息本身就是回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelig_0005df6d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, religions hold no appeal to me. For one, they tend to codify morality into a uselessly strict good/evil dichotomy, which I don't find compelling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，宗教对我没有吸引力。首先，他们倾向于将道德编入一种无用且绝对的善/恶二分法，我不认为这有说服力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelig_0005df6d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moreover, I can't support the notion of an afterlife. It breeds complacency and apathy towards the lives we currently lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，我也不支持里面关于来世的说法，它滋生了对我们目前生活的自满和冷漠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelig_0005df6d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, why should one struggle to improve their lives if it's all fleeting, soon to be replaced with a far more idyllic, permanent existence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，如果这一生非常短暂的，很快就会被一种田园式的生活永久取代，那人们为什么还要努力改善自己的生活呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelig_0005df6d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Conversely, if one is already striving for an improved existence, the threat of failing to qualify for heaven could distract from their focus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相反，如果一个人已经在努力改善自己的生活，但因违反教条而无法进入天堂的执念，可能会分散他们的注意力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelig_0005df6d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, if everyone is focused solely on securing their place in a hypothetical afterlife, why should we bother trying to improve our reality?
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，如果每个人都只专注于在假想的来世中保留自己的一个位置，那我们为什么还要费劲去改善现实呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelig_0005df6d_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I believe our time on earth is fleeting, and it's up to each of us to imbue the time we have our own meaning, and live with the consequences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我相信我们在地球上的时间是短暂的，这取决于我们每个人赋予我们的时间自己的意义，以及生活的结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlierelig_0005df6d_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did I see you reading a bible last time I told you to wait for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上次我叫你等我的时候我看到你是在读圣经?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieSSLobbyBark
Even if this stuff wasn't two centuries old, I'd still prefer water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 管他这东西有没有两百年历史，我仍旧觉得水都比这玩意好看
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliesslob_0005e5ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieSSVaultBark
This storage room hasn't been opened in 200 years? How is it that none of these prospective treasure hunters have ever heard of a drill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方真的200年没打开过了吗?这些想要寻宝的人怎么都没听说过钻孔机呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliessvau_0005e5f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieThorn4
I already came to that conclusion years ago. It was an unexpected memory, not some sudden burst of renewed psychological trauma.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我几年前就已经这么想了，但始料不及，它并不是突然产生的新心理创伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_0005fded_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll leave when you're ready for us to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好了我们就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliethorn_0005fded_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not going to start whinging about the past, are you? It's over and done with. Relax.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会又要抱怨过去了吧?一切都结束了，放松。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieJeanBark
That has to be the loudest door I've ever encountered. If you want me to put those hinges out of their misery, say the word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我遇到过的声音最大的门了。如果你想让我把那些铰链从痛苦中解脱出来，尽管开口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliejeanb_0005fdef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieNellisBark
And now we walk into Nellis. Tell me, do you have a list of impossible tasks you're checking off, or is this blind luck?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们走进了内里斯。告诉我，你是否有一个不可能完成的赏金，或者你想碰碰运气?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlienelli_0005fdf4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieElizaBark
You'll forgive my saying so, but that friend of yours, Eliza, seems disproportionately bitter for having lived such an idyllic life. {beat}It's annoying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我这么说，但你的那位朋友，伊丽莎，似乎因为过了这样一种田园般的生活而格外痛苦。{咂嘴}这很烦人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieeliza_0005fdf9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch for Cazadors. Those loathsome creatures like to nest in these hills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留意大毒蜂，那些可恶的生物喜欢在这些山上筑巢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieeliza_0005fdfa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieTullyBark
Is Tully aware that the Legion like to stage ambushes from that spot right next to his business? Tell him to lay down some satchel charges next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 塔利知道军团喜欢在他公司旁边的地方埋伏吗?叫他下次别吝啬背包里的炸药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlietully_0005fdff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those NCR merchants ought to find a new venue to hawk their wares. The Legion likes to stage ambushes from this bridge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些NCR商人应该找一个新的地方来兜售他们的商品，因为军团喜欢在这座桥上布置伏击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlietully_0005fe00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieEddieTrainBark

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieeddie_00060401_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKyleThreeBackground
Most of these guys call me Three-Piece, but for brevity's sake, Kyle works just fine for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了顺口，大多数人都叫我三件套，凯尔是我的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreebac_00060404_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Been in the Khans for pretty much my whole life, and if I have my way, I'll die for 'em too, when my time comes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在大汗帮待了一辈子了，就算我能随心所欲，到时候我也会为他们而死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreebac_00060404_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKyleThreeName
Not a super clever moniker, but I always got at least three locked and loaded pieces with me at any given time, so... Three-Piece Kyle. Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是一个太大隐喻绰号，因为我总是无时无刻带着三个锁和装载好的零件，所以......三件套凯尔，很自然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreenam_00060406_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do they call you Three-Piece?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们为什么叫你三件套?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKyleThreeEddieHistory
Goes back a ways. It started with me saving his ass from getting curbstomped in a bar fight. Three-on-one odds didn't strike me as proper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可以追溯到很久以前，一开始是我在酒吧打架时救了他。我觉得三对一，不合适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_00060408_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fight was going our way, when one of those cocksuckers pulled a switchblade and stabbed me in the fucking eye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在我们想为此争辩的时候，有个混蛋用弹簧刀捅了我的眼睛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_00060408_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was going to finish me off, but Eddie came from behind and cut the guy's throat with a chunk of bottle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他正要杀了我，但艾迪从后面过来用一大块瓶子碎片割了那人的喉咙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_00060408_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At that point, I was a little pissed, so I pulled my .45 and my .38 and put the other two assholes into the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那时候，我有点生气，所以我拿出M1911把另外两个混蛋给毙了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_00060408_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, me and Eddie been tight since then. I keep telling him he oughtta join the Khans, but he doesn't fancy our initiation. Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，从那以后我和艾迪就很亲密了。我一直跟他说他应该加入大汗帮，但他不喜欢我们的入会仪式，无所谓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_00060408_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you meet Eddie?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么认识艾迪的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKyleThreeEddieDeaddie
Wait, what? What the fuck happened?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等,什么?他妈的发生什么事了?!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_0006040a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eddie's dead, Kyle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾迪死了,凯尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKyleThreeEddieDeaddie2
{Grumbling to himself}The fuck...?
ESP.TRADUIT: {自言自语}我操他妈的...?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_0006040c_1.ogg
NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is bullshit. Someone killed Eddie and forged this piece-of-shit letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗屎，肯定有人杀了艾迪，伪造了这封狗屁信件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_0006040c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: According to this note on his body, he killed himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从他身上的纸条来看，他是自杀的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKyleThreeEddieDeaddie3
{reading from letter}"To whomever finds this note... My name is Edward Hurst."
ESP.TRADUIT: {读信}“给任何找到这封信的人......我的名字叫爱德华·赫斯特。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_0006040e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's how I know it's fake. His fucking name was Eddison Hurst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我才知道是假的，他妈的他名字叫艾迪森·赫斯特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_0006040e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you two were sniffing around some conspiracy bullshit. Government cover ups and backroom deals. Normally, I don't buy into that shit, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道艾迪生前，你们俩在调查什么阴谋——政府的掩盖和幕后交易。通常情况下，我不会搅这趟混水，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_0006040e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you were onto something after all. You'd better watch your back. And if you find whoever killed Eddie... Gut 'em for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你和艾迪取得不菲成果，你最好小心点。如果你找到杀害艾迪的凶手帮我杀了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Three-Piece Kyle [0703F337] (mod) Quest : ([07023985]aaaEddieHurstQuest) Drown in the Dark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult09\aaaeddiehu_aaakylethreeedd_0006040e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know it's fake?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道是假的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieBodeansBark
You really have no shortage of enemies. {beat}You should really consider doing your killing anonymously. This never happens to me, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的不缺敌人。{咂嘴..}你真该考虑匿名杀人，我从来没遇到过这种事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliebodea_00060413_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieMorganGoneBark
Well, now that's frustrating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这可真让人沮丧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemorga_00060415_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillJessieQuestDone
Ah, Jesus Christ... What... happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，耶稣基督啊......什么......发生了什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneilljessie_0006041a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMainJessieQuest 120
I'm sorry, but your niece... She didn't make it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，但你侄女...她没能挺过来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillJessieFate1
I... didn't know her all that well, truth be told. I know she didn't deserve this, though. Christ...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...说实话，我不太了解她。但我知道她不该受到这样的待遇，基督啊...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneilljessie_0006041c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't even be angry... I mean, you killed everyone responsible. All I can do... Is wish this all could have been different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至没法生气...我是说，你杀了所有该负责的人。我所能做的...只有希望这一切能有所不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneilljessie_0006041c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell... Look, you don't need to tell Gerry 'bout this, okay? Maybe we ain't exactly close, but he's my brother, and he should hear it from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死...听着，你没必要把这事告诉格里，好吗?也许我们关系不太好，但他是我弟弟，应该由我亲口告诉他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneilljessie_0006041c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {quiet}Thanks for helping out. Wish it amounted to something.
ESP.TRADUIT: {安静}谢谢你的帮助，希望能有所作为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneilljessie_0006041c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was a lot of shady business going on in that church. She was killed as part of a coverup.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那个教堂里有许多见不得人的勾当，她被杀是为了掩盖真相。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillHopeless
{sigh}Partner, you just described every day of my fucking life.
ESP.TRADUIT: {叹气}搭档，你刚刚描述了我他妈的生活的每一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillhopele_0006041e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That shit with Jessie... It's rough. I don't like kids getting hurt, and I don't like losing family. I just keep telling myself we did all we could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰西的事...太粗暴了。我不喜欢孩子们受伤，也不喜欢失去家人，我一直告诉自己，我们已经尽力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillhopele_0006041e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something more than that bothering you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有比这更让你困扰的事吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillhopele_0006041e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever feel like you did what was right, but it didn't accomplish anything in the end?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是否曾觉得自己做了正确的事，但最终却一无所获?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillConfession
I don't imagine that's easy. I can't say I've ever dealt with anything like that, but all the same, I know the feeling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这并不容易，我不敢说我经历过这样的事，但我知道那种感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillconfes_00060421_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sink every extra cap I get into making things better around here, but it never feels like I succeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我竭尽所能让这里变得更好，但我从来没有成功的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillconfes_00060421_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think... The important thing is that we keep trying. Things will never get better if we give up, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想......重要的是我们要不断努力。如果我们放弃，事情就永远不会好转，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillconfes_00060421_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For what it's worth, I think you deserve a drink and a smoke. We ain't great judges of our own merit, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我觉得你应该喝一杯，抽根烟。我觉得，我们不能很好地判断自己的价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillconfes_00060421_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just try to keep your head up. Brighter days are coming. That's what I keep telling myself, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽量抬起头来，光明的日子即将来临。反正我也一直这么对自己说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillconfes_00060421_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem cigarette01 1 player.additem whiskey 1
<Tell O'Neill about the entire Burke Investigation>
ESP.TRADUIT: <告诉奥尼尔整个伯克家族调查的事>

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillNoConfession
Yep, I know that feeling, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我也知道那种感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnoconf_00060424_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it helps, you've made things better around these parts. Even if I can't pay you, I can at least give you a drink and a smoke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有帮助的话，你让这里的生活变得更好了。即使我付不了钱，我至少可以给你一杯酒和一支烟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnoconf_00060424_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just try to keep your head up. Brighter days are coming. That's what I keep telling myself, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽量抬起头来，光明的日子即将来临。反正我也一直这么对自己说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneillnoconf_00060424_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem cigarette01 1 player.additem whiskey 1
I don't really want to go into details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不想讲太多细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieONeillConsolation
This here is what we in the industry like to refer to as: "Cut content, motherfucker."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我们这个行业喜欢说的:“操你妈的，删减内容。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieMrHouseBark
You kill some truly fascinating people, don't you? Professionally, I'm almost envious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了一些很有魅力的人，不是吗?从职业角度来说，我几乎嫉妒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliemrhou_00061622_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
aaaCharlieKhanArmoryBark
For a battered and generally-reviled tribe of insular outlaws, the Great Khans have some genuinely high-end weapons. Someone must be supplying them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于一个饱受摧残和谩骂的与世隔绝的亡命之徒部落来说，大汗帮拥有一些真正高端的武器，一定有人在供应它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliekhana_00061627_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieZionBark1
I'm not so well-versed in wilderness survival. I rarely stray far from population centers, so you'll forgive my lack of tactical insight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对野外生存不是很在行，我很少离开人口密集的地方，所以请原谅我在野外缺乏战术洞察力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliezionb_0006162c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieZionBark2
I don't understand tribalism. Isolating themselves hasn't given them any greater insight into life. They're no more moral than anyone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不懂部落主义。孤立自己并没有让他们对生活有更深刻的认识，他们不比任何人更有道德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliezionb_00061631_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieZionBark3
Pacifism truly is the most asinine ideology. "Feel free to shoot me and loot my corpse. I'm willfully defenseless, and that makes me a good person."
ESP.TRADUIT: 和平主义确实是最愚蠢的意识形态：“尽管开枪打我，然后抢我的尸体吧。我是故意不设防的，所以我是个好人。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliezionb_00061636_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieVertibirdBark
Once, it had purpose and potential, unfettered, flying as its pilot willed. Now, it's a broken deathtrap. {beat, dry amusement} So allegorical.
ESP.TRADUIT: 曾经，它有目标和潜力，不受束缚，按照飞行员的意愿飞行。现在，却只是一个破碎的死亡陷阱{咂嘴，冷面幽默}多么有寓意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieverti_0006222d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieOverlookConvo
I... Believe I was born in a place like this. A little collection of shacks and shanties, with slavers always rooting about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...相信我出生在这样的地方，一小群棚户区，到处都是奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062232_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what the slaver that bought me from my parents said, anyway. I wasn't even a year old. I have no memories, just his claims.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我从我父母手里买来的奴隶贩子就是这么说的。我当时还不到一岁，我没有记忆，只有按他的要求做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062232_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieOverlookProceed
No. I don't remember where I was born. The one man who could've told me is long dead. And what would even be the point?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不记得我在哪里出生。唯一能告诉我的人早就死了，那有什么意义呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062237_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I somehow found it and returned... Why would I do this? To ask my parents why they sold me? I know why they sold me. Profit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我找到了它并且回去...我为什么要这么做？问我的父母为什么要把我卖掉？我知道他们为什么卖我，为了钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062237_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides... So many people become obsessed with the past. Some great wrong that was done to them, a mistake they made, an insight they lacked...
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非......很多人沉迷于过去。他们犯了巨大的错误，他们所缺乏的洞察力......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062237_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For what? It's only by moving on that a person can grow. Become more than what they were... What happened to me was unpleasant... But it's over now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了什么?只有不断前进，一个人才能成长。变得比以前更强大...发生在我身上的事很不愉快......但现在都结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062237_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surely that's victory enough. It has to be. I'm free, and I alone can dictate the meaning of my life. It is what it is. No more, no less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果当然是赢了，我是自由的，只有我可以决定我生命的意义，就是这样，不多也不少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062237_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
Would you like us to try and find where you came from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我们试着找出你是从哪里来的吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieOverlook1
{contemplative}No... It wouldn't accomplish anything. It wouldn't bring me back to a time before I was chattel. It wouldn't fill some void in my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: {沉思}不...它无法改变什么。它不会把我带回成为奴隶之前的时光，它也不会填补我生命中的空虚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062239_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do they deserve to die for what they did to me? Perhaps. Who am I to say? Many would say I deserve to die, for my own actions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们应该为他们对我做的事而死吗？也许吧。我能说什么呢？因为我的行为，很多人也会说我应该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062239_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not to say I forgive them, or what they did. If I learned they burned alive in some raider attack, I wouldn't care at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不是说我原谅他们，或者他们的所作所为。如果我知道他们在攻击中被活活烧死，我也不会在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062239_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, I truly hope they are dead. I hope they died shortly after selling me. But if they didn't, what purpose would killing them now serve?
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我真的希望他们已经死了。我希望他们在卖了我之后不久就死了，但如果他们没有，现在杀了他们又有什么用呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062239_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The wrong they committed against me happened over two decades ago. I don't want to be the sort of person who seethes for that long over anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们对我犯下的错误发生在二十多年前，我不想成为一个对任何事都愤怒那么久的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062239_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want revenge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想复仇吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieOverlook2
He did. He named me, taught me to walk, speak, read.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实。他给我取名，教我走路，说话，读书。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_0006223b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He also had me flogged if I hesitated at all when he gave me an order. If I made a move out of turn, I was whipped bloody.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我在他给我下命令时稍有犹豫，他就会鞭打我。如果我走偏了，就会被打得浑身是血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_0006223b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He taught me that I was property, not a person. That I must be obedient and quiet. If I failed a task, I was locked in a crate to starve for the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他教导我，我是财产，不是人。我必须听话，安静，如果一项任务失败了，我就会被锁在板条箱里挨饿一整天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_0006223b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He told me that when I was purchased, it would almost certainly be for the sexual pleasure of whomever could afford me. And I was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他告诉我，当我被买走的时候，几乎可以肯定是为了给任何买得起我的人带来性快感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_0006223b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was in my early adolescence when someone was actually kind to me for the first time in my life. The first time I was acknowledged as a person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我青春期早期的时候，我人生中才第一次有人对我很好，那是我第一次被认可为一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_0006223b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You understand, I hope, why it is that I have no desire to dwell on my own past. Why I would never want to go back and find where it all began.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能理解，为什么我不想沉湎于自己的过去。为什么我再也不想回去寻找一切的开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_0006223b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you were sold that young, the slaver must have done more to raise you than your parents did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你这么年轻就被卖了，那奴隶贩子肯定比你的父母付出了更多养育你的努力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieOverlook3
There are. I learned them well. The most important of them was the knowledge of what I could endure and overcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，我学得很好。其中最重要的是我知道自己能够忍受和克服什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_0006223d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's far more useful knowledge than the location of whichever rat-shit shantytown I was unfortunate enough to enter the world into, surely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，这比我不幸踏入这个世界时所处的贫民窟的位置要有用得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_0006223d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And on the subject of rat-shit shantytowns, this one lost its luster the moment we walked in. Shall we get moving?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到贫民窟，我们一走进这里就失去了光彩，我们该走了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_0006223d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
There are lessons in the past, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，过去的经验教训值得借鉴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieOverlook4
Is that meant to get under my skin? Because it's a sentiment I fully agree with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是想激怒我吗?因为我完全同意这种观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_0006223f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm well over it. I leave the past where it lays. I think people may not be so miserable all the time if they did the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经完全忘记了。我把过去留在原地。我想如果人们也这样做，也许就不会一直这么痛苦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that spirit, let's get moving. No sense loitering around some ruined old shantytown when we have better things to do, surely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本着这种精神，让我们行动起来。当我们有更好的事情可做的时候，在破旧的棚户区闲逛毫无意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_0006223f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 2
Whatever. Boo-hoo, life is hard for everyone. Get over it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，呜呼，生活对每个人来说都很艰难，克服它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieOverlook5
Ah, but you're forgetting my complete lack of feelings in that regard. In order to feel better, surely I would already have to feel bad by default.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你忘了我在这方面完全没有感情。为了感觉好一点，我肯定已经默认感觉不好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062241_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mostly just feel numb to it all. Vengeance wouldn't change that, for better or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是觉得有点麻木。无论好坏，复仇都改变不了这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieoverl_00062241_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but revenge is cathartic. It might make you feel better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，但复仇是一种宣泄。这可能会让你感觉好些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieUlyssesConvo
Dealing with Ulysses has been rather irritating. I look forward to being done with this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和尤利西斯打交道一直很烦人，我期待着不再待在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_0006283c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieUlyssesProceed
I don't appreciate having my time wasted, and if somebody must try to kill me, or you, the least they could do is have a reason that makes sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢浪费我的时间，如果有人想杀我，或者杀你，至少他们得有个合理的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062841_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't care enough about him, or his ridiculous motivations, to actually exert the effort to dislike him. But I can be annoyed, sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不太在乎他，也不太在乎他荒谬的动机，不会真正努力去讨厌他。但我当然会生气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062841_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clearly he's a homicidal lunatic with aspirations of mass-murder, but he pretends as if it's a normal reaction to you... existing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显，他是个杀人狂，渴望大屠杀，但他假装这是你现有的正常反应......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062841_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You served as the method conveyance for the destruction of this settlement he fetishized, so somehow wildly launching nukes is the logical response?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是摧毁他所崇拜的聚居地的工具，所以疯狂地发射核武器是合乎逻辑的反应吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062841_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
I'm surprised you have an opinion on this. I thought you don't bother disliking things or people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很惊讶你对这件事有意见，我以为你不会讨厌任何人或事?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieUlysses1
Hmm? No. I don't think so. I think he employs a very flowery, melodramatic affectation that lends him the illusion of competence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯?不，我不这么想。我认为他使用了一种非常华丽的、夸张的矫揉造作的手法，这让他产生了一种自己能力很强的错觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062843_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The man seems to be under the impression that you, a courier, making repeat stops to a burgeoning settlement with urgent need of deliveries....
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个人似乎给人的印象是你，一个邮差，在一个急需交货的新兴定居点重复停留......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062843_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Is in some way a deeply symbolic gesture of your strange, idealized affection for the location. He's clearly projecting. And delusional.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...在某种程度上是你对这个地方奇怪而理想化的感情的一种深深的象征。他很显然在自我投射，还有妄想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062843_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think it's that simple. He seems fairly smart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得没那么简单，他看起来相当聪明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieUlysses2
...Perhaps. I feel it necessary to point out that I've also been traumatized, but I didn't choose to cope by launching ICBMs into population centers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许...我觉得有必要指出，我也受到了创伤，但我没有选择向人口中心发射洲际弹道导弹来应对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062845_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it would be simpler to just kill him, but, as always, I am at your command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想直接杀了他会更简单些，但是，一如既往，我听命于你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062845_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not logical, but he's clearly traumatized by what happened. I think I can reason with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不合逻辑，但他显然受到了创伤。我想我可以跟他讲讲道理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieUlysses3
That does seem to be the simplest solution to raving madmen, doesn't it? I suppose we ought to get to work, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这似乎是对付疯子最简单的办法，不是吗?我想我们该开始工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062847_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
Yeah, I've had more than enough of him. He's a dead man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我受够他了，他死定了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieUlysses4
I don't think our mannerisms are really very comparable. For one, I don't speak in sentence fragments, like someone went at my words with an eraser.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为我们的习惯有什么可比性。首先，我不会用句子碎片说话，就像有人用橡皮擦擦掉我的话一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062849_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I use a variety of advanced words because... Well, they exist, and I know how to string a proper sentence together with them, so why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我使用各种高级词汇，因为......它们确实存在，而且我知道如何用它们来串起一个合适的句子，为什么不呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062849_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This one though, prefers to use some bizarre, monosyllabic syntax to obfuscate how petty his goals truly are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，这个人更喜欢用一些奇怪的，单音节的语法来混淆他的目标到底有多渺小。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062849_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "I'm angry that this settlement I wanted to live in exploded, and now I'm throwing a homicidal tantrum" is a touch harder to rationalize.
ESP.TRADUIT: “我很生气，我想住的这个定居点爆炸了，现在我要大发雷霆杀人”这就更难找借口了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062849_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, his insistence on referring to the regional factions solely by their iconography was wearing thin by the third time he did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，在他第三次提到该地区各派时，他坚持只以他们的肖像来指代他们，但这一主张已逐渐式微。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062849_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As if a man that fetishizes the flag of some dead nation, that he was never even part of, is some sort of expert on the meanings behind symbols.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就好像一个人迷恋某个死去的国家的国旗，而他甚至从未参与过这个国家，却假扮是某种符号背后含义的专家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_00062849_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you seriously giving him shit for his speech? You talk like a thesaurus, Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的在对他的演讲说教吗?你说得真像一本词典，查理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieUlysses5
I'm picturing... A man bent over backwards, his head wedged firmly up his own ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想想......一个男人向后弯着腰，头紧紧地插在自己的屁眼里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieulyss_0006284b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
What kind of symbol do you think would fit him better?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得什么样的符号更适合他?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePersonalGoals
My goal is to kill anyone that may wish to kill you, up until the terms of my contract end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的目标是杀掉任何想杀你的人，直到我的合同到期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_0006343f_1.ogg
