ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it. I'm not haunted by some lingering threads of the past that I've yet to tie up, or anything to that effect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。我并没有被那些我还没有整理好的、挥之不去的往事或任何类似的事情所困扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_0006343f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a handful of low-priority side jobs at the moment, that I figured I would deal with during any breaks where I'm not shadowing you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在有一些不太重要的副业，我想我可以在不跟着你的休息时间处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_0006343f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any goals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么目标吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePersonalSkills
I prefer high-accuracy, suppressed firearms, ideally with a high rate of fire. I'm also quite handy with a blade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我更喜欢高精度武器，压制型的高射速武器。我还很会用刀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_00063441_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm perfectly capable of holding my own in combat from any distance. I consider stealth to be my speciality, however.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全有能力在任何距离的战斗中保持自己的实力，不过，我认为潜行是我的专长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_00063441_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Striking unsuspecting targets and maximizing lethality in that first move is my preferred methodology. I can assist if you utilize similar tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击毫无防备的目标，并在第一步将杀伤力最大化是我的首选方法。如果你采取类似的策略，我可以提供帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_00063441_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not, however, have much in the way of training in the usage of explosives, energy weapons, or hand-to-hand combat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，我在使用炸药、能量武器或肉搏战方面没有经过太多的训练。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieperso_00063441_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I best use your skills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最得心应手的技能都有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAcceptSidejobs
...Sure, I don't see why not. I can split the commission with you for each target. That's fair enough, certainly.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...当然，我看没什么不可以的，我可以和你平分每个目标的佣金。当然，这很公平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaccep_00063445_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll need to be present when you kill the targets, mind you. While I'm aware you're an experienced killer, they are still my contracts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 提醒你一下，你杀目标的时候我得在场。虽然我知道你是个经验丰富的杀手，但它们仍然是我的合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaccep_00063445_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The details are in my safehouse. As my clients told me, there's no rush. I wouldn't be bothered if we didn't get around to any of these.
ESP.TRADUIT: 细节在我的安全屋，我的客户告诉我，不用着急。如果我们没时间做这些事，他也不会介意的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaccep_00063445_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCharlieAssassinJobs 10
Side jobs, huh? Could I help with any of those?
ESP.TRADUIT: 副业，嗯？需要我帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieDeclineSidejobs
No, you won't have to worry about that. I specifically accepted these side contracts because the clients aren't in any sort of rush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你不用担心。我特别接受了这些附带合同，因为客户们并不着急。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliedecli_00063444_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's something to keep myself busy in the event that you don't require me to keep within close proximity to you, 24/7.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它能让我在你不需要我的时候，让我也有事做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliedecli_00063444_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, as long as it doesn't distract you from your duties with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，只要它不分散你对我的注意力就行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkBark1
This target should be simple enough. Apparently he's totally alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个目标应该很简单，显然他是一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_0006344a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkBark2
I was told that this one killed the last assassin to come after him. He won't fare so well this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说他杀了最后一个追杀他的刺客，他这次不会那么走运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkBark3
This target should be soft enough, but he'll likely be accompanied by some of his chem-addict clientele.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个目标应该够软弱，但他可能会有一些药物成瘾的客户陪着他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkBark4
A lieutenant in the Jackals. Shocking that a member of that worthless gang even managed to earn a price on his head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豺狼帮的副手，令人震惊的是，那个毫无价值的团伙的一个成员竟然想要他的人头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkBark5
Time to get to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该去工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkBark6
This is the final one of my side jobs. He'll be well-equipped, but nothing beyond our abilities. Let's get to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我最后一份副业，他装备很好，但没有超出我们的能力。让我们开始工作吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkKill1
Fine work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkKill2
Mission accomplished. Time to get paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任务完成，是时候得到报酬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkKill3
That should satisfy my client.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这应该会让我的客户满意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkKill4
That one won't be bothering anyone again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那家伙不会再打扰任何人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkKill5
Job's done. We should probably leave before the sheriff takes objection to assassins operating in his jurisdiction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作完成了，我们最好在警长发现刺杀在他的管辖范围内发生之前离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a9c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's somebody's problem solved. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 某人的问题解决了，干得漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieWetworkKill6
Alright. That was the last of my side contracts. I appreciate your assistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，那是我最后一份兼职合同了，谢谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([07063446]aaaCharlieAssassinJobs) Wetwork EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliewetwo_00063a9f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieSniperNestBark
Once, a job required me to wait three days at a sniper's nest, never moving, just waiting for my target to walk by his window and into my sights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次，一项任务要求我在狙击手的巢穴里等上三天，一动不动，只等着我的目标走过他的窗户，进入我的视线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliesnipe_00064c99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAerotechConvo
A... refugee camp? That's what they're calling it? Why not be more honest? Call it what it is: A camp for the shiftless and impoverished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个......难民营？他们是这么叫的？为什么不更诚实一点呢？我们可以这么称呼它:一个懒汉和穷人的营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a breeding ground for a collective narrative of self-victimization. Ridiculous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是自我牺牲的集体叙事的温床，荒谬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAerotechProceed
I mean that these people idle around this derelict collection of ruins, all day, every day, doing nothing to improve their miserable lives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，这些人整天无所事事地在这堆废弃的废墟周围，不做任何事来改善他们悲惨的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They complain about how they're destitute, blaming the institution of gambling for their woes, conveniently ignoring that gambling was {emph}their choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们抱怨自己一贫如洗，把自己的不幸归咎于赌博机构，顺理成章地忽视了赌博是他们自己的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they're really so desperate, why don't they actually do something to ease their financial woes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们真的那么绝望，为什么不做点什么来缓解他们的财务困境呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at this place. It's filthy. Maybe one of them should consider picking up the trash in exchange for a small fee. But they don't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这个地方，它多么肮脏，也许他们中有人应该考虑捡垃圾，以换取少量的金钱，但他们没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They sit in their refuse piles, shaking their fists at the sky and demanding that reality rewrite itself in their favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们坐在垃圾堆里，对着天空挥舞着拳头，要求现实改写成对他们有利的样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAerotech1
Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They faced actual hardship in their pasts. What did they learn from it? How are they rising above it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在过去遇到了实际的困难，他们从中学到了什么？他们是如何挺过去的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're content to hide under the thumb of the NCR, so why not pick up a rifle? Use their righteous indignation for the benefit of their new nation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们满足于躲在NCR的控制下，为什么不拿起一把步枪呢？为什么不利用他们的义愤为他们的新国家谋福利呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were the victims of the war. Now, they're just squatting in piles of rubble and filth, trading stories of how things used to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是战争的受害者。现在，他们只是蹲在一堆瓦砾和污秽中，交换过去的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glamorizing some past life that was stolen from them, while doing nothing to regain it, or start anew. Self-victimization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美化从他们那里偷来的一些过去的生活，而不做任何事情来找回它，或者重新开始。持续进行自我伤害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not everyone living here is a degenerate gambler. There are war refugees here, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是每个住在这里的人都是堕落的赌徒，这里也有战争难民。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAerotech2
Indeed. And they've received help. Rather than landing in a ditch with a knife in their guts, the NCR provided them with shelter and medical aid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实，他们得到了帮助。NCR并没有把刀插进他们的内脏，而是为他们提供了避难所和医疗援助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now, they're in a state fit to begin climbing out of the hole that life has dumped them in. But they refuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而现在，他们正处于一种可以开始爬出生活抛给他们的坑的状态，但他们拒绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'd rather wallow in this pit and wait for a solution to appear before them, served on a golden platter, held aloft by glittering angels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们宁愿在这个深坑里打滚，等待解决方案出现在他们面前，由闪闪发光的天使高高举起，盛在金盘里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything less than that would just be too much work for them. Such a choice warrants these loathsome conditions they're confined to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对他们来说，任何少于这个数字的东西都是太繁重的工作，这样的选择为他们被限制在这些令人厌恶的环境提供了理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Myself, I'd rather leave this place as soon as our business permits. Shall we get to it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我而言，只要我们的生意允许，我宁愿离开这个地方。我们可以开始了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cb9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone needs help sometimes, Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都有需要帮助的时候，查理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAerotech3
It's truly impressive what people can endure, survive, and overcome. I've had first-hand experience with that... resilience of spirit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们能够忍受、生存和克服的东西真的令人印象深刻。我有第一手的经验......坚韧的精神。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cbb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The path isn't easy. It will likely leave scars, mental or physical. But it's never impossible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条路并不容易，它可能会在精神上或身体上留下疤痕。但这并非不可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cbb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These dregs wallow in their own misery, often self-inflicted, and make the conscious choice to stay in this filth-smeared purgatory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些渣滓在自己的痛苦中打滚，往往是自己造成的，并有意识地选择留在这个肮脏的炼狱里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cbb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're free to make that ridiculous choice, of course. Just as I am free to find them utterly repulsive because of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，他们可以自由地做出荒谬的选择。就像我可以自由地发现他们并且完全厌恶一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cbb_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's attend to our business here, and go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们把这里的事处理完就走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cbb_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does this bother you so much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这事为什么让你这么困扰?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAerotech4
Nor can I. Let's get out of this wretched place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不能，我们离开这鬼地方吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieaerot_00064cbd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
I can't say I really care about any of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能说我真的在乎他们中的任何一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieSearchlightBark
Heading for Searchlight, are we? Feral Ghouls are fragile enough. As for the radiation... Here, this may help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要去探照灯营地，是吗?野生食尸鬼非常脆弱，至于辐射......这里，这个可能有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliesearc_00065edf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem radaway 2 player.additem radx 3
aaaGerryAboutJessie
'Course he told me. After I finished spitting on his boots, he told me about her. {trying not to cry}Fuck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他当然告诉我了，我在他靴子上吐完唾沫后，他告诉了我关于她的事。{努力忍住不哭}操......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryaboutje_00065ee4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fuck did she ever do to anyone? Why the fuck is she gone, and I'm still fucking here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 她到底对谁做过什么？为什么她走了，我还在这？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryaboutje_00065ee4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please... Just leave me alone.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gerald O'Neill [0700B325] (mod) Quest : ([070163C7]aaaMainJessieQuest) Happy To Be Here EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult05\aaamainjes_aaagerryaboutje_00065ee4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaMainJessieQuest.aaaGerryKnows to aaaMainJessieQuest.aaaGerryKnows + 1 aaaCharlieCompanionREF.say aaaCharlieGerryBark
So, has Ryan talked to you about Jessie...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，瑞恩跟你说过杰西的事吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAcidFlashbacks
Hmm? Sometimes I see things in my periphery, and I need to reorient my thoughts. Shut out the metaphysical white noise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯?有时我看到的是我周围的东西，我需要重新定位我的思想，排除那些形而上学的白噪音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieacidf_000670d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 1
You know, sometimes you just stare blankly off into space. You feeling okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，有时候你只是茫然地望着天空，你感觉好吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAcidFlashbacks1
I suppose that's accurate enough. It's nothing delusional; I can always tell what's real. It's... hard to describe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这已经足够准确了，没什么妄想，我总能分辨出什么是真实的。这是......很难描述。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieacidf_000670da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's chemical. Neural damage. I spent... many years, being pumped full of every sort of narcotic under the sun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它是化学物质，神经损伤。我花了......多年来，我被注射了各种麻醉剂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieacidf_000670da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm used to it. I can go days without experiencing it, and when it does come up, it's a minor distraction, at the very worst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经习惯了。我可以几天没有它，当它反噬时，最坏的情况，也只是一点小干扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieacidf_000670da_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's never compromised my effectiveness. {beat, quiet}I wouldn't allow for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这从不影响我的工作效率。{平静}我不同意我受到干扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieacidf_000670da_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, are you saying you hallucinate things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你是说你会产生幻觉吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieAcidFlashbacks2
Eh. I'm used to it. It doesn't detract from my professional efficacy, so it's not really something I'm overly concerned about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我已经习惯了。这并不会降低我的专业效能，所以这并不是我真正应该过度担心的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieacidf_000670dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooookay. That's weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: Oooookay！真奇怪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePrimmBark1
This is the emptiest town I've ever seen. Like it just rose up from the sand, half-formed, out of some child's interpretive drawing of civilization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我见过的最空的小镇，就像它刚从沙子里冒出来，半成形，从某个孩子对文明的诠释画中浮现出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprimm_000676d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharliePrimmBark2
A military outpost dedicated to observing nothing at all... That sounds like a flowery metaphor straight from some anti-expansionist manifesto.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个什么都不观察的军事哨所...听起来像是直接从某些反扩张主义宣言中得来的华丽比喻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharlieprimm_000676dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieGerryBark
He's going to kill himself. Might not be today. Or tomorrow. But soon. He crossed that threshold, and he lacks the constitution to pull himself back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他要自杀了，也许不是今天，还是明天。但很快，他跨过了那个门槛，但他缺乏把自己拉回来的体质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0703AAFF]aaaCharlieAmbDialogue) 0703AAFF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegerry_000682ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWintersKilledInnocents
Yep. That I did. It never really bothered me none, I figured, we're all going to die some day. Heh. Life has a way of collecting on those debts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我杀的，我从来都不介意，我想，我们总有一天都会死。哈，生活总有办法偿还这些债务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawinterskille_00069597_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took my own innocent boy getting himself killed for me to realize what sorta man I was. Still am, I guess. I can't take none of it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了让我意识到自己是个什么样的人，我眼睁睁看着自己无辜的儿子被杀？我想是吧，我不能收回任何东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawinterskille_00069597_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like I said. Take on a debt like that, one way or another, it's gonna come back to bite you in the ass. Always does. Keep that in mind, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我说的。承担这样的债务，不管怎样，你都会得到报应。记住这一点，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul Winters [0700D72C] (mod) Quest : ([0700DD25]aaaPaulWintersQuest) The Debt Unreconciled EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleold02\aaapaulwin_aaawinterskille_00069597_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It sounds like you killed a lot of innocent people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你杀了很多无辜的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaa
<Holotape Recording>
ESP.TRADUIT: <全息磁带录制>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holotape [0700A118] (mod) Quest : ([0703BD24]aaaMorganQuest1) Heaven Knows Everything EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult01default\aaamorganq_aaamorganzzzhol_0006f58c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieGiveMusic
A... music holotape? What am I meant to do with this? I'm not so good at murder that I could use it as a weapon, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个......音乐全息磁带？我该拿这个怎么办？我不太擅长用这个杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegivem_00071373_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaCharlieMusicTape 1
Would you be interested in this weird holotape I found? It has music on it, apparently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对我找到的这个奇怪的全息磁带感兴趣吗?显然上面有音乐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieGiveMusic2
I... did say that, yes. I suppose I'm just surprised you bothered to internalize that bit of worthless personal trivia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我说过，是的。我只是很惊讶你居然还费心去消化那些毫无价值的私人琐事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegivem_00071376_1.ogg
NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... don't suppose there's anything wrong in enjoying myself from time to time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我不认为我时不时地享受生活有什么不对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegivem_00071376_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, truly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你,真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegivem_00071376_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 4 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieCommitted to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieCommitted + 1
You said you liked the sort of music they don't play on the radio, so I thought you'd enjoy this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你喜欢收音机里不放的那种音乐，所以我想你会喜欢这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCharlieGiveMusic3
I apologize. I'm not really used to being the recipient of random acts of kindness. I didn't mean to insult your efforts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我道歉。我还不太习惯接受别人的赠予，我不是有意要侮辱你的努力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegivem_00071377_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Yes, thank you. Truly. I appreciate that you kept my personal foibles in mind, for whatever reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...是的,谢谢你。真的，我很感激你把我的缺点记在心里，不管出于什么原因让你记得那么请楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Charlie [0702E917] (mod) Quest : ([0702F50D]aaaCharlieCompanionQuest) 0702F50D (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\aaacharliecompanionvoice\aaacharlie_aaacharliegivem_00071377_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieApproval + 2 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieCommitted to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaDDCharlieCommitted + 1
You said you liked music; I got you music. This is the part where you're supposed to thank me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你喜欢音乐，我给你买了音乐。现在你该感谢我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaONeillAdiosAmigo
Right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan O'Neill [070088E7] (mod) Quest : ([0701147B]aaaRyanOneillQuest1) Hungry Again EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\depthsofdepravity.esp\maleadult03\aaaryanone_aaaoneilladiosa_0007a90e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没别的问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If You Want Peace...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要平静...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charlie's talent for killing her targets on the first strike have rubbed off on you. Your sneak attack criticals are even deadlier as long as she is around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理一击致命的天赋已经感染了你。只要有她在，你的偷袭就会更加致命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Judging from the label, this holotape contains several strange, psychedelic instrumental tracks. Sadly, it's doesn't seem to be formatted with use in your Pip-Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从标签上看，这张全息磁带里有几首奇怪的迷幻的器乐曲。遗憾的是，它的格式似乎并不适合在你的Pip-Boy中使用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raya hugs you for a long moment, before she finally pulls away. With tears in her eyes, she thanks you again, and then turns and departs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉娅拥抱了你很长一段时间才抽身。她眼里含着泪水，再次感谢了你，然后转身离开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Freddy O'Reilly
Location: Harper's Shack
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标名称:弗雷迪·奥莱利
地点:哈珀的小屋

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can go home, courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以回家了，邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charlie has gone to the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理去了幸运38赌场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stan and his associates quickly exit the building, after shoving a moist wad of NCR dollars into your hand. You will likely never see him again, to which you are eternally grateful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯坦和他的同伙在把一沓湿漉漉的NCR美元塞到你手里后，很快离开了大楼。你很可能再也见不到他了，但你永远心怀感激。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Helena died in 66, had son in 59. Who raised boy??
ESP.TRADUIT: 海伦娜66年去世，59年生下儿子，谁抚养了这个男孩？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Lethality perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你获得了致命伤的特技。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost the Lethality perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你失去了致命伤的特技。

ESP.ORIGINAL:

Location: Cerulean Robotics
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标名称：托尼·德安吉洛
地点：蔚蓝机器人工厂

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its message delivered, the eyebot turns and flies off the way it came.
ESP.TRADUIT: 传递完信息后，眼球机器人转身飞走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Enrique Sanchez
Location: Nevada Highway Patrol Station
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名:恩里克·桑切斯
地点:内华达公路巡警站

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I will never understand what it is about the statement "The Reverend isn't available right now, please try again later." that you guys can't comprehend. I mean, really, it's stated for you right there, clear as day in the mod itself, then again in the mod page FAQ, and then another 80-or-so times in the comments, and yet still, here we are. Did you even *try* coming back later, or did you skip right to the console-command cheats?
"I don't want to come back later! I want to speak to the manager RIGHT THIS SECOND! Time to break out the console commands!"
Oh well, what the fuck do I know? You cheated your way up here early, so I expect you'll be wanting a reward for your valiant efforts. Okay, here you go!
ESP.TRADUIT:
我永远也无法理解“牧师现在没空，请稍后再来”这句话到底是什么意思，你们肯定理解不了。我的意思是，真的，它对你来说就在那里，清楚的一天在模组本身，然后再是模组页面FAQ，然后另80次左右的评论，但仍然，我们在这里。你是否曾经尝试过稍后再回来，或者你是否直接跳过了控制台命令的窍门？
“我不想晚点再来！”我要马上和管理员谈!是时候拿出控制台命令了！"
哦好吧，我他妈知道什么？你这么早就作弊来了，所以我想你会因为你的英勇努力而得到奖励。好了，给你！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, nice console command, bro.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，很好的控制台命令，兄弟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently, the Reverend is busy at the moment, and you're not going to be able to meet with him right now. Perhaps you should do something else, in the meantime?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很显然，牧师现在很忙，你现在不能去见他。在此期间，也许你该做点别的事？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Billie Bloom
Location: Bison Steve Hotel
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名:比莉·布鲁姆
地点:野牛史蒂夫酒店

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Don Scranton
Location: Cap Counterfeiter's Shack
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标名称:唐·斯克兰顿
地点:瓶盖伪造者的窝点

ESP.ORIGINAL: In order to proceed down this quest chain, you'll need to download the North Road Remastered, and resolve the Adam Burke situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了继续这个任务链，你需要下载North Road Remastered，并解决亚当·伯克的情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The North Road
ESP.TRADUIT: 北方之路

ESP.ORIGINAL: His letter delivered, the courier quickly turns and heads back the way he came.
ESP.TRADUIT: 信送到后，邮差迅速转身朝来时的方向回去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have refused to start the main questline, meaning the mod is now over and you have nothing to show for it but this smarmy text box. Thanks for downloading, I hope you hated it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拒绝开始主要的任务线，这意味着mod现在结束了，你除了这个自以为是的文本框外没有任何东西可以展示。谢谢下载，我希望你讨厌它！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for Playing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢使用！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The courier quickly runs off after having delivered his message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差送信后很快就跑了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are currently closed to the public while repairs to the roof are underway. We are making good progress while God grants us fine weather. Thank you for your patience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们目前正在对屋顶进行维修，不对公众开放。当上帝赐给我们好天气时，我们就会取得进展。感谢您的耐心等待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Closed to the Public
ESP.TRADUIT: 不向公众开放

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charlie has returned to her Freeside safehouse.
